Razón por la que promete ser puntual con sus cuotas. Esequiel de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de alverja y varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para su próxima siembra.
texts.en: Esequiel, 21 years old, is single and hard-working.  He takes care of his father Juan, his mother Doris, and his 5 siblings in his house located in the town of Bellavista Huaracayo.  As the eldest son, he financially supports his parents.  For this reason, as soon as he reached adulthood, he began to work for himself.  His parents needed his help with farming, their main source of income.  Since then, they gave him land where he began to plant peas.  What he likes most about his work is harvest time, because he sees the reward for the arduous work that he does.  Moreover, he tells us that he plants on a small scale because during the coffee harvest, he travels to work as a laborer in various coffee plantations.  "I have to work in various places in order to be able to save money; I'm a thousand positions (a jack of all trades)" he mentions.  His greatest desire is to become a great farmer and sow extensive hectars of land.  For this, he works without rest, patiently awaiting the moment in which he can invest with his own capital.  He belongs to the communal bank "Señor de Muruhuay” and this is his second loan with MFP, where he feels grateful for the opportunity he's been given.  For this reason, he promises to be punctual with his payments.  Esequiel, upon receiving your support, will invest the requested loan in the purchase of 2 bags of pea seeds and various sacks of natural fertilizers for his next sowing.

loans.use: to purchase 2 bags of pea seeds and sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Ines

texts.en:
Ines started her own day care and currently watches over 12 children. For the past 11 years, she has been working directly with a federal agency which pays her for the food and supplies she needs to provide loving care for the children. After her recent inspection, Ines will be able to increase the capacity of her day care by 2 children. Ines has the help of one employee depending on the season. She hopes that someday she will be able to offer her services to more people and open a new day care.

Ines will use this loan to renovate the daycare and purchase more tables, chairs, and toys for the children.

loans.use: To purchase more furniture and educational toys for the day care.

loans.name: Fabricio

texts.en:
Since Fabricio arrived in the US from Brazil, he has been working in the painting industry. Two years ago he decided to start his own business and despite his lack of credit, he was able to purchase painting equipment with his savings. In the beginning, Fabricio had to build a client base without previous references, therefore offering very low prices for all his new clients. Last year he started snow removal as a part of his business in order to boost his income. Fabricio wants to keep expanding his business so he can support his family and give them a better life.

Fabricio is using his loan to buy more equipment for his snow removal service.

loans.use: To purchase snow removal equipment.

loans.name: Santos Tomas

texts.es:
el sr. Santos tiene 41 años de edad y se dedica al cultivo de café,  tiene una experiencia de 20 años de cumplir  con esa  labor  ya  que  este a sido su trabajo y le ayuda a cubrir las necesidades que tiene en su  hogar, el vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos. 
El Sr. Santos utilizara el credito para la compra de una planta de energía solar, el a notado que esta seria de mucha utilidad  para él y su familia por que en la zona donde el vive no cuentan con el servicio primordial para  todas las viviendas del país, y así  poder cambiar totalmente la imagen de su vivienda y sus condiciones de vida. 
ahora podra tener un televisor y podra comprar un celular para comunicarse con sus familiares.
texts.en:
Santos is 41 years old, and he is a farmer who cultivates coffee.  He has 20 years of experience in this line of work; this work has allowed him to pay for  the household necessities.  He lives with his wife and their 3 children.

Santos will use this loan to buy solar energy equipment.  He notes that this would be very useful for him and his family, because in the area where he lives they lack the primary utilities that many homes have in his country.  Having solar power will totally change his house and living conditions.  Now, he will be able to have a television and a cellular phone that he can use to communicate with his family.

loans.use: to buy solar power equipment for his home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy metal kitchenware merchandise.

loans.name: Juana Toribia

texts.es:
La señora Juana Toribia es casada, tiene 43 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la sastrería,  a la confección de telas, camisa y pantalones, lleva ya 3 años de experiencia en este trabajo.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para ampliar su capital de trabajo para la compra de telas de diferentes clases y colores, trabaja en la confección de pantalones, camisa, y entre otros trabajo que se le solicita a ella. Espera mejorar su trabajo con la ampliación de capital que está haciendo.
texts.en:
Juana Toribia is 43, and married. She didn't have the opportunity to go to school.  She has 3 children who are in school. She's a tailor, a makes cloth items, shirts and pants. She has 3 years of experience in this work. 

She decided to apply for a loan to expand her working capital, in order to buy fabric of different kinds and colors. She makes pants, shirts and other things that people ask her for. She hopes to improve her business through expanding her working capital, as she is doing.

loans.use: To buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To help expand his product line.

loans.name: Las Colmenas Group

texts.en:
Hilcia is the group coordinator of Las Colmenas. She is a single mother of two who lives in the Samana province of the Dominican Republic. She lives in a rented house with her two children. Hilcia said her most difficult challenge has been to raise and educate her children. She enjoys operating her business and being at home with her children. 

This is Hilcia's fifth loan with Esperanza. She started her business with the first loan she received from Esperanza International, around two and a half years ago. She plans to use this loan to purchase clothes which she sells out of her home to others in her community. She will purchase underwear, pants, t-shirts, blouses, skirts and shirts.

Hilcia wants to use the profits from her business to reinvest in it and to save because her future plan is to improve their living conditions, by buying or building her own house. 

She has maD. good investments and has been saving. She hopes to be able to save enough money to continue improving her family life and to make one of her dreams come true, the one to have her own house. She thanks you for your support! 

There are two photos to make visible as many faces as possible.

loans.use: to purchase underwear, pants, t-shirts, blouses, skirts and shirts to sell

loans.name: Estuardo De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Estuardo de Jesus es casado, tiene 21 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, se dedica a la construcción de vivienda como ayudante de albañil, tiene 3 años de experiencia en este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de medicinas para la salud de su familia y compra un mueble para uso personal. Espera mejorar su condición de vida con el préstamo que está realizando.
texts.en:
Estuardo de Jesus is married and 21 years of age.  He finished 6th grade of basic education and works in home construction as a mason's assistant.  He has 3 years of experience in this trade and he counts on the support of his wife who takes care of the domestic tasks.

He decided to request a loan that would allow him to purchase medicine for the health of his family as well as a piece of furniture for his personal use.  He hopes to improve his living conditions with this loan.

loans.use: to cover health expenses and purchase furniture

loans.name: Cristobal

texts.es: Don Cristóbal tiene 51 años de edad y tiene más de 15 años de experiencia en la asistencia y cultivo del café. Cristobal vive con su pareja y sus 6 hijos. Don Cristóbal esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una planta de energía solar, el no cuenta con este servicio básico y en la comunidad donde reside no se espera contar con fluido eléctrico tradicional, Cristobal piensa que este sistema seria de mucha utilidad para su familia ya que no tendrán que alumbrarse con candelas, focos y candiles, ademas así mejora la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Don Cristóbal is 51 years old and has more than 15 years of experience in the planting and cultivating of coffee.  Cristóbal lives with his wife and their 6 children.  Don Cristóbal is requesting a loan for the purchase of a solar energy plant.  He doesn't have this basic service and in the community where he resides, they don't expect to have the traditional flow of electricity.  Cristóbal thinks that this system would be very useful for his family since they wouldn't have to use candles and lamps for light, thus improving the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: compra de planta solar

loans.name: Jimy Nahun

texts.es:
el sr. Jimy Nahun tiene 28 años de edad y se dedica al cultivo y venta de café, tiene 7 años de experiencia de realizar ese trabajo, Jimy esta casado y es padre de 2 hijos. 
El Sr. Yimi utilizara el préstamo para la compra de una planta solar ya que no cuenta con este servicio básico, y la empresa gubernamental que presta estos servicios no tiene planes de llegar a esa zona.
Este proyecto servirá de mucha utilidad  para su familia y bienestar propio. con este sistema podra conectar un televisor, radio y varios focos en su casa de habitacion.
texts.en:
Jimy Nahun is 28, and he  grows and sells coffee.  He has 7 years experience doing this work. Jimy is married and the father of 2 children.

Jimy will use the loan to buy a solar electricity plant, as he doesn't have this basic service.  The government agency that provides these services has no plans to reach that area.

This project will be useful for his family and his own well-being.  With this system, he will be able to connect a television, radio, and have several lights in his home.

loans.use: To buy a power plant.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.es: Jenny, de 32 años convive con Wilder, su esposo. Ambos tiene 3 hijos: Ronald, Janeth y Jaretsy, de un año. En unión familiar ellos viven en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la localidad de Palca. Su fuerza y constancia, la caracterizan. A pesar de tener una familia consolidada, ella siempre  recibe los consejos de su madre, quien la aconseja sobre las técnicas agrícolas a utilizar; es así que siempre su cosecha de papa, maíz, arveja y flor de gladiolo, son unas de las mejores. Gracias a su esmerada dedicación con que las cuida, mientras ella, brinda su mejor esfuerzo en la agricultura, y en el negocio de compra y venta de miel pura. Además su esposo trabaja como perforista en una mina de la ciudad de Huancavelica (ubicado en la zona sur del Perú), donde llega a su domicilio cada 20 días. Lo que más le gusta a Jenny, es sembrar flor de gladiolo y disfrutar de su exquisito olor, sin embargo a veces reniega porque compró terrenos bastante alejados de su casa,  para más adelante piensa en continuar sembrando, por lo que quiere comprar más terrenos productivos en su localidad. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las maripositas” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde es una mujer madura y muy hábil que constantemente apoya a los integrantes de su asociación. Razón por la que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Jenny de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos en sus cultivos de arveja, maíz y papa.
texts.en:
Jenny is 32 years old and lives with Wilder, her husband. They have 3 children, Ronald, Janeth and 1 year old Jaretsy. The family lives in a rented house in Palca. She is known for her strength and perseverance. Despite having a very close-knit family, it’s her mother who always gives her advice, who advises her about farming techniques to use, and thus her harvest of potatoes, corn, peas, and gladiolas are some of the best, thanks to her dedication in the care of them, while she puts forth her best effort in farming and in the business of buying and selling honey. 

Her husband works as a driller in a mine in the city of Huancavelica (located in a southern area of Peru) and he comes home every 20 days.

What Jenny likes best is to grow gladiolas and enjoying their exquisite scent, none-the-less sometimes she complains because the land she bought is far from her house, and thinking ahead about continuing farming, she would like to buy productive land closer to her home.  

She belongs to the Little Butterflies Comunal Bank and this is her 4th loan with MFP. She is a mature and capable woman who is always helping the other members of the group. She promises to make her payments on time. With the help of the loan Jenny will buy natural fertilizers to scatter in her crops of peas, corn and potatoes.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Aida Marlen

texts.es:
la sra. Aida tiene 38 años de edad y se dedica a la producción de café, tiene 5 años de ser productora del mismo, siendo ya una señora con experiencia en la producción de este grano. Aida con esta actividad cubre sus nesecidades básicas y con la misma ayuda a su pareja a cubrir los gastos del hogar, con su pareja han procreado (3) hijos.
La Sra. Aída utilizara el credito para comprar de una planta de energía solar con el motivo de poder gozar de este valioso e importante servicio, desea tener entretenimiento para sus hijos ademas de iluminarse con focos por las noches y asi dejar de usar candiles los cuales son dañinos para la salud de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aida is 38 years old and works in the production of coffee, and is a woman with 5 years experience in the growth of this grain. Aida is able to cover her basic needs with this activity. She helps her partner cover the household expenses. They have three children together.

Aida will use the loan to buy a solar energy panel, with the goal of being able to enjoy this valuable and important service. She wants to have entertainment for her children and to use lights bulbs at night time in order to stop using oil lamps, which are dangerous to the wellbeing of her children.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, de 58 años, se separó de su mujer hace 21 años, pero vive en compañía de sus 3 hijos a los cuales cuida y educa en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). El trabajo que le permitió darle el sustento económico a su familia es el trasporte público. Hace19 años que labora en la empresa de trasporte “Santa Rosa” cubriendo las rutas La Merced-Oxapampa, y según menciona le gusta mucho su trabajo, porque puede conocer nuevos lugares y diferentes personas, ya que a veces cubre las rutas a la ciudad de Pozuzo - La Merced; que es un lugar turístico y muy visitado. Aunque a veces le resulta un poco cansado, él no se rinde, pues según sus propias palabras “todo trabajo tiene su lado bueno y malo”. Por ello todas las mañanas, se levanta convencido que hoy, es un nuevo día. Asimismo obtiene un dinero extra en el alquiler de cuartos, donde tiene inquilinos muy puntuales que le pagan la renta. Ahora con el dinero que pudo ahorrar, piensa comprar un auto nuevo y así tener mayores ingresos que le permitan sacar adelante a sus hijos. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Capelo” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde está segura que podrá salir adelante con la ayuda de su banco comunal, pues le enseñan a proyectarse y ahorrar. Por ello promete ser puntual con sus cuotas. Gerardo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en completar el dinero faltante para la compra de un nuevo auto, con el que pueda trabajar.
texts.en:
Gerardo is 58 years old, separated from his wife 21 years ago, but lives with his 3 children and takes care and counsels them in his own home, in the city of La Merced (Peruvian central jungle). The work, which allows him to support his family financially, is public transport. He has worked the Santa Rosa transport covering the route La Merced-Oxapampa and he goes on to tell us that he likes his work because he gets to know new places and meet different people. Sometimes he covers the routes in the city of Pozuzu-La Merced, which is a much visited tourist area.

Although sometimes he is very tired, he never gives up because in his own words, “all work has its good side and its bad side.” So every morning he gets up thinking that today is a new day.

He also gets extra income from renting rooms and his renters are punctual paying the rent. Now with the money he has saved, he wants to buy a new car in order to increase his earnings so he can provide his children a better opportunity in life.

He is a member of the "Pioneros de Capelo" Comunal Bank and this is his 9th loan with MFP, and he is sure he can go ahead with the help of his Comunal Bank, because they teach him to project forward and to save. He promises to make his payments on time. He will put the money he receives from the loan together with the money he has saved, to buy a new car, which he will use in his job.

loans.use: to complete the payment of the purchase of a car

loans.name: Tania

texts.es: Tania, de 43 años, se separó de su esposo hace dos años; pero a pesar de los problemas y conflictos, ella trabaja con mucho esfuerzo para cuidar de su hija Aime, de 11 años, con quien vive en una casa alquilada ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). La tranquilidad y alegría que muestra, es sinónimo de su fortaleza, pues a pesar de los inconvenientes sufridos, continúa trabajando arduamente. “quiero ser una mujer independiente y con mucha proyección para el futuro”, afirma muy segura. Hace dos años comenzó con el negocio de un locutorio, donde las personas realizan llamadas a diferentes lugares del Perú y del mundo; este negocio le resulta muy rentable, ya que su tienda de servicios está ubicada en una zona estratégica, además ahora, gracias a su perseverancia, abrió el servicio de Internet; donde posee varias computadoras que ayuda a las personas que no tiene Internet en casa, a navegar. Ahora su principal meta es, comprar la parte de inversión de su socia, ya que ella no puso sola el negocio de locutorio e Internet. De esa manera no dependerá de nadie. Está segura que con el apoyo de su hijo Harry, que trabaja en la capital, podrá lograr esté objetivo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Capelo” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente agradecida por todo el apoyo que recibe departe de los integrantes de su banco comunal. Razón por la que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Tania de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de tarjetas telefónicas para realizar sus llamadas. Además en el mantenimiento de las computadoras que posee.
texts.en: Tania, 43 años years old, seperated from her husband two years ago; however, in spite of the problems and conflicts, she works very hard to take care of her daughter Aime,11 years of age, who lives with her in a rented house located in the city of La Merced (central Peruvian rain forest).  The tranquility and joy that she shows is a sign of her strength, since in spite of the difficulties she has suffered, she continues working arduously.  "I want to be an independent woman with lots of possibilities for the future," she affirms with confidence.  Two years ago, she started a phone booth business, where people could make calls to different places in Perú and the world.  This business turned out to be very profitable, since her stO. is located in a strategic zone.  Moreover, now thanks to her perseverance, she opened an Internet service, where she possesses several computers that help people who don't have Internet in their homes, to navegate the web.  Now her main goal is to buy her associate's part of the investment, since she didn't start the phone and Internet business alone.  This way, she will not be dependent on anyone.  She is sure that with the support of her son Harry, who works in the capital, she will be able to achieve this objective.  She belongs to the community bank "Pioneros de Capelo” and this is her eighth loan with MFP, where she feels grateful for all the support that she has received from other community bank members.  For this reason, she promises to be punctual with her payments.  Tania, upon receiving your support, will invest the requested amount in purchasing phone cards to make the calls as well as in the maintenance of the computers she possesses.

loans.use: to purchase phone cards and to provide technical maintenance to her computers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shirts, socks, jeans, and blouses

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
el sr. Víctor Manuel tiene 38 años de edad vive en la comunidad de la Toyosa, Teupasenti; una zona montañosa apta para el cultivo de café, y la misma es su fuente de ingresos.
Don Víctor es padre de (2) hijos y cuenta con más de 16 años de experiencia en el manejo y cultivo de cafe.
Victor utilizara el préstamo para la compra de una planta solar, ya que no cuenta con este servicio básico lo cual es de importancia en todos los hogares. gracias a este sistema el podra contar con iluminacion por medio de focos y asi dejar de usar candelas y candiles que no son nada favorables para la salud. ademas de esto podra cargar su telefono y podra conectar un equipo de sonido para escuchar noticias y musica durante el dia.
texts.en:
Víctor Manuel is 38 and lives in the community of La Toyosa, Teupasenti, a mountainous region that is suitable for growing coffee, which is his source of income.

Víctor is the father of 2 children and has more than 16 years of experience managing and growing coffee.

Víctor will use the loan to buy a solar plant, since he doesn't have this basic service that is important in all the homes.  Thanks to this system he will be able to have lighting by means of light bulbs and stop using candles and oil lamps, which are not at all healthy.  He will also be able to charge his telephone and connect a sound system to listen to the news and music during the day.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy plant.

loans.name: Maria De Los Santos

texts.es:
la sra. Maria de los Santos tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitacion, ademas de esto se dedica al cultivo de cafe, tiene 7 años de dedicarse a dicha actividad productiva, la cual es su mayor fuente de ingreso que percibe anualmente, de esto cubre sus compromisos.
Maria de los Santos vive con su esposo y tiene tres hijos que le ayudan con la produccion del cafe.
La Sra. Maria utilizara el credito para la compra de una planta solar la cual esta necesitando para poder  gozar de las ventajas de este servicio de energía, asi mismo podra poner luz en su pulperia y poder antender a sus clientes durante mas tiempo por las noches.
texts.en:
María de los Santos has a small general store that she runs out of her home.  Besides this, she grows coffee. She has been growing it for 7 years, and it is her greatest source of annual income. From it, she covers her commitments. 

María de los Santos lives with her husband and has three children, who help her with coffee production.  

María will use the loan to buy a solar-powered electrical plant, which she needs in order to be able to enjoy the advantages of having electricity. As well, she will be able to have lighting in her general store, and be able to wait on her customers for more time during the evenings.

loans.use: To buy a solar-powered electrical plant.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina, vive con su familia conformada por su esposo y tres hijos D. 16, 8 y 2 años D. edad, ella se dedica a la venta D. fruta y verduras, negocio que tiene en el mercado municipal, trabaja todos los días D. lunes a domingo.
Ella por el momento necesita comprar tomates, güisquil, repollo, papas, esta compra la realizara a través D. un préstamo, el cual permitirá tener a disposición D. los clientes verduras frescas.
Sus aspiraciones son: el fortalecimiento del negocio, y el apoyo a sus hijos en los estudios mejorando la calidad D. vida D. ellos.
texts.en:
Reina lives with her family, maD. up of her husband and three children ages 16, 8 and 2. She sells fruits and vegetables in the town market. She works every day, Monday to Sunday. 

At this time, she needs to buy tomatoes, chayote [a squash], cabbage and potatoes. She will use the loan to make this purchase, which will allow her to have fresh vegetables at her customer's disposal. 

Her dreams are strengthening her business, supporting her children in their studies and improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, chayote, cabbage and potatoes for her business.

loans.name: Julieta Rosmery

texts.es: La señora Julieta y su esposo trabajan como costureros en el taller de vestidos de su hermana patricia. Viven en la zona de Pampahasi bajo que esta ubicado a veinte minutos al este de la ciudad de La Paz. Tienen dos hijos en edad escolar. Trabajan ambos como costureros pero laS Sra. Julieta compra los vestidos del taller de su hermana y los vende en las ferias de las mañaneras y también en la ciudad de Oruro, donde viaja los días de feria. Actualmente viven en un departamento en anticrético pero uno de sus mayores anhelos es comprar una casita propia. Ella es cliente antigua de Emprender y en todo el tiempo siempre ha demostrado ser responsable y puntual con sus pagos. En esta oportunidad solicita el préstamo de dinero para el aumento de mercadería de vestidos de gasa y sacos para niñas de tela polar por época de frío, ya que le hicieron ya pedidos y tiene que llevar a entregar en la ciudad de Oruro.
texts.en:
Julieta and her husband work as tailors in her sister Patricia's dressmaking shop. They live in the zone of Lower Pampahasi which is 20 minutes to the east of the city of La Paz. They have two school-aged children. They both work as tailors but Julieta buys dresses from her sister's workshop and sells them in the morning markets and also in the city of Oruro where she travels on market days. 

Currently they live in an apartment through a loan system known as anticretico, but one of her greatest wishes is to buy her own house. She is an old client of Emprender  and has always proven herself responsible and punctual in her payments. On this occasion she requests a loan to increase her stock of chiffon dresses and girls' polar fleece jackets for winter, since she has already had orders placed and needs to deliver them in Oruro.

loans.use: to buy chiffon dresses.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 33 años, es una mujer alegre. Convive desde hace 11 años con Sajid, su esposo. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Erick y Joel, a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana).   Para su futuro y desarrollo, está talentosa mujer abrió una lavandería desde hace 8 años. Donde hace servicio de lavado, secado y planchado de diversas prendas de vestir; de lunes a sábado junto a su sobrina, trabajan arduamente para poder obtener cada día mejores ganancias. “Esa es mi meta”, afirma Carmen, pues a pesar de que existen días donde no tiene mucha clientela, ella no se desanima, según cuenta obtiene una ganancia diaria de S/. 160 nuevos soles, donde tiene que invertir en el pago a su personal, pues el tiempo de entrega es lo más importante para ella. Además de recibir el apoyo económico de su esposo que trabaja como administrador de 2 canales de televisión, donde incorpora publicidad local, además de realizar él mismo las ediciones y grabaciones de los videos a ser publicitados. Ahora que tiene mayores ingresos, desea mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de sus hijos, por ello su primordial meta es arreglar la infraestructura de su casa. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Capelo” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo financiero de todos ustedes, para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.  Carmen cada 6 meses arregla las máquinas que posee para el lavado; por ello de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en pagar el mantenimiento de las mismas, con el cambio de motor y bomba de agua.
texts.en:
Carmen, 33, is a happy woman. For 11 years she has lived with her husband, Sajid. Together they have 2 sons, Erick and Joel, whom they take care of in their own home in the city of La Merced in the central forest of Peru. With her future and development in mind, this talented woman opened a laundromat  8 years ago where she offers washing, drying and ironing services for different garments. She works Monday to Saturday along with her niece. They work hard in order to earn more money each day - "this is my goal," says Carmen. Even though there are days when she doesn't have a lot of customers, she doesn't let it get her down. According to her accounts she earns 160 nuevos soles a day, which she uses to pay her staff, since delivery time is the most important. She also gets financial support from her husband who works as a manager of 2 television channels where he incorporates local ads and also does editing and taping himself. Now that she has more income, she wants to improve the quality of life for herself and her children. Her top priority is to make improvements to the house. 

She belongs to the village bank "Pioneros de Capelo" and this is her first loan from MFP. She hopes to have all of her financial support in order to meet her objectives. She promises to make her payments punctually. Every 6 months Carmen fixes her washing machines. She will invest the requested loan in paying for maintenance, changing the motor and the water pump.

loans.use: to buy a new motor and water pump.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires and new headlights for his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy thread.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan, se dedica al comercio de mercería, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 32 años de edad, él inicio el negocio por necesidad, lo aprendió desde hace 16 años, sale a vender desde las 6:00am y regresa a las 6:00pm, o dependiendo de la zona que visite, porque viaja por distintos pueblos aledaños al lugar donde vive.
Actualmente comprara mercadería, prendedores, collares, artículos plásticos, para ofrecer a los clientes, esta inversión le ayudara para crecer con la mercadería.
Su propósito es velar por el sustento de su familia, trabajando diariamente para cubrir todas las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Juan works in haberdashery. He lives with his wife and son who is 32 years old. He started the business out of necessity, learned from 16 years ago. He goes out to sell at 6:00 a.m. and comes home at 6:00 p.m. depending on the area he is working in as he travels through to different towns in the area surrounding where he lives. 

Currently he will buy haberdashery items: pins, necklaces, plastic items to offer his customers. This investment will help him grow his inventory.

His purpose is to ensure the livelihood of his family, working daily to meet all the household needs.

loans.use: to buy haberdashery items: pins, necklaces and plastic items.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro, de 58 años, es un hombre dichoso, pues convive con Olivia, su esposa. Ambos tienen 2 hijos mayores e independientes. Ahora viven solos su casa propia ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). La fuerza y seriedad que proyecta, son los pilares para su progreso. Pues desde muy joven comenzó a forjarse un destino para él y su familia. Es por eso que todas las mañanas desde hace 22 años, el restaurante del señor Pedro; ubicado en el mercado de la ciudad, en un lugar céntrico. Abre sus puertas para deleitarnos con los ricos platos criollos y típicos del lugar, pues según afirma, su esposa; la señora Olivia, tiene una exquisita sazón. La dedicación por sus hijos lo motivó a salir adelante y continuar trabajando con mucho ahínco.  Aunque ya no los tiene a su lado, él está orgulloso de verlos salir adelante y ser independientes, por todo ello está planeando invertir en el negocio de arrendamiento de cuartos; con ello espera seguir trabajando para mantenerse activo y vivir por muchos años, en compañía de sus hijos y nietos, que es su principal incentivo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Capelo” y este es el décimo crédito con MFP, donde se caracteriza por ser una persona responsable y muy cumplida, pues es secretario de su banco comunal. Pedro de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de calaminas que mejorarán la infraestructura de su negocio.
texts.en:
Pedro, 58, is a cheerful man who lives with his wife, Olivia.  They have two adult children who live independently.  The couple lives in their own house in the city of La Merced (Peruvian central forest).  The strength and seriousness that he projects are the pillars of his progress.  From a very early age he began carving out his and his family's future.  Every day for 22 years Pedro's restaurant, which is located in the city market, has opened its doors to offer delicious creole and typical local dishes.  According to his wife, Olivia, they have a wonderful flavor.  

His dedication to his children is what encouraged him to get ahead and continue working so hard.  Even though they are no longer living with him, he is very proud to see how they have progressed and become independent.  Therefore he is planning to invest in a room rental business.  He hopes to be able to continue working to stay active and live a long time with his children and grandchildren, his main incentive. He belongs to the communal bank "Pioneros de Capelo" and this is his tenth loan through MFP.  He is known there as a very responsible, committed person and acts as secretary of the communal bank.  Pedro plans to use the loan to buy corrugated iron to improve his businesses infrastructure.

loans.use: To buy corrugated iron for his food stall.

loans.name: Eder

texts.es: Eder D. 47 años D. edad es un hombre casado que tiene 2 hijos en las edades D. 15 y 20 años D. edad. Su negocio consiste en L. elaboración D. comidas rápidas y se ubica en un espacio al frente D. su vivienda donD. todos los fines D. semana y también en las poblaciones del municipio del departamento del Atlántico donD. haya festividades. Su idea D. negocio surgió porque se encontraba sin empleo formal y decidió su propia aventura D. ingresos independientes, con el cual ha logrado genera los principales recursos para el sostenimiento D. su hogar. Su meta más adelante es tener un local propio y un vehículo para trasportarse a todos los municipios y D. fiesta en fiesta, pero su mayor desafío es su capital D. trabajo, que no es suficiente para lograr sus sueños, por eso trabaja persistentemente para lograr  aumentar su capital D. trabajo, esta es L. razón por L. cual acuD. a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a L. Fundación Maro Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará insumos en mayor volumen y en el mantenimiento D. sus herramientas y equipo D. trabajo.
texts.en:
Eder is a 47-year-old married man with two children, ages 15 and 20. His business involves making fast food and is located in a space in front of his home where he sells every weekend. He also sells to the city residents in the Department of Atlántico where festivals are held. This idea got started because he did not have a formal job, so Eder decided to establish his own business venture so that he could generate an income independently. This has become the main source of income by which he is able to sustain his household. His goal later on is to have his own shop and a vehicle for traveling to all the towns and from festival to festival. However, his greatest challenge is the lack of operating capital to pursue his dreams. He has worked persistently in an attempt to increase his operating capital.

For this reason he is applying for a Kiva loan, his first form of financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use the money to buy supplies in bulk and pay for the maintenance of his work equipment.

loans.use: to purchase supplies in bulk and to pay for the maintenance of his work equipment.

loans.name: Maria Cleofe

texts.es:
María, es madre soltera vive con uno de sus hijos tiene 28 años de edad y estudia agronomía,  María posee una tienda y vende tortillas, desde hace 13 años se dedica a este oficio y lo atiende de 7:00am a 9:00pm, este negocio surgió por iniciativa propia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para surtir el negocio,  comprando jugos, sodas, galletas, detergentes, dulces, para mejorar el inventario del negocio, atendiendo mejor a los clientes
El sueño de  María algún día comprar su propia casa, donde vivir tranquilamente con su hijo.
texts.en:
María is a single mother who lives with one of her children who is 28 and studies agronomy.  María runs a store and sells tortillas.  She set it up on her own initiative and has been in business for 13 years, working from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.  

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as juices, sodas, cookies, detergents, and sweets to improve her store's inventory so she can serve her customers better.

María's dream is to buy her own house where she can live peacefully with her son.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as juices, sodas, cookies, detergents, and sweets for her business.

loans.name: Jorge  Lucrecio

texts.es: El joven Jorge  recién esta conformando un hogar, la actividad que el realiza es de confección de ropa a contrato solo pedidos de confección de ropa deportiva, esto por la falta de capital para lo cual el solicita el préstamo  el cual invertirá en la compra de una maquina cortadora y telas para realizar su negocio y así independizarse, el señor Jorge vive en una casa familiar que le pertenece a su tío, su principal sueño es establecer su taller y ahorrar para un anticrético para su casa, es una persona muy emprendedora, le guata su trabajo y desea tener una familia muy unida su pareja es quien le ayuda en la confección de ropa deportiva. En la foto el señor Jorge esta junto a su pareja que trabaja con el en su taller.
texts.en: Jorge is a young man who is setting up his family life.  He has a sewing business and makes sports clothing on an order contract basis.  Because of a lack of capital he is requesting a loan to buy a cutting machine and fabric so he can become independent.  Jorge lives in a house that belongs to his uncle.  His main goal is to establish his own sewing shop and save for his own house.  He is an entrepreneur who enjoys what he does and wants to have a close-knit family.  His partner helps him make the sports clothing.  Jorge is pictured with his partner in the work area.

loans.use: To buy a cutting machine and fabric.

loans.name: Azogueñitas (Azogues) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Azogueñitas está formado por 9 señoras quienes son amigas y muy amables, laboran en distintas actividades las mismas que les permiten aportar a la  economía de sus hogares. Viven en la vecina ciudad de Azogues (Provincia del Azuay), ciudad que por su estructura arquitectónica la hace especial, su gente es amable, culta y mantienen las tradiciones de sus padres. Su gastronomía es muy variada y cautiva el paladar de sus visitantes.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Señora. María Transito, vive por la ciudad de Azogues y en el banco comunal se encuentra hace 4 años.

Tiene 49 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 29, 24, 23, 16 y 11 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado e independiente, su segundo hijo trabaja  para sus gastos, su tercera hija le ayuda en su negocio, su penúltima hija está estudiando en el colegio y su ultimo hijo está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión latonero (arreglo de latas de vehículos) y labora en su propio taller, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña María Transito labora en la atención de su tienda la misma que tiene hace 12 años, trabaja en ella sin horario. También se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de las marcas Yanbal y Lbel, lleva 10 años en esta actividad.
  
El dinero de su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda.

Su meta es tener una tienda mas grande.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Azogueñitas" is comprised of nine women, all friends who work in different businesses which allows them to contribute to their household economy.  They live in the city of Azogues (Azuay Province) which is a special city because of its arquitecture and kind people who maintain their forefathers' traditions.  They have a varied gastronomy which captivates visitors.

One of the members of the group is Mrs. María Transito who lives in the city of Azogues.  She has been in the communal bank for four years.  She is 49, married and has five children, ages 29, 24, 23, 16 and 11.  Her eldest son is married and independent.  Her second son works to cover his own expenses, her third daughter helps with the business, the next to youngest daughter is in high school and the youngest son is in the local school.  Her husband is a metal worker (repairs vehicles) and has his own workshop located in their house.

María Transito has been running her own store for 12 years and has no particular working hours.  She also sells Yanbal and Lbel cosmetics, which she has been doing for ten years.

She plans to use the loan to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausage and other basic products for her store.  Her goal is to have a larger establishment one day.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oils, detergents, sausage and other basic products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy different colored yarn.

loans.name: Carmen Isidora

texts.es:
Carmen, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 8 años de edad, ella vive con sus padres y hermanos, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, desde hace un año está en el negocio, vende de 7:00am a 2:00pm, sus clientes son vecinos del lugar, este negocio surgió por la necesidades que pasan sus hijos, y que dependen únicamente de ella.
Por el momento comprara maíz y leña, para la elaboración de las tortillas, con esta compra espera tener para un buen tiempo los materiales necesarios y conseguirlos a un mejor precio.
El objetivo de Carmen es mantenerse siempre en el negocio, contar con clientes, para que a su hogar no le falte nada, también quiere ayudar a sus hijos para que estudien.
texts.en:
Carmen is a single mother with two children aged five and eight. She lives with her parents and siblings. One year ago, she started up a business selling tortillas. She sells tortillas from 7a.m. to 2p.m and her customers are local people.  She started this venture to cater for the needs of her children, who depend on her alone.

Currently she wants to buy corn and firewood for making tortillas. With this loan, she hopes to stock up with the materials she needs for some time to come, and to obtain them at a better price.

Carmen's aim is to keep her business going and to count on her customers, so that she can provide for the needs of her household. She also wants to help her children to be able to study.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood for making tortillas.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.es: Virgilio, de 62 años es un hombre trabajador. Convive con María desde hace 30 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo vive con una; Vidya, que es su razón de progreso y triunfo. En unión familiar viven en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). A pesar de su avanzada edad, él continúa trabajando para concretar sus planes y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Es por ello que hace 2 años, invirtió todos sus ahorros en poner una peluquería. Le va muy bien en su nuevo negocio, pues buscó un lugar céntrico y muy concurrido por las personas de la localidad, que felices visitan su establecimiento para realizarse cortes, ondulaciones, teñidos de cabello y peinados para toda ocasión. Lo peculiar de Virgilio, es que trabaja solo, sin el apoyo de nadie. Y según cuenta puede abastecer la demanda que tiene, ya que trata a sus clientes, como su familia. Ellos lo esperan con paciencia, pues saben del buen trabajo que realiza. Es por eso que para el futuro, desea poco a poco implementar su negocio con una infraestructura moderna, para ello comenzó a trabajar con el banco comunal que le recomendaron, donde está seguro podrá concretar su objetivo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Capelo” y este es el primer crédito con MFP; donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes, además promete ser puntual con le pago de sus cuotas. Virgilio de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una secadora para seguir trabajando, además de la mejora de su piso con un material más fino, así podrá resaltar la infraestructura de su salón de belleza.
texts.en:
Virgilio, who is 62 years old, is a hard worker. He has lived together with Maria for the last 30 years. They have four children, but only Vidya lives with them, and she is their reason for striving to make progress in their lives. They live as a family unit in the city of La Merced (in the central Peruvian jungle). 

Despite his age, Virgilio is still working on implementing his plans and improving his family's quality of life. That is why, two years ago, he invested all his savings in a  hairdressing salon. His new business is going very well, as he found a busy central location for the salon, where it is easy for locals to come for haircuts, perms, hair coloring and hairdos for any occasion.  

The unusual thing about Virgilio is that he works alone without anyone's help. He says that he is able to keep up with the demand, as he has clients, such as his family, who wait patiently, knowing that he does a good job. That's why in the future, he would like to gradually modernize the infrastructure of his business. 

In order to start this process, he has begun working with the recommended community bank, where he is sure he will be able to realize his objective. He belongs to the "Pioneros de Capelo" community bank, and this is his first loan with Kiva Field Partner, MFP. He is relying on your help and he promises to make punctual repayments on the loan. Virgilio will invest the requested money in the purchase of a hairdryer, as well as a better quality floor for the salon, thus improving its infrastructure.

loans.use: to buy a hairdryer and materials to improve the infrastructure of his business.

loans.name: Ingrid

texts.es: La señora Ingrid  y su esposo Emilio son clientes antiguos de emprender. La Sra. Ingrid se dedica a la venta de comida la zona de villa Copacabana y el Sr. Emilio es dueño de un pequeño taller de reparación de equipos electrónicos en la zona de bajo san Antonio. Durante todo el tiempo que trabajan con nuestra institución siempre demostraron ser puntuales y responsables con sus créditos, la Sra. Ingrid vende comida tradicional de Bolivia como ser fricase y chicharrón de cerdo, también milanesas de res y pollo y sajta de pollo,  solo atiende  su pensión el fin de semana, pero aún así tiene varios clientes que vienen a comer cada semana sin falta, el Sr. emilio tiene su taller en la casa de sus padres y debido a su experiencia y buen servicio siempre tiene varios clientes. En esta oportunidad ellos solicitan el préstamo de dinero para la compra de un juego de dormitorio para su departamento, y de esta manera tener comodidad y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ingrid  and her husband Emilio are longtime clients of Emprender. Ingrid sells food in the area of Villa Copacabana and Mr. Emilio is an owner of a small workshop where he repairs electronic equipment in the area of Bajo San Antonio. The whole time they have worked with our institution they have always shown themselves to be punctual and responsible with their loans. Ingrid sells Bolivian traditional food such as fricasee and pork chicharones, as well as beef Milanese and chicken Sajta. She only works in her restaurant on weekends, but even so, she has a lot of customers  who come to eat every weekend without fail. Emilio has his workshop in his parents' house and with his experience and good service, he always has a lot of customers. At this time, they are asking for the loan to buy a bedroom set for their apartment. In this way they will be comfortable and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a bedroom set.

loans.name: Santos Margarito

texts.es:
El señor Santos Margarito es casado, tiene 52 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 8 hijos de los cuales todos estudian, trabaja en la elaboración de sandalias para niñas, señoritas y señoras, lleva 15 años de experiencia en este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien es comerciante en la venta de sandalias.

Solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de materiales para calzado y así producir más: forros, pieles, conos, adornos, etc. Espera en el futuro ver su negocio más grande.
texts.en:
Santos Margarito is married and 52 years old. He has 3 years of primary education and has 8 children, all of whom are in school. He makes sandals for girls and women. He has done this work for 15 years and has his wife's support. She sells sandals.    

Asking for a loan will help him buy materials for making shoes and produce more: covers, hides, cones, ornaments, etc. In the future, he hopes to grow his business.

loans.use: to buy materials for working with leather.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel, vive con su esposa y dos hijas de 17 y 15 años de edad, ambas estudian y dependen de él, Miguel se dedica a la sastrería y administra una tienda, aprendió la sastrería por un amigo desde hace 17 años, inicia sus labores desde las 7:00am hasta las 5:00pm, de lunes a sábado.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de tela, hilo, botones, broches, ciper, para la sastrería, pues son materiales que forman parte de la materia prima en su taller, esta compra le ayudara para atender mejor a los clientes.
El objetivo de Miguel es tener un taller capaz para atender la demanda de los clientes y apoyar a su familia, sobre todo a sus hijas para superarse.
texts.en:
Miguel lives with his wife and two daughters aged 17 and 15 years old.  Both of his daughters are in school and dependent on him.  Michael is a tailor and runs a store.  He learned this business through a friend 17 years ago.  He works from 7.00am to 5.00pm, from Monday to Saturday.

Miguel is requesting a loan to buy fabric, thread, buttons, fasteners and zippers for his tailoring business as these are the raw materials that he uses in his workshop.  This purchase will help him to better serve his customers.

Miguel's goal is to have a workshop which is able to meet customer demand and allows him to support his family, above all his daughters, so that they can do well in life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, fasteners and zippers

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es: Pascual, de 58 años, es un asombroso padre soltero de 2 hijos: Elías y Elizabeth. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). Las manos prodigiosas de este talentoso hombre le enseñaron a depender hace 6 años, de lo que hoy es su mejor pasatiempo y distracción “la sastrería”, ahí confecciona prendas de vestir, además de hacer composturas, teñidos, planchados, y demás servicios que brinda en su propio taller, ubicado en una zona estratégica de la ciudad. Lo que más le gusta a este talentoso hombre, es poder crear sus propias prendas de vestir, pues según afirma, “es una diversión”. Ya tiene varios clientes, que lo buscan para realizar arreglos en las prendas que compran; ya que Pascual los realiza a su medida y gusto. Por ello más adelante está pensando, acondicionar su taller con una pequeña tienda de venta de ropa que él mismo confeccionará. Sabe que es un camino largo, pero está seguro que lo logrará. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Capelo” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde desea seguir trabajando conjuntamente con sus integrantes y de esa manera lograr sus objetivos. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Pascual de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de prendas como: hilos de diferentes colores y texturas, botones, ganchos y telas.
texts.en:
Pascual is 58 years old and an amazing single father of two children, Elías and Elizabeth. He and his family live in their own home in the city of La Merced in the central Peruvian jungle. This talented man has relied on the use of his hands for six years, making use of his time as a tailor, even though he considers this more of a hobby. Pascual produces clothing, but he also mends, dyes, and irons garments and provides other services from his workshop. His business is located in a strategic area of the city. What he enjoys most is being able to create his own clothing designs because he says “it’s fun”. Pascual says he has many customers who need alterations performed on the clothing they purchased, but he also makes original designs according to their preferences and tastes. Going forward, he plans to remodel his workshop and add a small clothing store where he can sell what he makes. Pascual knows that it will be a long road, but he is confident of achieving his goal.

He is a member of the Communal Bank “Pioneros de Capelo” (Pioneers of Capelo) and this is his third loan with MFP. Pascual wants to continue working with the other members so that they can reach their objectives. For this reason, he promises to submit his payments on time. With the support he will receive, Pascual will invest the money he requested in the purchase of supplies for making clothes such as thread in different colors and textures, buttons, safety pins, and fabrics.

loans.use: to buy thread, buttons, safety pins, and fabrics.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo, de 23 años es un joven padre de familia. Convive desde hace 4 años con Miguelina, su esposa. Ambos tienen una hija: Medaly de 2 años; a la que cuidan y educan en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Casacoto. Responsable, honesto y trabajador, así describimos a Eduardo; un hombre valiente que lucha para salir adelante. Según cuenta, el año pasado estuvo radicando en la ciudad de Lima por problemas familiares; ya que su madre murió producto de una enfermedad. Durante ese tiempo, trabajó como cobrador en un ómnibus; donde obtenía el dinero que requería los gastos familiares y de hospitalización de su madre. A pesar de sus esfuerzos, tubo que regresas de la capital, resignado. Ahora él comenzó a seguir su camino, junto a su familia en la sierra del país, donde regresa al campo sembrando papa de toda variedad, además de los toros que le ayudan en el arado de la tierra y varias cabezas de ganado ovino, que enseba para luego venderlo a mayor precio. Ya tiene 2 años de experiencia en la agricultura y aunque sabe que le falta mucho camino por recorrer, sigue con la vitalidad y fuerzas de siempre. Ahora desea ahorrar lo necesario para comprar sus propios terrenos productivos, pues alquila e invierte en el arriendo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Eduardo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias cabezas de ganado ovino para continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a young father who is 23 years of age. He has lived with his wife Miguelina for the past four years. They have a two-year-old daughter named Medaly who they teach and care for in their own home in the village of Casacoto. Responsible, honest, and hardworking are words that describe Eduardo. He is valiant gentleman who strives to get ahead. Eduardo spent the last year in the city of Lima because of family problems and then his mother passed away as a result of illness. During that time, he worked as a bus fare collector. Any money that he earned was used to pay for the required household expenses and his mother’s hospitalization. Despite all of his efforts, he returned home from Lima dejected. Now he has started along a new path with his family in the mountains of Peru. Eduardo has returned to planting potatoes of all varieties. He also has bulls to help plow the land, as well as several heads of sheep that will be fattened and sold later for a good price. Eduardo already has two years of experience as a farmer, but he knows that he still has a long way to go. He continues to press forward with strength and vitality. At the moment, he is saving up the necessary funds so that he can buy his own farmland that he can make available for lease.

Eduardo is a member of the Communal Bank “Miraflores de Casacoto” and this is his third loan with MFP. He hopes to receive everyone’s support so that he can continue with his goals. In addition, he promises to submit his payments on time. With the support he will receive, Eduardo will invest the money he requested in the purchase of several heads of sheep so that he can continue his business.

loans.use: to buy several heads of sheep.

loans.name: Jorge Alfredo

texts.es:
Jorge, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, tiene un taller de electrónica desde hace dos años, aprendió a través del estudio y hoy día realiza su trabajo para sostener su hogar, repara todo tipo de electrodomésticos como refrigeradoras, cocinas, planchas, horno microondas.
Él nuevamente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de repuestos para el taller, espera con la compra tener lo necesario para finalizar los trabajos pendiente y tener para próximos que puedan llegar.
El taller le ha dado a Jorge mucho, por esta razón el invierte en su mantenimiento, comprando los repuestos necesarios para mejorar el servicio.
texts.en:
Jorge lives with his wife and children. He has an electronics repair shop that he has managed for two years. Jorge learned this trade through study and now engages in this line of work to maintain his household. He repairs all types of appliances such as refrigerators, stoves, irons, and microwave ovens.

Jorge is requesting another loan so that he can buy spare parts for his repair shop. He hopes to buy what he needs to complete his outstanding jobs and any other jobs that he has yet to receive. His business has provided much for him, so he wants to invest in order to maintain it by purchasing necessary parts to improve his service.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts to restock his repair shop.

loans.name: Jorge Felipe

texts.es: El señor Jorge se dedica al transporte de pasajeros en el área urbana de nuestra ciudad trabaja como transportista  (taxi libre), se dedica a esta actividad hace  3 años,  es soltero trabaja para sustentarse; su domicilio es en alquiler  que se encuentra a la altura del km 6,  el préstamo que solicita es para realizar mantenimiento y reparación a su vehículo el cual es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Señor Jorge works in passenger transport in the urban area of our city. He works as a taxi driver (metered taxi) and has been doing this job for the last 3 years. He is single and works to support himself. He lives in rented accomodation at an altitude of 6km. The loan he is asking for is for the maintenance and repair of his vehicle which is his only source of income.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance and repair of his car

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
La señora Rosa Maria es casada, tiene 42 años de edad, cursó 2 años de educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos 1 de los cuales está estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría, inició este trabajo por la enseñanza que le dieron sus padres y hasta ahora lleva 12 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo..

Decide solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para ampliar su capital de trabajo ya que va a comprar hilos de diferentes clase y colores, en el futro desea ver su negocio y producción mayor de lo que ahora es.
texts.en:
Señora Rosa Maria is married, and 42 years old.  She attended two years of primary education, and has four children, one of whom is attending school.

She works doing weaving.  She started this work as her parents taught her to do it, and has twelve years of experience.  She has the assistance of her husband, who does the same work.

She decided to request a loan that she will use to increase her working capital, as she will buy different grades and colors of yarn.

In the future, she wants to see her business and production become greater than they are today.

loans.use: to buy yarn for weaving.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel, de 36 años es una mujer luchadora; hace tan solo 3 años que se separó de su esposo; pero como una madre responsable cuida de sus 2 hijos: Kainer y Rocío. Desde entonces se convirtieron en una familia muy unida, que viven en casa de su madre, ubicada en la localidad de Casacoto. Cuando vivía, con su esposo ella tenía un pequeño puesto en el mercado central de la ciudad de Tarma; ahí vendía verduras a los pobladores que visitaban el mercado; pero como la inestabilidad económica llegó a su hogar, producto de su separación. Ella decide dedicarse a la agricultura; es así que con el apoyo de su madre, se establece en el pueblo, donde comienza a sembrar papa y maíz, sus productos son muy buenos y en cada cosecha que obtiene, puede ver sus esfuerzos plasmados. Además viaja constantemente a la capital del país, donde negocia su producción a buen precio. Pero como trabajadora incansable, ella vende hamburguesa, en la esquina de su casa los sábados y domingos por la noche. Así cada día agradece a Dios por el apoyo que le brinda y desea seguir sembrando, para ganar más experiencia. Pues su principal meta es sacar a sus hijos adelante y a pesar que tiene una enfermedad en el ojo; no se desanima. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está  feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal, ya que las personas son emprendedoras, que triunfan a pesar de las dificultades. Asimismo promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Maribel de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa de la variedad “canchan” y “única”. Asimismo surtirá su tienda de comestibles.
texts.en:
36-year-old Maribel is a tenacious woman.  Just three years ago she separated from her husband but she is a responsible mother and still cares for her two children: Kainer and Rocío.  Since the separation, they have become a very united family.  They live in her mother's house which is located in the town of Casacoto.  When she lived with her husband, Maribel had a small stall in Tarma central market.  There she sold vegetables to the local people who visited the market.  However, financial instability reached her household as a result of her separation and Maribel decided to start working in agriculture.  With the support of her mother, she set herself up in the village and started growing potatoes and corn.  Her produce is very good quality and, with every harvest that she obtains, she can see her efforts rewarded.  Maribel travels constantly to the capital city where she negotiates the sale of her produce for a good price.  

As the tireless hard worker that she is, Maribel also sells hamburgers on the corner outside her home on Saturday and Sunday evenings.  Every day she thanks God for the support that he gives her.  She would like to continue growing crops in order to gain more experience.  Her main goal is to get her children ahead in life and, in spite of the fact that she has an illness in her eye, she does not lose heart.

Maribel is a member of the 'Miraflores de Casacoto' community bank and this is her second loan from MFP.  She is happy to be a member of her community bank because the people are entrepreneurs and they succeed in spite of difficulties.  Maribel pledges to be punctual in making her loan repayments.  With your support, she will invest the money she has requested in buying several sacks of natural fertilizers to spread over her potato crops (she grows 'canchan' and 'única' varieties).  She will also stock her food store.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers and supplies for making food

loans.name: Jenny Wendy

texts.es: La señora Jenny tiene un taller  de confección  de edredones, en la casa de su suegra que es donde vive  junto con su esposo y sus dos hijos de los cuales el mayor esta en la escuela,  ella hasta la fecha trabaja con pequeños contratos, ella necesita el capital para comprar tela al por mayor e independizarse y ser confeccionista directa de edredones y sabanas para así comercializar sus productos directamente con los mayoristas, el negocio es de la señora y uno de sus sueños es agrandar el taller y tener operarios, para lograr ahorrar y así comprarse su casa propia, ella realiza edredones por mayor entrega a distintas ferias  de la ciudad del la Paz y el Alto, es muy conocida por la calidad en su trabajo, ya que siempre cuida de los detalle al momento de confeccionar sus productos una persona muy trabajadora.
texts.en:
Señora Jenny has a workshop making quilts in her mother-in-law's home.  This is where she lives with her husband and their two children, the older of whom attends school.

Up till now, she has worked with small contracts.  She needs the capital to buy fabric at wholesale and to become financially independent, as she will be able to become a direct manufacturer of quilts and sheets, and so market her products directly to wholesalers.

The business belongs to the Señora, and one of her dreams is to grow her workshop and hire people, so that she can save money and so buy her own home.

She makes quilts for selling at the various festivals of the cities La Paz and El Alto.  She is very well-known for the quality of her work, and always pays attention to the details when she is making her products.  She is a very hard-working woman.

loans.use: to buy fabric for making quilts.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
El señor Jose Luis es casado, tiene 31 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cuales está estudiando, se dedica a la carpintería, a la elaboración de todo tipo de muebles, roperos, camas, estanterías, etc., inició este trabajo como trabajo y hasta ahora lleva 12 años de experiencia.

Decide solicitar un prestamos que le servirá para la compra de madera ya que su negocio tiene demanda y espera producir más, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a oficio domésticos. En el futuro espera tener su negocio grandes y con mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Señor Jose Luis is 31 years old and has 3 years of primary education. He is married and has 2 children, one of which is studying. He works as a carpenter, making all kinds of furniture: wardrobes, beds, shelves etc. He started doing this work as a job and now has 12 years experience in the business. 

He decided to ask for a loan to allow him to buy wood as what he produces is in demand and he expects to produce more. He can count on the support of his wife who is a domestic worker. In the future he hopes for a bigger business with larger prrofits.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 42 años es una mujer alegre y con mucho liderazgo. Ella se separó de su esposo hace 12 años. Con él tuvo 2 maravillosas hijas: Elisa y Libia a las que quiere y educa en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Casacoto. Sus hijas son su mayor orgullo, ella trabajó muy duro en el tiempo que se separó de su esposo. Ello le permitió pagar los estudios universitarios de ellas. Ahora está contenta, ya que falta poco para tener una futura Química Farmacéutica e Ingeniera de Sistemas. Todo este logro lo realiza gracias a la agricultura y su profesión de enfermera. Ya que trabaja en la capital del país en un hospital, donde cuida a enfermos y les da la fortaleza para su curación. Asimismo cada 15 días viaja al pueblo a ver sus sembríos de papa, habas y maíz, los que gracias al cuidado y atención de su socia, puede mantenerlos. Según cuenta ella pone el terreno agrícola, mientras su socia, compra los fertilizantes y semilla; pero cada vez que ella visita sus sembríos siempre los cuida y brinda los nutrientes que requiere la tierra. Ya que sabe que de ello depende su ganancia, a pesar de estar lejos tiene buenos clientes en el mercado mayorista de su localidad, donde vende cada cosecha. Ahora su meta es sembrar en mayor cantidad  y sabe que lo logrará pues comenzó a trabajar en su banco comunal. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Rosa de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales, ya que planea sembrar papa en la localidad de Huasahuasi.
texts.en:
Rosa, aged 42, is a happy woman with great leadership abilities.  She has been separated from her husband for the last 12 years.  She has two wonderful daughters with him, Elisa and Libia, whom she loves and educates in her own home, located in the Casacoto area.  Her daughters are her biggest pride.

She has worked very hard in the time she has been separated from her husband, which has allowed her to pay for a university education for her daughters.  She is pleased, as they are close to having futures as a Pharmaceutical Chemist, and a Systems Engineer.

All of this has been achieved by her thanks to farming and her nursing profession.  She works in the country's capital in a hospital, where she looks after the sick and gives them strength for their recovery.  At the same time, she travels every two weeks to her village, to see her crops of potatoes, lima beans, and corn.  Each time that she visits her crops, she tends to them and provides the nutrients that the land requires, as she knows that her earnings depend on it.  In spite of being far away, she has good customers in the wholesale market in her area where she sells each harvest.

Now her goal is to grow a greater quantity, which she knows she can achieve, so she has started to work with a communal bank.  She belongs to the communal bank "Miraflores de Casacoto", and this is her first loan with MFP. She is hoping for a small loan to achieve her objectives.  She also promises to be punctual with her repayments.

On receiving the assistance, Rosa will invest the requested money in purchasing natural fertilizer, as she plans to grow potatoes in the Huasahuasi area.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizer.

loans.name: La Imaculada (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal La Inmaculada está formado por 6 mujeres y un hombre quienes son amigos y conocidos, vive por una comunidad perteneciente a la parroquia de Santa Ana (Cuenca), este lugar es de clima frió pero su gente es muy cálida y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres. Se dedican a la cría de animales, a la agricultura y mucha de su gente labora en la ciudad y regresan por la noche a sus hogares. Nuestras socias tienen un gran carisma, son personas luchadoras y trabajan todos los días para mejorar su economía y salir adelante con sus familias.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Señora. Ana Lucía, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia de Santa Ana.

Tiene 22 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 6 y 3 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuelita del sector. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad siendo el esfuerzo del trabajo conyugal.

Doña Ana Lucía pasa en casa y cuida de sus hijos que aun se encuentran pequeños, como pasa en casa se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos, cuyes y conejos los que los vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su tercer crédito al cual fue  invitada  por una amiga.  El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en alimento para los mismos.
 
Su meta es de comprarse un vehículo.
texts.en:
The 'La Inmaculada' community bank is made up of six women and one man who are friends and acquaintances.  They live in a community in Santa Ana (Cuenca) parish.  This is a cold-climate area but the people are very warm and they maintain the culture and traditions of their parents.  They work in animal raising and farming and many people work in the city and return home at night.  The members of this group are very charismatic.  They are tenacious people who work every day to improve their financial situation and get ahead in life together with their families.

One of the members of this group is Ana Lucía who lives in a community in Santa Ana parish.  Ana Lucía is 22 years old, married, and has two children from her marriage who are 6 and 3 years old.  Her eldest son attends a local elementary school.  Her husband works in construction as a builder.  They own the house in which they live, having obtained it through their joint work.

Ana Lucía remains at home and cares for her children who are still young.  While she is at home, she raises pigs, guinea pigs and rabbits which she sells when she has a financial need to do so.

This is Ana Lucía's third loan through her community bank which she was invited to join by a friend.  She will invest her loan money in buying chickens and feed for them.

Ana Lucía's goal is to buy herself a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y administra una tienda, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, desde hace 4 años está en el negocio, de este ha logrado contribuir para los gastos del hogar.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para la tienda, como pastas, boquitas, bebidas, detergentes, y otros productos que agregar para los clientes, esto le ayudara para que los clientes la prefieran y consuman de sus productos.
La aspiración de María es agregar la venta de gas, a sus negocios, tener un lugar amplio donde pueda atender las tres ocupaciones, además quiere apoyar a sus hijos y que puedan superarse.
texts.en:
María sells tortillas and manages a shop. She lives with her husband and 2 children. She has had the business for 4 years and with it has managed to contribute towards the household expenses.

Cuirrently, she is asking for a loan to buy merchandise for the store such as pasta, snacks, beverages, detergents and to add other products for her customers. This will ensure that the customers prefer her store and buy her products.

Maria's aspiration is to add the sale of gas to her business and have spacious premises where she can take care of all three businesses. She also wants to support her children so that they can excel.
.

loans.use: to buy pasta, snacks, beverages and detergents for the business

loans.name: Milagros Del Rosario

texts.es:
Milagros de 31 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de aua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Morropón que pertenece al departamento de Piura.    Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, gandera y artesana.

Milagros la actividad que realiza es el alquiler de cabinas de internet, negocio que lo ha colocado en su mismo domicilio por seguridad de sus bienes, con una experiencia de 5 años, su mayor clientelas son  escolares que acuden en busca de información para realizar sus tareas como para jugar y con los ingresos que obtengan podrá solventar sus gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de más compuatdoras y brindar mantenimiento a sus máquinas, para seguir brindando un buen servicio como hasta el momento, con la intensión de atraer más clientes; lo que le permitirá pagar su crédito otorgado y mejorar su nivel de vida.  Milagros es una mujer trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo a llegado a adquirir sus cosas para seguir sacando a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
31-year-old Milagros lives with her family in her own home which has piped water and electricity.  It is located in the urban area of Morropón district, in Piura department.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Milagros' business is renting out Internet terminals.  She has set up her business in her own home for the safety of her goods.  She has five years experience.  Her main customers are school children who come looking for information that they need for their tasks and also to play.  She uses the income that she makes to cover her family expenses.

Milagros has requested a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more computers and have her existing machines serviced so that she can continue providing a good service as she has up to now.  Her aim is to attract more customers to her business which will allow her to repay her loan and improve her standard of living.  Milagros is a hard-working woman who, through a lot of effort, has managed to acquire things and get her family ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy more computers and have her existing machines serviced

loans.name: Delfina  Santusa

texts.es: La señora Delfina, es una cliente que ingreso a la institución el año 2010 como crédito individual, la señora trabajo bien  D. manera responsable y puntualmente, la cliente mantiene a sus  dos hijos que están en la edad  escolar y universitario. La Sra. Delfina se  dedica ala  venta D. condimentos y ropa y su domicilio esta ubicado en la zona  el tejar,  el crédito lo destinara para la compra D. condimentos, canela orégano ya que le hace falta esta mercadería, porque tiene ropa para poder vender, simultáneamente se dedica a estas dos actividades, ya que venD. según a la temporada y también a los pedidos D. que realizan,   La cliente  esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Señora Delfina is a client who joined the Institution in 2010 with a personal loan; the señora managed it well in a responsible and punctual manner.

The client is responsible for the upkeep of her two children, who are school-age and university-age. 

Señora Delfina works selling spices and clothes, and her home is located in the weaving area.  The loan will be used for buying spices - cinnamon, oregano, and whatever else she is lacking in merchandise.  She also has clothes that she can sell; she works simultaneously on these two businesses, as she sells according to the season, and also takes orders.

The client is very grateful to the Institution for the support being provided.

loans.use: to purchase spices and cinnamon at wholesale.

loans.name: Mari

texts.es: Mari, de 35 años es una mujer ejemplar. Convive desde hace 9 años con Jeremías, su esposo.
