Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Britney y Noe a los que cuidan y educan en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Patay. Cuando formó su familia, su principal actividad económica era la agricultura. Después de un tiempo su esposo comenzó a trabajar en una mina, donde obtiene un salario estable y bueno. Desde entonces ella emprendió sola las labores agrícolas. Decidiendo los próximos sembríos; pero los 10 años de experiencia le ayudaron a mantener estable su producción de alverja, flor de gladiolo y papa, los cuales cuida con mucho esmero y en cada cosecha comercializa sus productos al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Según cuenta gracias a la agricultura, pudo obtener 5 terrenos productivos, en diferentes lugares, eso le permite dinamizar sus cultivos de acuerdo a cada temporada. Además tiene un negocio de venta de hamburguesas y papas al hilo con hot dog; que vende los fines de semana, obteniendo así un dinero extra. Ahora quiere mejorar la infraestructura de su casa. Su filosofía es el trabajo constante, por eso está segura que logrará su objetivo.  Ella pertenece al banco comunal, “Santa cruz de patay” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo económico de todos ustedes, para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.  Mari de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de alverja para su próxima siembra, asimismo fertilizantes naturales para distribuirlos en los primeros meses de maduración.
texts.en: Mari is 35 years old and an exemplary woman. She has lived with her husband Jeremías for 9 years. They both have 2 children, Britney and Noe, who they take care of and educate in their own house. The house is located in the village of Patay. When she started her family, her main economic activity was agriculture. After a while, her husband started to work in a mine where he received a good, steady salary. Since then, she has been farming alone, deciding which crops to grow. However, 10 years of experience helped her to maintain a stable production of peas, potatoes and gladioli flowers all of which she takes good care of. She sells all her crops at harvest time at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma. According to her, she was able to obtain 5 pieces of productive land in different locations thanks to her farming. This allows her to streamline her crops according to the season. In addition, she also has a business selling burgers and shoestring fries with hot dogs which she sells at the weekends and lets her make a little extra money. She now wants to improve the infrastructure of her house. Her philosophy is to work hard which is why she is sure she will reach her goal. She belongs to the communal bank "Santa Cruz de Patay". This is her 8th loan with MFP and she hopes for the economic support of all of you so she can reach her goals. In addition, she promises to be punctual with her repayments. Mari, on receiving your support, will invest the loan sought in the purchase of 2 bags of pea seeds for her next planting season and natural fertilizers for the first few months of seed maturation.

loans.use: to buy 2 bags of pea seeds and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela de 24 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito de la Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

Mariela se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chicha de jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base de maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú), esta actividad los realiza desde hace un año aproximadamente, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado de generación en generación. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas de la chicha de jora en la zona donde vive, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

Teniendo la oportunidad de crecer Mariela a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más harina de maíz para la elaboración de chicha de jora y realizar arreglos en su vivienda, con la finalidad de obtener mayores ganancias con la venta de su producto y de tener mayor seguridad en su vivienda. Con sus ganancias podrá pagar su crédito y brindarle más comodidades y oportunidades a su familia.
texts.en:
24-year-old Mariela lives with her husband and son in their own home, which lacks basic services and is located in the La Matanza district in the administrative division of Piura. The population of this area work with agriculture and livestock.

Mariela manufactures and sells chicha de jora, a tasty beverage made ​​from corn which is widely consumed in the north of Peru. She has been doing this for about a year, and it is a custom that has passed from generation to generation. Lately, her sales of chicha in have increased in her area which has helped boost profits and improve the quality of life for her family.

Taking the opportunity to expand her business, Mariela has requested a loan through Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 soles. This will be used to buy more corn flour for the preparation of chicha and carry out repairs in her home, with the purpose of earning more from her product sales and being more secure at home. With her earnings, Mariela can repay her loan and provide more amenities and opportunities for her family.

loans.use: to purchase corn flour for the continued production of her chicha, and to carry out some repairs in her home

loans.name: Juana Yessenia

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Buenas Amiga se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

La señora Juana es socia fundadora del Banco comunal, es la fiscal de pagos y le gusta por las facilidades para conseguir los créditos. Tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 11 y 2 años de edad, el mayor estudia en  escuela. Su esposo es maestro albañil.

Nuestra amiga para ganar algo de dinero por su cuenta y con esto colaborar con los gastos que genera el hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes. Trabaja tres días a la semana fuera de casa y todos los días en la misma, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Tiene tres años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. 

Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The “Buenas Amigas” (Good Friends) Communal Bank meets every two weeks in the Montecristi Canton.  The Montecristi Canton is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts, which are known both nationally and internationally. It is the home of the famous Panama hat.

Juana is a founding member of the communal bank.  She is the bank’s Payments Overseer, and she likes the bank because of the ease of getting loans.

She is 31 years old and married.  They have two children, ages 11 and 2.  The older child goes to school.  Her husband is a master bricklayer.

In order for our friend to earn some money on her own and help with the household expenses, she sells all types of clothing.  She sells door to door, and she also sells at her house, where her customers come.  She works away from home three days a week, and all of the days are the same.  She gives credit to her customers, and she collects every two weeks.  

She goes to Guayaquil every time she needs to buy merchandise.  She has been in this business for three years, and it is going very well for her.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise like pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children’s clothes.

Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children’s clothes.

loans.name: Carolina Yanira

texts.es:
Carolina, se dedica a la venta de meriendas, tiene once meses de dedicarse al negocio, su madre le ayudo para que tomara la decisión, ella vive con sus hijos quienes dependen de sus ingresos.
Actualmente está solicitando por segunda vez un préstamo para la compra de ingredientes para preparar las meriendas como: carnes, condimentos, verduras y lácteos, también comprar maíz, leña. Esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar su producción generando más ganancias.
Esta inversión espera que le contribuya para el desarrollo de su negocio y que genere mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Carolina has been selling snacks for 11 months.  Her mother helped her make the decision.  She lives with her children, who are dependent upon her income.

She is currently requesting, for the second time, a loan to buy ingredients for the snacks.  She will buy meat, condiments, vegetables, and dairy products.  She will also buy corn and firewood.  This investment will help to improve her production and generate more income.

She hopes that this investment will contribute to the development of her business, and that it generates greater income.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, vegetables, dairy products, corn, and firewood.

loans.name: Reydo

texts.es: Reydo, de 41 años es un hombre trabajador y muy dinámico. Está casado con Ana, su esposa; ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que cuidan y educan en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Patay. De muy joven, se dedicó a trabajar en los terrenos productivos de sus padres; ahora que tiene su esposa, trabaja con ella sembrando papa, arvejas, también flores pero en menor cantidad. Para él dedicarse a sus cultivos le llena de mucha satisfacción, por ello antes de iniciar su jornada mastica coca para no sentir cansancio de la dura  jornada y de  paso va contemplando sus sombríos. Ya tiene 21 años de experiencia, y según cuenta, después de la cosecha contrata un camión, para el transporte de toda su carga hasta el mercado mayorista de Tarma, donde los compradores lo esperan y él pacientemente escucha a todos los postores, para elegir al mejor. Ahora tiene sembrado flor de gladiolo y alverja de buena calidad que está seguro cosechará con mucho éxito, además menciona que gracias a la agricultura; pudo obtener todos sus terrenos agrícolas, por ello piensa seguir sembrando en mayores cantidades. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Santa cruz de patay” y este es el décimo cuarto crédito que tiene con MFP, donde demostró pagar puntualmente cada una de sus cuotas. Además se siente feliz de pertenecer a una de los mejores bancos comunales. Reydo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 3 bolsas de semilla de alverja que sembrará, asimismo 10 bolsas de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir en los primeros meses de maduración.
texts.en:
Reydo, age 41, is a hard-working and very dynamic man.  He is married to Ana, and they have three children whom they care for and educate in their own house.  The house is in the Patay settlement.

Reydo worked his parents’ productive fields at a very young age.  Now that he has his wife he works with her planting potatoes and peas.  He also grows flowers, but in a small quantity.  Working the land gives Reydo much satisfaction. Before beginning his daily tasks, he chews coca leaves so that he doesn’t feel tired during the day’s hard work.  He surveys his fields as he works.

He now has 21 years of experience.  He tells us that after the crops are gathered, he hires a truck to transport them to the wholesale market in Tarma where buyers are waiting. He listens patiently to all the bidders in order to choose the best one. 

He has now planted good quality gladiolas and peas.  He is sure that the harvest will be very successful.  He also states that thanks to farming he was able to get all of his fields.  He therefore plans to continue planting in greater quantities. 

He belongs to the Santa Cruz de Patay Communal Bank.  This is his 14th loan with MFP.  He has demonstrated himself to be punctual with each one of his repayments.  Also, he is happy to belong to one of the best communal banks.  Upon receiving your support Reydo will buy three bags of pea seeds that he will plant.  He will also buy ten bags of natural fertilizer to spread during the first months of growth.

loans.use: to buy three bags of pea seeds and ten bags of natural fertilizer.

loans.name: Fabiola

texts.es: La Sra. Fabiola  trabaja en su casa, elaborando papas fritas de manera artesanal, reparte en escuelas, colegios y tiendas en varias zonas de la Ciudad, tiene una experiencia superior a 3 años en el rubro y es conocida en el barrio. Vive en casa propia, tiene dos hijos pequeños, que los cuida con la ayuda de su mamá, la cliente esta sola, el papa de sus hijos se encuentra en Brasil. El crédito es para compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus productos, es una persona muy trabajadora se levanta a tempranas horas de la mañana para pelar las papas y freírlas esto de manera manual, después las embolsa para entregarlas en los distintos kioscos y escuelas y también ella tiene su puesto de venta donde las vende mas directamente.
texts.en:
Sra. Fabiola works at home preparing traditionally made potato chips. She distributes them in schools and stores in various areas of the city. She has had more than 3 years experience doing this work and is well-known in the neighborhood.

Fabiola lives in her own home and has two small children whom she cares for with her mother’s help. She is alone, since the children’s father is in Brasil.

This loan is to buy supplies to prepare her product. She is a very hardworking person who gets up during the early hours of the morning to peel and fry the potatoes by hand, afterwards packaging them to deliver to the various kiosks and schools. She also has her own stall where she sells directly to the public

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare and sell potato chips.

loans.name: María Elizabeth

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Buenas Amigas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, tiene 23 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen una hija de 4 años y actualmente está en el tercer mes de embarazo. Su esposo realiza trabajos de limpieza de piscinas.

Nuestra amiga para ganar algo de dinero por su cuenta y con esto colaborar con los gastos que genera el hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes. Trabaja tres días a la semana sobre todo por las tardes o noches cuando su marido llega y puede quedarse cuidando a su pequeña hija o en ciertas ocasiones la acompaña en sus ventas, ella deja a crédito a sus clientes y cobra cada fin de semana. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Lleva dos años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal, es la tesorera del mismo y le gusta porque sus compañeras son muy unidas y puntuales.
 
Su sueño es tener un local bien surtido de mercadería. 

En la foto está nuestra socia con su pequeña hija.
texts.en:
The Buenas Amigas communal bank meets every fifteen days in Montecristi canton, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts, which are recognized nationally and internationally. This is also the place of famous panama hats.

We meet Maria here. She is 23, married and has a daughter, 4, and is currently in her third month of pregnancy. Her husband has a job cleaning swimming pools.

In order to earn her own money, and in this way help with household expenses, Maria sells all kinds of clothing. Her way of doing so is by going door to door. She also sells from her house, where her customers come. She works three days a week, above all during the afternoons and evenings when her husband is at home and can care for their daughter. On certain occasions he accompanies her in her sales. She provides credit to her customers and collects every weekend. She buys her merchandise in Guayaquil when she needs to. She has been doing this work for two years and it is going very well.

Maria will use this loan to buy more merchandise, such as pants, blouses, T-shirts and children’s clothing. She is one of the founding members of the communal bank and is the treasurer. She likes the group because her fellow members are united and make their payments on time.

Her dream is to have a place with a good selection of merchandise.

In the photo she is shown with her small daughter.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Vilma Del Carmen

texts.es:
Vilma, vive con su esposo, no tienen hijos, ella se dedica a la administración D. una tienda, donD. ofrece productos D. consumo, el cual lo tiene desD. hace 5 años con la ayuda D. su esposo.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería, aceite, huevos, pan, detergentes, gaseosas, jugos, mejorar el inventario comprando D. los productos que son demandados por los clientes.
El objetivo D. Vilma es que su tienda perdure por mucho tiempo, mejorarla cada día, que la condición económica D. su familia también mejore.
texts.en:
Vilma lives with her husband, and doesn't have children.  She runs a store, where she sells products for daily use.  She has had the business for 5 years, with her husband's help. 

She is applying for a loan to buy merchandise: cooking oil, eggs, bread, detergents, soft drinks, juices; to improve her inventory by buying the products her customers are asking for. 

Vilma's goal is to have her store last a long time, and improve every day; so that her family's finances also improve.

loans.use: To buy merchandise: cooking oil, eggs, bread, detergents, soft drinks, juices.

loans.name: Lina

texts.es: Lina, de 27 años, es una mujer dichosa; ella junto a su esposo Eutemio, cuidan de sus hermosos gemelos, Andy y Ronaldo. A los que cuida con todo el amor posible, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Casacoto. “El tesoro de una familia son los hijos”, con está frase comienza Lina a relatar su actividad comercial; todos los días ella, se dirige al campo a cuidar de sus terrenos agrícolas, ahí su producción de papa, arveja y habas, le brindan buenos ingresos y en cada cosecha, ella negocia el precio de venta en el mercado central de su ciudad. Tiene buenos ingresos, según cuenta baja los días miércoles, sábado y domingo a vender sus productos agrícolas al menudeo, así obtiene mejores ganancias. Además vende los animales que cría, entre ganado ovino y porcino. Asimismo su esposo Eutemio, trabaja en una mina al norte del país donde percibe un salario fijo; ambos salen adelante y muy pronto desean incrementar su producción, los objetivos que se plantearon son el cultivo a gran escala, para poder comercializar en la capital, con ello podrán darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Y de esa manera sacarlos adelante. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde está  feliz de trabajar en su banco comunal, porqué los integrantes le ayudan a salir adelante. Razón por la cual promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Lina de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios kilos de papa de otros terrenos que serán cosechados para continuar con la venta del mismo.
texts.en:
Lina, aged 27, is a happy woman. She and her husband Eutemio take care of their beautiful twin boys, Andy and Ronaldo.  She looks after them with all the love possible, in her own home which is located in the Cascuto area.

"The treasure of a family is its children"; with this phrase, Lina starts to tell us about her commercial business.  Everyday she heads to the fields to care for her agricultural land, where she grows potatoes, peas and lima beans.  These earn her good income, and at each harvest, she negotiates the sales price in the central market in her city.  She earns good income, selling her agricultural products at retail on Wednesdays, Saturdays and Sundays, so as to earn better profits.  She also sells sheep and pigs that she raises.  

Her husband Eutemio works in a mine in the north of the country, where he receives a fixed salary.  They are both moving ahead in life, and very soon they would like to increase her production.  Her goals are to plant crops on a large scale and to be able to sell them in the capital.  In this way she will be able to provide her children with a better quality of life, and in this manner help them get ahead.

She belongs to the communal bank "Miraflores de Casacoto", and this is her fourth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to be working with the communal bank, as the members support her in getting ahead in life.  For this reason, she promises to be punctual with her repayments.

On receiving the support, Lina will invest the requested money in buying several kilos of potatoes that have been harvested elsewhere, so as to continue selling them.

loans.use: to buy several kilos of potatoes.

loans.name: Maria Yamileth

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, vive con su suegra, dos hijos de 7 y 1 año de edad y su esposo, María lleva 5 años trabajando en la venta de tortillas y lo aprendió de su madre.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, ya que desea comprar por mayor cantidad y obtener un mejor precio, con esta compra tendrá materia prima para un buen tiempo.
La intensión de ella es tener material para preparar las tortillas, aumentando sus ventas y con la esperanza de mejorar también la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria sells tortillas for a living. She lives with her mother-in-law, her two children aged 7 and 1 and her husband. Maria has spent 5 years selling tortillas, something which she learnt from her mother.

At the moment she needs a loan to buy corn as she would like to buy bigger quantities and get a better price. This purchase would mean she will have supplies for a long time.

Her intention is to have the ingredients to make tortillas and to increase her sales, in the hope of also improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn for her business.

loans.name: Margot

texts.es: Margot, de 26 años, está casada hace 7 años con Yuber, ambos tiene 2 hijos a los que educan con  mucho amor, ya que Nelsy y Luciana; son su mayor tesoro. Ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Casacoto. El apoyo de su esposo Yuber, es vital para ella. Pues con las ganancias que obtiene en la comercialización de frutas al por mayor en el norte del país, puede alimentar y educar a sus hijos, y eso le ofrece una economía estable. Mientras que ella se dedica al cuidado de sus terrenos de cultivo; donde hace 6 años viene sembrando papa y arveja que después de cada cosecha, los comercializa en el mercado central de su ciudad. Con las ganancias que obtiene, puede darles una mejor vida a sus hijos. Como también está ahorrando, para poner un negocio de frutas a gran escala, donde pueda abastecer a todos los comercializadores de todo el Perú. Margot, está segura que con la experiencia ganada por su esposo lo logrará. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está segura, de que tomo una buena decisión; ya que con el apoyo de todos ustedes logrará su objetivo. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Margot de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero que solicita, en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Margo is 26, and has been married to Yuber for several years. They have 2 children who they are raising with a lot of love; as Nelsy and Luciana are their greatest treasure. They live in their own house in the settlement of Casacoto.  The support of her husband Yuber is vital for her.  

With their earnings from selling fruit at wholesale in the north of the country, they can feed and bring up their children, and also stabilize their family finances.  While she looks after their land, where they have been growing potatoes and peas for 6 years, he sells their produce after each harvest, in the central market of the city.  With the profits they get, they can give their children a better life.  

They are also saving to set up a business to sell fruit on a large scale, supplying retailers all over Peru.  Margot is sure that with the experience her husband has gained, they will succeed.

She belongs to the "Miraflores de Casacoto"  communal bank, and this is her second loan with MFP.  She is sure that she is making a good decision, since with all the support from the group, she will achieve her goal.  In addition, she promises to make her payments on time. When she receives the loan, Margot will use the money to buy sacks of natural fertilizer to spread on her potato crops.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith, de 20 años, es una joven muy responsable y con muchas aspiraciones, ella vive junto a sus padres y sus 3 hermanos. En la localidad de Casacoto. Ella agradece a Dios, por haberla encaminado y brindado la oportunidad de apoyar a su familia. Como buena hija apoya a sus padres en los gastos de casa. Trabaja en las mañanas en una tienda agropecuaria y por las tardes estudia la carrera de Computación, ya le falta pocos años. Terminando desea ejercer su carrera, pero también desea tener algo propio; por ello está planeado abrir su propia tienda agrícola, donde no solo podrá vender productos propios para la agricultura, también desea capacitarlos e instruirlos. Ahora su proyecto es sembrar papa y habas; en el terreno que su padre le heredo,”por el momento, solo comenzaré, con una pequeña producción”, afirma. Además ya tiene gran conocimiento sobre las técnicas de cultivo y cuenta que saco su primera cosecha, donde obtuvo buenas ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está  feliz de pertenecer a un banco comunal que integran personas triunfadoras y con muchas ambiciones. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Judith piensa sembrar alverja en su terreno productivo; por ello de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de papa y si el dinero le alcanza podrá surtir su tienda de comestibles.
texts.en:
Judith is 20 years old and is a very responsible young woman with great aspirations.  She lives with her parents and three brothers in the area of Casacoto.  She thanks God for having guided her and bringing her the opportunity to help her family.

Like a good daughter, she helps her parents with the household expenses.  She works in the morning in a farming supply store, and in the afternoon she studies computer science.  She will complete her studies in a few years.  When she finishes her course she wants to pursue this career, but she also wants to have something of her own. Therefore she is planning to open her own farming supply store, where she will not only be able to sell her own products, but also be able to teach and empower others.

At present her plan is to plant potatoes and beans on the land her father has passed along to her.  “At the moment I am just starting with a small crop”, she said.  She already has a great deal of knowledge of the techniques of farming, and says that she has harvested her first crop and obtained good results.

She belongs to the communal bank “Miraflores de Casacoto”, and this is her second loan from this bank.  She is happy to belong to a communal bank that is made up of high achievers with a lot of ambition.

Further, she promises to be punctual with her loan repayments. She wants to plant peas on her land as well as potatoes. If she receives your support, she will invest the funds in a bag of seed potatoes, and if there is enough money she will supply her store with food to sell.

loans.use: to buy a bag of seed potatoes and supply her store.

loans.name: Cristina Sternao

texts.es:
Cristina, se dedica a la venta de ropa, lociones, accesorios femeninos y además vende pupusas, vive con su madre, su hija de 7 años, inicio vendiendo en el mercado municipal, pero desde hace 8 años está vendiendo ambulante.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa de temporada, blusas, pantalones, short, esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar la atención a los clientes y generar mejores ganancias.
El objetivo de Cristina es trabajar con préstamos para desarrollarse en el negocio, trabajando por mejorar la condición de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Cristina sells clothing, lotions, women’s accessories and also pupusas (stuffed tortillas). She lives with her mother and her 7-year-old daughter. She began selling in the municipal market, but for 8 years has been selling door to door. Currently she is requesting a loan to buy seasonal clothing, blouses, pants and shorts. This investment will help her to improve her service to her customers and to generate better profits.

Cristina’s objective is to work with loans to expand her business, thereby improving her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing, blouses, pants and shorts.

loans.name: Angela Pastora

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Buenas Amigas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Angela, tiene 55 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, todos mayores de edad e independientes y uno de ellos aun vive con ella. El marido es comerciante.
 
Nuestra amiga junto a su esposo y su hija  se dedican al comercio, ellos venden  sillas y perezosas ( sillas de descanso), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también venden bajo pedidos que le hacen de otras ciudades como Quito, Cuenca y Loja, ciudades  a las cuales se desplazan una vez cada quince días para realizar sus ventas. Nos cuenta que ellos compran estos productos en Rocafuerte a artesanos de este lugar para luego llevarlos a dichas ciudades en las cuales se quedan por dos a tres días hasta que terminen de vender lo que han llevado. Tienen más de 20 años este negocio y esta es la fuente de ingresos.
 
Este crédito es para comprar sillas y perezosas. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con estos créditos. 

Su sueño es tener un local para no viajar tanto.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Buenas Amigas", ("Good Friends"), meets every two weeks in the Montecristi Canton, which is well known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts, which are renowned on a national and international level.  It is the place where the famous toquilla straw sombreros come from.

In this area lives Señora Angela. She is 55 years old, and lives in a common-law marriage from which she has five children.  They are all fully grown and financially independent, and one of them lives with her.  Her husband works in retail.

Our friend works with her husband and her daughter in retail; they sell chairs and loungers (chairs for relaxing).  Their sales method is going door-to-door, and they also sell to orders that they receive from other cities such as Quito, Cuenca and Loja.  They go to these cities twice a month to make their sales.

She tells us that they buy their products in Rocafuerte from craftsmen, and then take them to the aforementioned cities where they stay for two or three days until they have finished selling what they have brought with them.  They have been working in this business for more than 20 years, and this is their source of income.

This loan is to buy chairs and loungers.  She has been a member of the Communal Banks since the beginning, and likes it for the help they provide her through these loans.

Her dream is to have her own premises, so that she doesn't have to travel so much.

loans.use: to buy chairs and loungers(chairs for relaxing).

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
La señora Rosario es casada, tiene 46 años D. edad, cursó los 4 años D. educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos, 1 D. los cuales estudia una carrera, se dedica al comercio, lo cual ya lleva 10 años D. experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica a la confección.

DeciD. organizar un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra D. mas producto para la tienda que atienD., jabón, A.úcar, productos enlatados, aguas gaseosas, avena, fideos etc. En el futuro espera ver su negocio granD. y más surtido. Las demás integrantes se dedica a la atención a tienda en general, crianza D. animales doméstiC. y a la tejeduría D. sabanas típicas.
texts.en:
Señora Rosario is married, she is 46 years old and she completed 4 years of primary education. She has 3 children, 1 of whom is studying for a degree. She works in a store, where she has 10 years experience. She relies on the support of her husband who works in tailoring.

She decided to form a group to apply for a loan which she will use to buy more products for the shop she works in, such as soap, sugar, canned goods, soft drinks, oats, noodles etc. In the future she hopes her business will be bigger and more diverse. 

The other members make their living working in a general store, breeding domestic animals and weaving traditional blankets.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for the shop

loans.name: Wilder

texts.es: Wilder, de 21 años, es un joven bueno y responsable, que junto a su esposa Jessica; cuida de su hijo Diego de 2 año de nacido. Juntos viven en una casa alquilada, ubicada en el caserío de Casacoto. A pesar de su corta edad, él asume varias responsabilidades. Hace 3 años que de dedica a la compra y venta de papa, al por mayor, asimismo de verduras de toda clase y tipo. Su trabajo consiste en viajar a diferentes lugares del país para poder comercializar la producción de su localidad y otras que compra eventualmente. Cuando formó su familia, decidió invertir en el oficio que aprendió desde niño, la agricultura, de esa manera tendría un ingreso extra, pues vende sus mismas cosechas. Es así que comenzó con la siembra de papa, arvejas y habas. Las que con el apoyo de Jessica, puede cuidarlas y verlas crecer fuertes y sin mayores dificultades. Pero consiente, de que tiene que trabajar para poder brindar un futuro a su familia; también trabaja en trasporte público en la capital del país, donde lleva a vender los alimentos que produce la tierra. “Lo más importantes en este negocio es ser conocido “, afirma. Por eso más adelante desea expandirse más, en la comercialización de los frutos a todo el país. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de Casacoto” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde está  feliz de pertenecer a un banco comunal, donde integran personas triunfadoras y con muchas ambiciones. Razón por la cual promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Wilmer de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios kilos de papa y verduras de toda clase para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en: Wilder, 21 years old, is a good and responsible young man. With his wife, Jessica, he cares for his son Diego, who is 2 years old.  Together they live in a rented house located in the village of Casacoto.  Despite his young age, he has various responsibilities. For 3 years he has bought and sold potatoes wholesale, as well as vegetables of all kinds. His work consists of travelling to different places around the country in order to sell the produce from his area and others that he eventually buys. When he started his family, he decided to invest in the work that he learned from childhood--agriculture. In this way, he would have an extra source of income, since he sells his own produce. This is how he began growing potatoes, peas, and beans. With the help of Jessica, he can care for them and watch them grow strong without major difficulties. But he is aware that he needs to work to be able to provide his family with a future; he also works in public transit in the country's capital, where he brings the food from his land to sell. "The most important thing in this business is to be known," he states. Therefore, in the future he wants to expand more, selling the produce to the whole country. He belongs to the "Miraflores de Casacoto" communal bank, and this is his fourth loan with MFP. He is happy to belong to a communal bank that is made up of triumphant people of great ambition. This is why he promises to be punctual in his payments. Upon receiving the loan, Wilder will invest it in the purchase of several kilos of potatoes and vegetables of all kinds in order to continue with his business.

loans.use: to purchase kilos of potatoes and vegetables to stock his business

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes, de 36 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Héctor y su pequeña hija Resalí, a la que cuida y educa en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Patay. A sus 15 años de edad, se convirtió en una madre muy responsable y trabajadora, ya que cargada a su niña en la espalda,  labra la tierra de sus vecinos, conjuntamente con su esposo, donde sumados le pagaban 20 soles diarios, de ahí que se propusieron en alquilar chacras y sembrar sus propios cultivos, se iniciaron sembrando papas y sus cosechas le resultaron muy bien, permitiéndole acumular dinero; que le permitió adquirir unos terrenos cultivables. Desde entonces siembra cada año papa y arveja, que le permiten tener buenas ganancias. Con los cuales compró 2 toros para el arado y 2 burros para carga. Ella y su esposo están muy contentos y felices, puesto que le agrada trabajar en la agricultura, ya que le genera dinero cada cosecha. Por ello está convencida de progresar mediante sus cultivos y, de ese modo ahorrar para adquirir más terrenos y evitar pagar el derecho de alquiler. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Santa cruz de patay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde promete cumplir cada una de las cuotas, asimismo tiene  anhelos de realizar sus ahorros en su banco comunal. Mercedes de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 3 bolsas de semilla de alverja y varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales, para su próximo sembrío.
texts.en:
Mercedes, 36 years old, is a very simple and hard-working woman who lives in her own house with her husband Hector and her little daughter Resali, whom she cares for and educates at home in the settlement of Patay.

At the age of 15, Mercedes became a very responsible and hard-working mother. Carrying her daughter on her back, she worked her nieghbor's land with her husband, and together they earned just 20 sols a day. 

Eventually, they decided to rent farm plots and plant their own crops. They began by sowing potatoes and their harvests have been very good, permitting them to accumulate money. This led them to acquire some cultivable lands. Since then, each year Mercedes sows potatoes and green peas, resulting in good earnings. With these, they bought two bulls to plough the land and 2 burros for carrying loads.

Mercedes and her husband are very content and happy now, since they like to work in agriculture and earn money for each harvest. They are convinced they can continue making money from their crops, and in this way, save to acquire more land and avoid having to rent farmland.

Mercedes belongs to the “Santa Cruz de Patay” communal bank and this is her 9th loan through MFP. She promises to comply with her payment schedule, and hopes to begin saving in her communal bank. Upon receiving the loan, Mercedes will buy 3 bags of green pea seeds and various sacks of natural fertilizer for the next sowing.

loans.use: buy 3 bags of green pea seeds and sacks of fertilizer for her farm fields.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil, corn, condiments, chicken, pork rinds, cheese and beverages.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda, de 34 años, es una madre de familia muy alegre y trabajadora; vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Rene de 35 años y sus 2 queridos hijos Dania y Etno, quienes son el principal motivo de todos su esfuerzo, los educa y cuida en el caserío de Patay. Con el carisma que la caracteriza, menciona que gracias a la agricultura; logró todos sus objetivos. Pues los cultivos de Nilda, son los mejores cuidados del poblado; sus sembríos de papa, alverjas, lechuga y flor de gladiolo, son de muy buena calidad, ya que ella se ha encargado de abonarlos muy bien. En el mercado de Tarma, que es donde vende sus productos, los clientes solicitan mucho sus cosechas, motivo por el cual siempre obtiene un buen precio por ellos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la época de la cosecha, ya que siente que los meses de arduo trabajo, son recompensados, lleva 12 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las inclemencias del clima. Por ello planea comprar un puesto en el mercado mayorista, con el cual desea mejorar sus ingresos económicos, pero sin dejar la agricultura, que es lo que más le gusta. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Santa cruz de Patay” y este es el décimo crédito con MFP, donde ha sido muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que siente que tiene un compromiso con la institución. Nilda de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de alverja que sembrará dentro de poco.
texts.en:
Nilda, age 34, is a very happy and hard-working mother, She lives in her own home with her husband Rene, age 35, and their two beloved children Dania and Etno. Their children are the main motivation behind all of their hard work. They care for and educate their children in the hamlet of Patay. With her trademark charisma, Nilda says that she has achieved all of her goals thanks to farming. Nilda's crops are the best in the area; her potato, pea, lettuce and
gladiolus flower are of very good quality, since she is sure to fertilize them very well. She sells her products in the Tarma market, where her customers frequently request her products; so she always gets a good price for them. What she most enjoys about her work is harvest time, since she feels that the months of hard work are rewarded. She has done this work for twelve years, and finds her greatest challenge to be caring for her crops against inclement weather. She plans to buy a stall in the wholesale market in order to improve her income without leaving agriculture, which is her favourite activity. She belongs to the "Santa Cruz de Patay" communal bank, and this is her tenth loan with MFP. She has been very punctual in the payment of her quotas, as she feels that she has a commitment to the institution. Upon receiving your support, Nilda will invest the requested loan in the purchase of a bag of pea seeds which she will soon sow.

loans.use: to buy a bag of pea seeds.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, se dedica a la venta de productos farmacéuticos y alimenticios, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, el negocio de Juan inicio hace 5 años, gracias a Dios no ha tenido dificultades y se mantiene en el negocio cada día mejor.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de medicinas, como antibióticos, vitaminas, analgésicos, ya que a diario vende de estos productos, cuenta con un buen número de clientes y espera tener aceptación con los nuevos medicamentos.
El objetivo con respecto al negocio, pues es mejorarlo con inversiones de préstamos, con su familia espera darles una vida digna, que sus ingresos mejoren para el bienestar de ellos.
texts.en:
Juan sells pharmaceutical and food products.  He lives with his wife and children.  Juan started his business five years ago.  Thanks to God, he has not experienced any problems and his business does better every day.

Juan is requesting a loan to buy medicines such as antibiotics, vitamins and painkillers as he sells these products every day.  He has a good number of customers and he hopes that the new medicines will prove popular.

Juan's goal for his business is to improve it by making investments through loans.  He hopes to provide his family with a decent life and to improve his income so that he can improve their well-being.

loans.use: to buy antibiotics, vitamins and painkillers to sell

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor, de 30 años, es una mujer joven y con mucha vitalidad. Junto a su esposo Ronald cuidan de su hija Evelin. Que es su razón de vivir, los tres viven en casa de su mamá, ubicada en la localidad de Casacoto. Su principal actividad económica es la agricultura, ya tiene 7 años de experiencia sembrando papa y arveja; afirma que en todas las cosechas agrícolas, viaja a Lima donde la demanda es mayor y el precio de compra es beneficioso. Pero en temporadas bajas, vende su producción en el mercado central de su localidad. Según menciona, hace algunos años decidió incursionar en la siembra de papa de la costa, donde la poca en ese tipo de clima, le produjo grandes pérdidas. Ahí tuvo que vender su camión, que le servía de trasporte. Ahora gracias al apoyo de su banco comunal; pudo salir adelante y junto a Ronald, está recuperando la estabilidad económica. Ahora ya adquirieron un camión, con que el que trabaja su esposo en el trasporte de mercadería por todo el país. Cuenta que aún le falta pagar la movilidad, por ello comenzó a dedicarse a la ganadería con la venta de carne de porcino, donde recibe un dinero extra y está segura que con eso podrá salir adelante. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde está  feliz de trabajar en su banco comunal, porque lo integran personas buenas y con grandes proyectos de los cuales aprenderá mucho. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Flor de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para sus cultivos de papa y si el dinero le alcanza arreglará el techo de su casa que está deteriorada.
texts.en:
30-year-old Flor is a young woman with a lot of vitality.  Together with her husband Ronald, she cares for her daughter Evelin who is her reason for living.  The three of them live together in her mom's house which is located in the town of Casacoto.

Flor's main business activity is farming.  She has seven years experience growing potatoes and peas.  She says that when she harvests her crops she travels to Lima where the demand is greater and the price she obtains for her crops is good.  However, in the off season she sells her produce in the central market in her town.  She says that some years ago she decided to start growing potatoes on the coast but they did not grow well in that kind of climate and she suffered large losses.  She had to sell her truck which she used for transportation.  Now, thanks to the support of her community bank, she has been able to get ahead and, together with Ronald, she is recovering her financial stability.  They have now acquired another truck which her husband uses to transport merchandise around the whole country.  She says that they are still paying for the vehicle and so she started raising animals (pigs) and selling their meat.  This makes her extra money and she is certain that she will be able to get ahead as a result.

Flor is a member of the 'Miraflores de Casacoto' community bank and this is her fourth loan from MFP.  She is happy to be working as part of her community bank because the other members are good people with big plans, from whom she will learn a lot.  For her part, she pledges to be punctual in making her loan repayments.  With your support, Flor will invest the money she has requested in buying several sacks of natural fertilizers for her potato crops.  If the money reaches far enough, she will also fix the roof of her home which is in a bad state of repair.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer, and sheets of metal for her roof

loans.name: Dolores Patricia

texts.es:
Dolores, se dedica a la venta D. ropa variada, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, tienen casa propia, el negocio lo instalo hace 3 años y medio, ofrece todo tipo D. ropa, cómoda y casual.
Ella solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en mercadería, obteniendo mayor variedad para jóvenes en prendas como: blusas, faldas, camisas, ropa D. niño e interior, espera que esta inversión le ayuD. para mejorar las ventas.
Las aspiraciones D. Dolores es tener un negocio surtido, contar con clientes y generar ganancias, también apoyar a su esposo y sus hijos en todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Dolores sells a variety of clothes.  She lives with her husband and children in their own home.  She set up her business three and a half years ago and sells all kinds of clothes, comfortable and casual.

Dolores is requesting this loan to invest in merchandise, obtaining a wider range of clothes for young people such as blouses, skirts, shirts, children's clothes and underwear.  She hopes that this investment will help her to improve her sales.

Dolores' aspirations are to have a well-stocked business, to have more customers and to make profits.  She also hopes to support her husband and children in everything they need.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (blouses, skirts, shirts, children's clothes and underwear)

loans.name: Tatiana Lizbeth

texts.es:
Tatiana, vive con su familia y sus hijos, administra una tienda y una sala de belleza, inicio con el negocio aproximadamente hace tres años, su familia le ha dado apoyo incondicional.
Actualmente necesita comprarse mercadería para la tienda, como aceite, frijoles, azúcar, arroz, estos productos son muy necesarios para la venta, pues los clientes solicitan a diario muchos de estos. La proyección de Tatiana es mantenerse en el negocio ya que sus hijos depende de ella, por eso le preocupa que los ingresos de la familia sean menos, su estrategia esta en invertir para ir progresando con el negocio.
texts.en:
Tatiana lives with her family and children.  She runs a store and a beauty salon.  She started her business approximately three years ago and her family have given her their unconditional support.

Tatiana currently needs to buy merchandise for her store such as oil, beans, sugar and rice.  These products are essentials as her customers ask for a lot of them every day.  Tatiana's plan is to remain in her business as her children depend on her.  She worries about the family's income going down.  Her strategy is to invest so that she can continue making progress in her business.

loans.use: to buy oil, beans, sugar and rice for her store

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan, de 59 años, vive en compañía de su esposa Isabel, y cuidan de sus 6 hijos, de los cuales solo viven con 2 de ellos; Julio y Obed. Todos unidos viven en la comunidad de Casacoto. Todas las mañanas, Juan organiza las diferentes actividades de casa. Por ejemplo Isabel, tiene que atender a sus pobladores que a primeras horas del día, compran leña para poder cocinar los alimentos del día. Mientra Juan, sale a cuidar de sus animales entre ovinos y vacunos; ya después de la cena. Él se dirige a sus terrenos agrícolas, que con tanto esfuerzo pudo adquirir, ahí siembra papa y arveja que es lo que más le gusta, pues adquiere ganancias mensualmente y tiene mayor demanda. En el mercado central de su localidad; en épocas de campaña de papa, los negociantes le brindan un buen precio de compra. Por ello él, está pensando adquirir más terrenos de cultivo, donde no solo sembrará papa, también demás productos que crecen en está zona. Sin embrago le preocupa la falta de capital de trabajo, pero está seguro que con el apoyo de su banco comunal, podrá concretar este objetivo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde está  feliz de trabajar con los pobladores de su localidad, pues tomaron la decisión de invertir y progresar juntos. Asimismo promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.  Juan se encuentra sembrando papa en la localidad de Illick, por ello de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos.
texts.en:
59-year-old Juan lives together with his wife Isabel and they care for their children.  They have six children but only two of them still live at home: Julio and Obed.  They live together in the community of Casacoto.

Every morning, Juan organizes the different household tasks.  For example, very early in the morning Isabel has to serve the locals with firewood so that they can cook their daily food.  Meanwhile, Juan goes out to look after his animals (sheep and cattle).  After supper, Juan goes out to his farmland which he acquired through a lot of hard work.  There he grows potatoes and peas.  This is what he most enjoys as he makes monthly profits and there is a lot of demand.  In the central market in town, during potato season, traders give him a good price for his produce.  For this reason, he is planning to acquire more farmland where he will not only grow potatoes but also other products which grow in this area.  He is worried by his lack of working capital but he is certain that, with the help of his community bank, he will be able to achieve his goal.

Juan is a member of the 'Miraflores de Casacoto' community bank and this is his fourth loan from MFP.  He is happy to work with the residents of his town because they took the decision to invest and make progress together.  For his part, he pledges to be punctual in making his loan repayments.  Juan is currently sowing potatoes in the town of Illick.  With your support, he will invest the money that he has requested in buying several sacks of fertilizer to spread over his crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Ruth Kelly

texts.es:
Ruth de 21 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Cayaltì que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Ruth se dedica desde hace 2 años a la crianza y comercialización de ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, una vez que lleguen a su peso y talla óptima lo puede ofrecer a sus clientes o a los distintos mercados de Chiclayo y con los ingresos que obtenga pueda solventar sus gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar otros animales y su respectivo alimento, al estar bien alimentados los puede ofrecer a sus clientes a un mejor precio, con la finalidad de que obtenga  más ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Ruth es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Ruth, 21, lives with her husband and son in her own house, which has electricity and is located in a rural area in the district of Cayaltí, part of the province of Chiclayo. This area is characterized by its agriculture and livestock.

Ruth has been raising and selling pigs for two years. Her corral is behind her house. She give them feed and, once they arrive at an optimum size and weight, she offers them to her customers or to different markets in Chiclayo. With the income she obtains she is able to meet her household expenses.

She has requested a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and their respective feed. If they are well-fed she can offer them to her customers at a better price, with the goal of obtaining more profit and thereby having a better quality of life. Ruth is a very hardworking and responsible person, whose only wish is to help her family get ahead.

loans.use: to buy other animals and their respective feed.

loans.name: Josefa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Josefa, vive con sus hijos, se dedica a la venta de ropa, este negocio lo inicio hace 6 años con la ayuda de su familia, esta es su fuente de ingreso permanente, por esta razón necesita invertir en mercadería para mantenerse y ofrecer mayor variedad a los clientes.
Ella solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en ropa interior, ropa para niños, espera que le permita realizar la inversión, que sea su apoyo para el crecimiento del negocio. Su aspiración es ser una microempresaria con capacidad para administrar y para vender, proveyendo para su familia la alimentación necesaria.
texts.en:
Josefa lives with her children and her business is selling clothes.  She started her business six years ago with the help of her family.  This is her permanent source of income and, for that reason, she needs to invest in merchandise so that she can keep going and offer a better range of goods to her customers.

Josefa is requesting this loan to invest in underwear and children's clothes.  She hopes that you will allow her to make her investment and support her in growing her business.  Her goal is to be a micro businesswoman with the ability to manage her business and sell her goods, thereby providing her family with the food they need.

loans.use: to buy underwear and children's clothes

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es: Manuela, de 44 años es una valerosa madre soltera de 4 hijos a los que cuida con mucho amor y cariño en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Kivinaki (selva central peruana). El rostro serio de está trabajadora mujer, denota su constante lucha por sacar adelante a sus hijos. Desde las primeras horas del día como hace 11 años, se dirige a cuidar sus cultivos de café y naranja, los cuales le proporcionan buenas ganancias en las negociaciones que realiza a los intermediarios que visitan sus 3 terrenos cultibables en cada cosecha. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es pasar la mayor parte en el campo; “construí mi casa dentro de mis plantaciones”, afirma contenta. Paralelo a esta actividad, ella realiza jornadas de trabajo, en cultivos de sus vecinos; quienes le pagan un dinero extra por su trabajo. Ahora está planeando sembrar en mayores cantidades, pues requiere de mayor capital, además se está preparando para la cosecha de naranja en el mes de octubre. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “flor de almendra”, y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está segura podrá alcanzar sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Después de la cosecha de café, Manuela piensa limpiar sus terrenos agrícolas. Por ello de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de herramientas para comenzar su trabajo. Asimismo varias calaminas para arreglar su pequeña casa.
texts.en: Manuela, 44, is a courageous single mother of 4 children who cares for them with a lot of love and affection in her own home, located in her native community of Kivinaki (in the central Peruvian rainforest.)  In the serious expression on the face of this hardworking woman, you can see her constant struggle to get ahead and support her children.  From the early hours of the morning, as she has done for 11 years, she goes to care for her coffee and orange crops, which provide her with good earnings through her negotiations with the intermediaries that visit her 3 plots of land every harvest season.  What she likes most about her work is spending most of her time in the country.  "I built my house in the middle of my fields," she says, contentedly.  In addition to growing her own crops, she also makes some extra money by working on her neighbor's farms.  Now she is planning to cultivate larger quantities, for which she needs more capital, and she also is preparing to harvest her oranges in the month of October.  She belongs to the communal bank "Flor de Almendra," and this is their second loan cycle with MFP.  With this loan, she is sure that she can reach her goals.  In addition, she pledges to be punctual with her payments.  After the coffee harvest, Manuela plans to clear the fields she uses for farming.  To do this, once the loan is disbursed, she will use the money to buy tools to start this work and she will also buy some sheets of corrugated metal roofing material to make some repairs to her small house.

loans.use: to buy agricultural tools and also to buy corrugated metal roofing material for the roof of her house

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
Guillermo tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona tiene como actividad agricultura, ganadería y turismo. 

Guillermo desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno (vaca), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que sus animales llegan a su crecimiento óptimo podrá ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así pueda obtener muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.  También cuenta con una mototaxi que la trabaja para que tenga otro ingreso para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales, alimento y mantenimiento de su mototaxi, con la finalidad de obtener más clientes e ingresos y así mejoraría  la calidad de vida de su familia.  Guillermo es una persona trabajadora y responsable que lo único que desea es que su familia se supere brindándole otras oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
Guillermo is 37 years old and lives with his wife and children in his own home which does not receive basic services.  His house is located in the rural area of Lambayeque department.  People in this area work in farming, animal raising and tourism.

Guillermo has been raising and selling cows for several years.  His pen is located behind his home.  He feeds his animals balanced feed and natural pasture.  Once the animals reach an optimal level of development, he is able to sell them in the different markets in his area and thereby make very good profits with which to cover his family expenses.  He also has a motorcycle taxi in which he works to make additional income for his household.

Guillermo has requested a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can buy more animals and feed, and have his motorcycle taxi serviced.  His aim is to gain more customers and income so that he can improve his family's quality of life.  Guillermo is a hard-working and responsible person.  The only thing that he wants is for his family to do well and be able to offer them other opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy more animals and feed, and to have his motorcycle taxi serviced

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 38 años, una mujer fuerte y valerosa, que en compañía de su esposo Erasmo, cuidan de sus hijos: Johan y Kevin. Ellos son una familia unida y con aspiraciones, que viven en la zona rural de Casacoto. Ella menciona que la mejor herencia que dejará a sus hijos, es el estudio; por eso está trabajando muy duro para pagar la universidad de sus dos retoños adolescentes. A pesar de su edad. Juana afirma que son muy responsables y que la ayudan en el cuidado de sus cultivos. Ya tiene 16 años dedicándose a ello y como buena agricultora, la mayor parte del día la pasa en sus sembríos de papa y hortalizas; los que en cada cosecha, según cuenta, le brindan buenas utilidades, pues viaja al mercado central de la capital, donde comercializa sus productos al por mayor; sin embargo en tiempos de escasa producción, los vendedores minoristas de su ciudad comprar sus cultivos a menor precio, eso la molesta mucho. Pero no la desanima, al contrario le da fortaleza para seguir adelante, ya que vende carne de ovino los días miércoles y domingo en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad, donde obtiene un dinero extra. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Miraflores de casacoto” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde agradece el apoyo de los integrantes de su banco comunal, augurando muchos éxitos, ya que son buenos y honestos. Asimismo promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Juana tiene sembrado papa de la variedad “andina”, por ello de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales y el pago del salario a los peones que le ayudan en la cosecha.
texts.en:
38-year-old Juana is a strong and brave woman who, together with her husband Erasmo, cares for her children Johan and Kevin.  They are a united family with aspirations who live in the rural area of Casacoto.

Juana mentions that the best inheritance she will leave her children is an education.  For this reason, she is working very hard so that she can pay for her two growing teenagers' university education.  In spite of their age, Juana tells us that they are very responsible and help her in caring for her crops.  Juana has been in this business for 16 years and, as she is a good farmer, she spends most of her day amongst her potato and vegetable crops.  She tells us that every harvest time they provide her with good profits as she travels to the central market in the capital where she sells them wholesale.  However, during periods of lower production, the retailers in her town buy her crops at a lower price.  This bothers her a lot.  However, she does not lose heart.  On the contrary, it gives her the strength to get ahead.  On Wednesdays and Sundays she sells meat from sheep in the wholesale market in town.  This makes her additional money.

Juana belongs to the 'Miraflores de Casacoto' community bank and this is her fourth loan from MFP.  She is grateful for the support of the other members of her community bank.  She predicts a lot of success as the bank members are good and honest people.  For her part, she pledges to make her loan repayments punctually.  Juana has sown 'andina' variety potatoes and, with your support, she will invest the money she has requested in buying natural fertilizers and in paying the salary of the laborers who will help her with her harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and hire laborers

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 22 años, vive en concubinato con Elvis, con quien tiene una hija: Yeimy, a la que quieren mucho. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Kivinaki (selva central peruana).  Su principal actividad económica es la agricultura. Hace 3 años que comenzó a producir la tierra; en 2 de sus 5 terrenos agrícola, plantó café, los cuales están creciendo sin mayores dificultades, y dentro de poco darán sus primeros granos. Pero consiente que durante todo este tiempo  tiene que generar ingresos, planto plátanos los cuales le proporcionan frutos cada 15 días. También trabaja en la hacienda de la señora María, haciendo matapaleo (proceso de extracción del fruto maduro mediante un palo). Ahora ella desea adquirir un buen capital de trabajo para poder abrir una tienda de comestibles en su localidad, además que comenzará a estudiar cosmetología para abrir en el futuro un salón de belleza y así tener un dinero extra. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “flor de almendra” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde es una secretaría comprometida a cumplir los acuerdos que se tomen en cada reunión. Razón por la cual pagará de manera puntual sus cuotas.  Elizabeth de recibir su apoyo; invertirá en la compra de varias plantitas de café que piensa sembrar en su terreno agrícola.
texts.en:
22-year-old Elizabeth lives with her partner Elvis and the couple have a daughter, Yeimy, who they love very much.  The family live together in their own home which is located in the indigenous community of Kivinaki (in the central Peruvian rainforest).

Elizabeth's main business activity is farming.  She started working the land three years ago.  On two of her five plots of land she planted coffee which is growing without any real problems.  The plants will soon produce their first beans.  However, aware that she needed to make income in the meantime, she also planted bananas which provide her with fruit every two weeks.  In addition, Elizabeth works on María's farm doing 'matapaleo' (a way of harvesting ripe fruit with a stick).  Elizabeth she would currently like to acquire a good amount of working capital so that she can open a food store in her town.  She will also start studying cosmetology so that she can open a beauty salon in the future and make extra money.

Elizabeth belongs to the "Flor de Almendra" community bank and this is her second loan from MFP.  She is the bank's secretary and in charge of ensuring that the agreements that are reached in each meeting are observed.  For this reason, she will make her repayments punctually.  With your support, Elizabeth will invest her money in buying several coffee plants which she plans to grow on her land.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia, de 27 años, es una mujer sería y trabajadora. Junto a su esposo Juan cuidan de sus 5 hijos en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad nativa de kivinaki (selva central peruana). El trabajo al que se dedica desde hace 20 años, es la agricultura. En sus 2 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas siembra toda variedad de cítricos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder quitar la maleza que crece entre los árboles, ya que le agrada verlos limpios y sanos. “El éxito para la obtención de un buen fruto, depende mucho del buen cuidado”, afirma. Pues los frutos de Celia, son muy bien cotizados, tanto así que los mismos comerciantes de frutas llegan, a su propio terreno agrícola a comercializar sus productos. Ahora está pensando sembrar yuca, pues en estos tiempos tienen mayor demanda y existen pocos agricultores que siembran este alimento. Está segura que con su esfuerzo y constancia podrá adquirir buenas ganancias, ya que quiere brindarle a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “flor de almendra”, y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera trabajar con mucho ahínco para sacar adelante a su asociación. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Aunque ya paso la cosecha de cítricos para todos de su localidad, Celia recién comenzará con la recolección de frutas maduras. Por ello de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus plantaciones. Además comprará semilla de yuca que está pensando sembrar.
texts.en:
27-year-old Celia is a serious and hard-working woman.  Together with her husband Juan, she cares for her five children in her own home which is located in the indigenous community of Kivinaki (in the central Peruvian rainforest).

Celia has been farming for 20 years.  She grows a variety of citrus fruits on her two hectares of farmland.  What she most enjoys about her work is being able to get rid of the weeds that grow between the trees as she likes to see them clean and healthy.  "The success of obtaining good fruit depends a lot on providing good care" she confirms.  Celia's fruit are certainly very much sought after.  So much so, in fact, that the fruit sellers themselves come to her land to buy her produce from her.  Now Celia is planning to start growing cassava as it is in good demand these days and there are few farmers who grow this food.  She is certain that, through her hard work and determination, she will be able to make good profits as she wants to be able to provide her children with a good quality of life.

Celia belongs to the 'Flor de Almendra' community bank and this is her second loan cycle with MFP.  She hopes to work determinedly in order to help her association make progress.  She also pledges to make her loan repayments on time.  Although everybody in her town has already harvested their citrus fruit, Celia is just starting to gather her ripe fruit.  With your support, she will invest the money she has requested in buying several sacks of natural fertilizers to spread over her plantations.  She will also buy cassava seeds which she plans to sow.

loans.use: to buy cassava seeds

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos de 60 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de la Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona es agrícola y ganadera.

Santos se dedica a la agricultura, tiene sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra maíz, actividad que realiza desde hace varios años, además de ser un producto consumido diariamente por las personas, una vez que realiza su cosecha lo comercializa en los diferentes mercados de la zona y fuera de ella,  con los ingresos que adquiera puede brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo y esposa.

A observar que su negocio va creciendo y a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de fertilizante para mejorar sus tierras comosu producto, con las ganancias que obtenga podrá pagar su crédito y solventar las necesidades diarias de su familia.  Santos con trabajo y dedicación le brinda lo mejor a su hijo, con la intensión de brindarles otra oportunidad académica en un futuro.
texts.en:
Santos is 60 years old and lives with his family in his own home, which doesn’t have any basic utilities.  It is located in the rural zone of the district of Matanza, in the department of Piura.  This area is known for its agriculture and livestock.

Santos dedicates himself to farming.  He has his own lands where he plants corn, an activity he has been carrying out for various years.  Also, this is a product that is consumed on a daily basis by the people.  Once he harvests his crop, he sells it in the different markets in the zone as well as outside areas.  With the income he obtains, he is able to provide a higher standard of living for his son and wife.

At seeing that his business is growing, he has thought it necessary to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1000 new Peruvian soles to buy fertilizer to improve his lands, as well as his product.  He will use the earnings he obtains to pay his loan and meet the daily needs of his family.  Santos, with hard work and dedication, provides the best for his son with the aim of giving him other academic opportunities in the future.

loans.use: buy fertilizers to improve his lands, as well as his product.

loans.name: Eudez

texts.es: Eudez, de 48 años. Esta casada con Eduardo, con quien tiene 8 hijos, a los que cría en unión familiar en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Kivinaki (selva central peruana). A pesar de su avanzada edad, está trabajadora mujer sigue dedicándose a la agricultura. Ya tiene 21 años sembrando café, naranja y achiote. Lo que más le gusta de su labor son las épocas de cosecha, pues recoge con satisfacción los frutos que cuidó con mucho esmero. Ahora por ejemplo se está preparando para la cosecha de achiote, donde está segura obtendrá buenos resultados. Cuenta que el árbol de frutas que se encuentra detrás suyo, en la foto; es un patrón de semillas de mandarina, de ahí se sacan los nuevos núcleos para sembrar en gran escala. Además su esposo trabaja como peón en otros terrenos agrícolas obteniendo un dinero extra para su hogar. Pero como tiene muchos hijos; ella también trabaja en cada jornada que encuentra, ya que así puede obtener más ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “flor de almendra” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está segura podrá obtener al aliado incondicional para el progreso de sus cultivos. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Eudez de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de herramientas para la limpieza de su terreno agrícola después la ardua cosecha.
texts.en:
Eudez, 48 years of age, is married to Eduardo; together they have 8 children that they raise in their own home located in the Kivinaki community (Peruvian central jungle).  Despite her advanced age, this hard-working woman continues to dedicate herself to farming.  She has already been planting coffee, oranges and achiote for 21 years.  

What she enjoys most about her work is the harvest season, as she gathers the fruits she tended to with great care.  Today, for example, she is preparing to harvest her achiote, where she is sure she will obtain a good result.   

She recounts that the fruit tree seen behind her in the picture yields mandarin seeds, from which she obtains new plantings to sow at a grand scale.  In addition, her husband works as a farm laborer on other lands, thereby obtaining additional income for the family.

However, as she has many children, she also works on every journey she finds herself on since this is how she will obtain greater profits.  She belongs to the “Flor de Almendra” (“Almond Flower”) cooperative bank; this is her second loan with MFP, where she is sure she’ll be able to obtain an unconditional alliance for the progress of her crops.

For this reason, she promises to be punctual with her installment payments.  Eudez, at receiving your support, will invest the requested funds into the purchase of tools to clear her farmland after the arduous harvest.

loans.use: buy tools for farming.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Teresa, es una mujer trabajadora de 38 años. Junto con su esposo  Wilder, velan por sus 5 hijos a los que educan con mucho amor, en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Kivinaki (selva central peruana). “Me gusta el trabajo de mi banco comunal”, así comienza a relatar su vida. El trabajo al que se dedica está increíble mujer es la agricultura, hace 6 años que viene sembrando café, naranja, tanllarina y toda variedad de cítricos. Su esmero y dedicación constante en sus terrenos agrícolas le proporcionan buenos ingresos económicos, tanto así que los mismos compradores vienen a su chacra a negociar sus frutos. Ahora cuenta que termino su cosecha, donde obtuvo buenas ganancias. Del mismo modo coparte su tiempo ayudando a otros agricultores a cuidar de sus cultivos, de esta manera obtiene un dinero extra. Asimismo se está preparando para la cosecha de naranja del mes de noviembre. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “flor de almendra” y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, donde es una mujer responsable y espera obtener buenas resultados con el trabajo de su asociación. Asimismo promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Teresa, después de la cosecha; comenzará la limpieza de sus cafetales. Por ello de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de herramientas para comenzar su trabajo.
texts.en:
Teresa is a hard-working 38-year old woman.  Together with her husband, Wilder, they watch over their 5 children who they educate with much love.  The family lives in their own home located in the Kivinaki community (Peruvian central jungle).  “I like the work of my cooperative bank”, is how she starts to talk about her life.

The work that this incredible woman dedicates herself to is farming.  She has been planting coffee, oranges, and a variety of citrus fruits for 6 years.  Her constant care and dedication to her farmland provide her with good earnings, so much so that the buyers themselves come to her farm to negotiate for her fruits.
