loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Jeni Arely

texts.es: Jeni Arely de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad, su negocio es muy conocido en la localidad pues siempre tiene lo que los clientes necesitan, productos de muy buena calidad a excelentes precios, además del servicio inigualable de Jeni, que siempre recibe a las personas con un saludo cordial y una sonrisa en el rostro, es muy vigorosa y positiva; para ella el secreto de nuestro éxito se encuentra en trazarse con claridad la agenda de nuestro diario vivir y encarar de la mejor manera los cambios que se presentan, por eso ella vive intensamente cada día, con la esperanza de alcanzar un futuro mejor, es así como le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar golosinas, granos básicos, huevos, embutidos, pan, bebidas entre otros. Jeni Arely tiene la confianza que así logrará darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Jeni Arely is 33, and lives with her life companion and their children.  She has a store where she sells basic household necessities.  

Her business is very well known in the area, as she always has what her customers need; good quality products at excellent prices.  Besides, Jeni provides unbeatable service, always welcoming people with a friendly greeting and a smile on her face. 

She is very energetic and positive.  For her, the secret of success lies in clearly setting out what we plan to accomplish in our daily lives, and facing the changes that come up as best we can. This is why she lives each day with intensity, with the hope of achieving a better future.  

That is how she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy candy, basic grains, eggs, cold cuts, bread, drinks, and other things. Jeni Arely is confident that in this way she will succeed in giving her family a fulfilling life.

loans.use: To buy candy, basic grains, eggs, cold cuts, bread, and drinks to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: purchase diverse articles for resale

loans.name: Mayela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Máyela, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, vive con sus 5 hijos, el negocio lo inicio por el apoyo de su madre, quien le apoyo mucho y hoy en día se puede defender y velar por las necesidades de sus hijos, todo por las ganancias que obtiene.
Por el momento su necesidad es la compra de cerdos, ya que de este negocio vive, ella quiere mantener en la granja un numero de cerdos que le permita dentro de algunos meses obtener ganancias.
El propósito de ella es: continuar con su granja, tener el apoyo de sus hijos y contar con salud para trabajar.
texts.en:
Máyela lives with her five children and raises pigs.  She started her business with her mother's support.  Her mother supported her a lot and now she is able to look after her children and provide for their needs, all as a result of the profits she makes.

Right now, Máyela needs to buy some pigs as she lives off her business.  She would like to have a number of pigs in her farm which will allow her to make profits in a couple of months time.

Máyela's goal is to continue working on her farm, to have the support of her children, and to continue in good health so that she is able to work.

loans.use: to buy pigs for her farm

loans.name: Progreso De Esperanza 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Paulina is the coordinator of her group "Progreso D. Esperanza" 1 & 2 (Progress of Hope). She is excited to be taK. her third loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for almost 3 years, starting to work out of her house after she saved around $70 US, and started selling underwear. She plans to use this loan to buy pants, blouses, skirts, t-shirts, etc.

Paulina makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and their one child, from 4 children they have just one of them that still lives at home. She says that her biggest challenge is to improve her business, by building a locale for it next to her house. She said her most favorite activities are attending to her family and work. 

She dreams to have her own locale and an improved business, which she could have higher incoming, changing her living conditions and from her family. All the members in this group are taK. loan to improved their business and their lives and they are located in the urban slums surrounding Samana.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Abanyakuri Group

texts.fr:
Jeannette fait partie du groupe Abanyakuri. Elle est née au Rwanda et a 35 ans, elle est mariée et elle a 5 enfants de 4 à 16 ans et 4 enfants scolarisé. Son niveau d’éducation est 4 ans de secondaire. 
Jeannette est commerçante. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit pour acheter 150 kgs des farines de maïs, 150 kgs de riz et 50 kgs du sucre.
Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’améliorer l’accueille des clients (Customer care) enfin d’attirer les clientèles. Dans les prochaines années, Jeannette voudrait avoir les dépôts pour être le distributeur des marchandises dans sa région et payer les frais d’études pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Jeannette is part of the Abanyakuri group. Born in Rwanda, she is 35 years old and is married with 5 children aged between 4 and 16, 4 of whom go to school. She herself has 4 years of secondary school education.
Jeanette is a shopkeeper. This is her first loan cycle with ACB. She will use the loan to buy 150 kgs of cornflour, 150 kgs of rice and 50 kgs of sugar. She plans to grow her business by focusing on customer care to draw in more clients. Over the next few years, Jeanette would like to acquire the warehouses she needs to enable her to become the main distributor of merchandise in her region, and pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 150 kgs of cornflour, 150 kgs of rice and 50 kgs of sugar.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Diana está muy satisfecha con su credikiva  anterior pues logró comprar telas en mayor volumen y fabricó cubre lechos, artículos D. lencería que gustaron a sus clientes por eso los vendió y ganó muy pronto dinero. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, con el cual comprará nuevamente insumos y materiales para lencería pues al final D. año debe estar preparada para que sus clientes, comprando los artículos que Diana fabrica,  adornen con motivos naviD.ños los interiores D. sus viviendas. Ella dice a sus  financiadores D. Kiva  que Gracias al apoyo que recibe por medio D. Kiva y D. la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, se capitaliza su negocio y aumenta las ganancias, para sacar adelante a su familia especialmente a su hija que tiene discapacidad auditiva y del habla.Si usted quiere conocer la historia D. Diana ingrese al siguiente enlace:  http://kiva.org/lend/211189
texts.en:
Diana was very pleased with her previous Kiva loan, which enabled her to buy fabrics in bulk so that she could produce bedding and linens that her customers prefer. As a result, she sold them and earned a profit very quickly.

At the moment, she is requesting another Kiva loan so that she can buy a new supply of materials for making linens because she has to be prepared for the year-end purchases from her customers. They buy the items that Diana produces and use them for home decorations during the Christmas season. She expresses her thanks to the lenders for the support she has received through Kiva and Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. Diana has been able to capitalize her business and increase her earnings, thus allowing her family to move forward, especially her daughter who has hearing and speech disabilities.

To learn more about Diana’s story, please click on the following link: http://kiva.org/lend/211189

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for making linens.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: purchase food products

loans.name: Macael Alfredo

texts.es: Macael Alfredo de 32 años de edad, vive en casa familiar junto a sus padres en zona semi urbana. Macael se dedica a la venta de cocos en las diferentes zonas donde el habita, transportandolos en su pick up. Tiene mucha clientela ya que él se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, carismático y emprendedor. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio es decir poder ofrecer una mayor cantidad de su producto a los clientes. Para esto necesita invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de cocos para poder ofrecer a más personas en lugares distintos a los que ya visita y lograr incrementar sus niveles de venta.  Esta es la razón por la que solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar cocos al por mayor con el fin de cubrir una mayor demanda que le permita mejorar su nivel de ingresos y en consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: 32-year-old Macael Alfredo lives in his family home together with his parents.  They live in a semi-urban area.  Macael sells coconuts in different areas around his home, transporting them in his pick-up truck.  He has a lot of customers as he is a hard-working, charismatic and entrepreneurial man.  His dream is to expand his business so that he can sell a larger quantity of products to his customers.  In order to achieve this, he needs to invest in buying a larger quantity of coconuts so that he can sell to more people in different places to those he already visits, thereby increasing his sales levels.  This is why he is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL.  He will buy coconuts wholesale in order to satisfy more demand.  This will allow him to improve his income and, consequently, his own quality of life as well as that of his family.

loans.use: to buy coconuts wholesale

loans.name: Aida

texts.es: La señora Aida dedicada al comercio de frutas esto en el mercado de la zona por donde ella vive, ya hace muchos años atrás que realiza esta actividad, ella provee de buena calidad de frutas a todos sus clientes, temprano compra las frutas al por mayor y por este motivo solicito el  credito, y después lleva a su puesto en el mercado, ella es una joven mujer emprendedora que realizando este trabajo ayuda a su familia económicamente, para mantener la alimentación de sus hermanitos que son menores que ella, ella pretende ayudarles hasta que ellos sean profesionales, ese es uno de sus objetivos primordiales, ya que por casos de la vida ella tubo que hacerse cargo de sus hermanos, siempre pensando en el bienestar de su familia con ganas de superación y de mejorar la calidad de vida de sus seres queridos.
texts.en: Señora Aida sells fruit in the local market. She has done this for many years now, providing high-quality fruit to all of her customers. She buys the fruit wholesale early in the morning, and later brings it to her stall in the market. She is requesting this loan for buying the fruit wholesale. She is a young, enterprising woman who helps her family economically through her work. She helps provide food for her younger siblings, and hopes to help them until they are professionals. This is one of her most important goals, as circumstances in life have meant that she has had to take care of her siblings. She is always thinking about her family's well-being and has a desire to get ahead and improve the quality of life of her loved ones.

loans.use: to purchase fruit wholesale.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria de 65 años de edad, vive en su propia casa junto a su querida hija. Victoria se dedica a la venta de deliciosos e higiénicos refrescos que ella misma prepara. Los cuales vende a la orilla de la calle cerca de su hogar de residencia. Es una zona muy estratégica, concurrida y segura en donde muchas personas caminan y deciden comprar los ricos frescos de Victoria. Ella ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su familia ya que es lo más importante y es quien le da las fuerzas para seguir adelante. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin de comprar la materia prima para la elaboración de sus ricos frescos tales como: cocos, melones, naranjas, limones, horchata, etc. espera lograr buenos resultados que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Victoria, age 65, lives in her own home with her beloved daughter. Victoria sells delicious and hygienically-prepared drinks that she makes herself. She sells them on the street near her home. This is a very strategic location, as it is highly-trafficked and secure. Many people walk buy and decide to buy Victoria's delicious drinks. She has worked all her life to get her family ahead, as this is the most important thing for her. She is the one who works hard to succeed. She has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL with the goal of purchasing essentials for making her delicious refreshments, such as: coconut, melons, lemons, horchata [a cold, sweet drink made from tiger nuts and sugar], etc. She hopes to achieve good results that will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy essentials: coconut, melons, oranges, lemons, horchata [a cold, sweet drink made from tiger nuts and sugar], etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to restock on clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing such as blouses, shirts, pants and underwear.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients: corn, rice, beans, cheese, pork rinds, etc, and propane gas.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
En la foto aparece la señora Maria con su hijo.

La señora Maria tiene 39 años D. edad y esta casada con un hijo. Ella se dedica a trabajar en su propia tienda, donD. venD. útiles escolares, perfumenes, ropa, entre otros productos.

La Señora Maria es una mujer muy trabajadora, ya tiene 14 años D. estar en el negocio por lo que conoce el mercado y los productos que los clientes buscan. Fue su madre quien le enseño esta actividad. Antes D. tener su propio negocio la señora Maria era empleada en una casa D. cambio durante 8 años.

Ella adquiere sus productos en la ciudad D. San Salvador porque ahí obtiene mejores precios y luego debe trasladarlos hasta su comunidad situada en un barrio del oriente del país. 

La señora Maria utilizará el préstamo para la compra D. mas mercadería como útiles escolares, perfumenes, ropa, entre otros, así como en la compra D. recargas telefónicas y flores para la temporada que se avecina. D. esta manera, ella podrá satisfacer la demanda D. sus clientes y generar mayores ingresos que le permitan lograr seguridad económica a su hogar y una vida mejor a su familia. En un  futuro a la señora Maria le gustaría ofrecer mayor variedad D. productos como granos básicos.
texts.en:
María appears in the photo with her son.  María is 39 years old, married and has a son.  She works in her own store selling school supplies, perfume and clothing, among other things.

María is a very hardworking woman.  She’s been in business 14 years so she knows the marketplace and the products her customers are looking for.  Her mother taught her this activity.  Before having her own business, María had been employed at a currency exchange firm for 8 years.

She acquires her products in the city of San Salvador because she gets the best prices there and then she has to transport them to her community in a neighborhood in the east of the country.

María will use the loan to buy more merchandise like school supplies, perfume and clothes, among others as well telephone recharges and flowers for the approaching season.  In this way, she’ll be able to satisfy customer demand and generate higher income that will bring economic security to her home and a better life for her family.  In the future, María would like to stock a wider variety of items like staple grains.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, perfume and clothes, among other products to sell.

loans.name: La Paz 2, 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Martha is a member of her group L. Paz (The Peace). Her group is located in the area surrounding L. Romana, where the economy is based around the sugarcane harvest and where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. 

Martha is excited to be taking her third loan with Esperanza, and starting to invest in her business selling clothing and shoes. She will uses this loan to buy shoes, for women, men and kids (sandals, sneakers, slippers, etc). She started her business with her Esperanza first loan, almost 1 year ago. She is using her business profits to reinvest in her business and to uses ot for her expenses.

Martha and other members are dedicated to do business around their community and other villages, selling clothes, shoes, cosmetics, underwear, and many other products. She thanks you all for your support. 

Picture were taken in two different groups, that is why there are 5 members in a second photo.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Ana Gladys

texts.es: Ana Gladys D. 38 años D. edad, habita en casa familiar con su madre D. 54 años D. edad. Ella se dedica a la venta D.  variedad D. ropa usada. Muchas personas la aprecian y prefieren sus productos ya que siempre posee variedad y buenos precios. Ya tiene mucho tiempo D. dedicarse al negocio y gracias a Dios y a su dedicación los frutos cosechados del mismo han sido muy buenos. Para Ana es muy importante seguir manteniendo su negocio activo ya que es su principal fuete D. ingreso. Es por todo esto que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad D. prendas D. vestir por fardos, bultos variados D. ropa que contienen: pantalones, faldas, vestidos, camisas, shorts, entre otros, D. tal manera que los clientes se sientan atraídos a sus nuevos productos y cada día la demanda sea mayor generando mayores ingresos que permitan mejorar su calidad D. vida y la D. su madre.
texts.en: Ana Gladys, age 38, lives in the family home with her 54-year-old mother. She sells a variety of used clothing. Many people appreciate and prefer her products because she always has a good variety and good prices. She has had her business for a long time, and thanks to God and her dedication, the fruit of her labour has been very good. For Ana it is very important to keep her business going, since it is her main source of income. For this reason, she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase a variety of clothing items by the bundle. She buys trunks of clothing containing: pants, dresses, shirts, shorts, and other items. With the purchase of items using this loan, her customers will be drawn to her new products and demand will increase every day. This will generate her a greater income and allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her mother.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing items: pants, skirts, dresses, shirts, shorts, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm oil and pagnes for resale

loans.name: Prosper

texts.fr:
Prosper est né au Rwanda et a 49 ans. Il est marié et il a 7 enfants de 2 à 18 ans, dont 6 scolarisés. 

C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit pour acheter les ciments, des portes et des fenêtres métallique et vitres pour la réhabilitation des  sa maison d'habitation. 

Dans les prochaines années, Prosper voudrait poursuivre ses études universitaires pour son avenir , il prévoit de payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants et améliore le bien être de sa famille et avoir une bonne habitation.
texts.en:
Prosper was born in Rwanda and is 49 years old. He is married with 7 children between 2 and 18 years old, six of whom attend school.  

He is on his second loan cycle with ACB, and will use his loan to purchase cement, metal doors and windows and glass panes in order to refurbish his home. 

In the coming years, Prosper would like to pursue his university studies in order to prepare for the future; he also envisages paying his children's school fees, and would like to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cement, doors and metal windows to refurbish his home

loans.name: Luz Idalia

texts.es: Luz Idalia de 41 años de edad, reside en su humilde casa junto a sus 4 hijos. Luz posee un comedor en cual ofrece variedad de ricos platillos. Ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su familia y poder darles el pan de cada día. Luz es una mujer trabajadora, desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana se levanta para tener listos los diferentes platillos que cada día ofrece a sus clientes. El negocio de Luz cuenta con la ventaja que está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica en la cual muchas personas transitan. Es muy conocida y famosa por sus ricos platillos los cuales son inigualables. Para ella lo más importante es que su familia y sus clientes estén satisfechos. Hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para ofrecer lo mejor a sus clientes ya que su sueño es poder ver su negocio florecer de tal manera que las personas  la prefieran cada día más y consuman su rica comida. Ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de nuevos y ricos platillos, tales como: pollos, carnes, verduras, bebidas y sazonadores. Todo con el objetivo de lograr una mayor demanda de sus productos y poder ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Luz Idalia, age 41, lives in a small home with her four children. Luz has an eatery where she offers a variety of rich dishes. She has worked all her life to get her family ahead and provide their daily bread. Luz is a hard-working woman who gets up every day very early in the morning to get her various dishes ready. Luz's business has the advantage of being located in a very strategic, highly trafficked zone. It is very well-known and is famous for its rich, unbeatable dishes. For Luz, the most important thing is for her family and customers to be satisfied. She does everything within her power to offer her customers the best, since her dream is to be able to see her business flourish so that people like it more and more every day and eat her rich food. She has decided to take out this loan from INTEGRAL to purchase the necessary ingredients for making new and rich dishes. These ingredients include: chicken, meat, vegetables, drinks and seasonings. Her goal is to provoke greater demand for her food and to be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy the necessary ingredients for making her rich dishes: for example, chicken, meat, vegetables, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy food condiments

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
Reyna, se dedica a la elaboración de hamacas, vive con su esposo y seis hijos de 16, 14, 12, 10, 7 y 4, ella es ama de casa y elabora hamacas en su tiempo libre, con la idea de obtener ingresos para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de hilo de seda de diferentes colores y manguios, estos materiales son para elaborar las hamacas, será una gran inversión que le ayudara para mantener la producción y la venta con los clientes.
Los sueños de Reyna es sacar a sus hijos adelante, darles el estudio y la alimentación para que crezcan sanos, además de crecer en el negocio.
texts.en:
Reyna produces hammocks. She lives with her husband and six children (ages 16, 14, 12, 10, 7, and 4). Reyna is a homemaker and makes hammocks in her free time. She came up with this idea to generate income so that she could help her husband with the household expenses.

At the moment, she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of silk thread in different colors and protective sleeves. These materials are used in making hammocks. Her loan will be a great investment that can help maintain both her production and her sales to her customers.

Reyna dreams of helping her children move forward, providing them an education, feeding them so that they stay healthy, and growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase silk thread in different colors and protective sleeves.

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es: María Magdalena reside en casa propia junto en zona semi urbana, junto a ella vive su hijo el cual ya es mayor de edad. Ella se dedica a realizar filmaciones o grabaciones de video a eventos como: bodas, graduaciones, cumpleaños, etc. Esta actividad la realiza de manera ambulante en los diferentes lugares cerca de la zona donde ella habita, como iglesias, escuelas y colegios, universidades, parques, centros comerciales, entre otros mas. Es una mujer muy creativa pero sobre todo con mucha iniciativa. Para ella no hay obstáculos a la hora de filmar. María cuenta con buenas referencias personales, muchas personas en la zona le tienen confianza y aprecian su trabajo, por ello la buscan. María ha decidido hacer este préstamo a INTEGRAL para comprar nueva cámara y accesorios de filmación ya que estas son  sus herramientas principales a la hora de realizar su trabajo y con los que cuentan ya no funcionan bien, ella comenta que siempre es bueno prevenir y estar lista antes que surja un evento porque para ella todos son importantes. Confía en Dios que de esta manera logrará mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María Magdalena and her grown son live in their own home in a semi-urban area. She produces films and video recordings of special events such as weddings, graduations, birthdays, and other occasions. María conducts her business by traveling to different places near the neighborhood where she lives such as churches, elementary schools, high schools, universities, parks, businesses, and other sites. She is a very creative woman, but above all she demonstrates a great deal of initiative. For her, there are no obstacles that could hinder her when it is time to film. María has good personal references since there are many people from the area who express their trust and appreciation for her work, which is why her services are in demand.

María decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy a new camera and film accessories, since these are the main pieces of equipment that she uses in her work. She would not be able to function without them. María says that it is always good to be prepared and ready for any event because all of them are important. She trusts God that she will be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a video camera and film accessories.

loans.name: Aurora E Jesus

texts.es: Aurora de 51 años de edad está muy satisfecha con su negocio en el cual vende gran variedad de mercancías, especialmente artículos de belleza y prendas de vestir a la medida de cada cliente. Con su negocio ha logrado sacar a su familia especialmente a su hijo de 18 años de edad. Ella se inició en la vida comercial con una amiga de quien aprendió mucho y posteriormente empezó a vender cosméticos en el barrio y gradualmente fue adicionando otras líneas de artículos, con su vinculación a empresas que manejan sus ventas mediante gestores que utilizan guías especializadas. El credikiva es su primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará cosméticos, perfumes y calzados, teniendo en cuenta los pedidos que de estos artículos han hecho sus clientes. Su meta es incrementar su capital de trabajo, para lograr generar oportunidades de ingresos a su familia, convirtiéndolos en comerciantes de sus productos. Mientras Aurora trabaja con mucho esfuerzo, obtiene en su negocio una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menores del 29%, una rotación de cunetas por cobrar de 30 días y una rotación de inventarios del 15 días, indicadores financieros desde los cuales auguramos su éxito en la inversión y en su potencial crecimiento
texts.en:
Aurora, 51, is very satisfied with her business where she sells a great variety of merchandise, especially beauty supplies and clothes, to meet each customer’s needs.  She has raised her family, especially her 18-year-old son, with this business.  She started out in commerce with a friend from which she learned a lot and later on started to sell cosmetics in the neighborhood and gradually added other product lines associating herself with firms that sell their products via catalogue.

The Kiva loan is her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and she’ll use it to buy cosmetics, perfume and footwear keeping in mind pending orders from her customers.  Her goal is to increase working capital to generate income opportunities for her family turning them into product merchants.  While Aurora works very hard, she attains a profit margin over sales of 29%, an accounts receivable turnover rate of 30 days and an inventory turnover rate of 15 days, financial indicators from which we can predict a successful investment and potential growth.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfume and footwear.

loans.name: Ana Elvira

texts.es: Ana de 50 años de edad vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos, en las edades de 11 y 12 años, en el centro de Puerto Colombia, municipio de playa,  brisa y mar. Allí está ubicado su negocio de venta de mercancías variadas, que promociona a sus clientes mediante  guías especializadas de productos. Su experiencia de negocio  la adquirió cuando tuvo un estadero-restaurante  en este mismo municipio y logró ser muy conocida a través de él.  Así fue, que cuando no pudo continuar con el negocio, decidió aprovechar la clientela real de este, e iniciar el proceso de promoción de mercancías como interiores femeninos, masculinos e infantiles. En la actualidad su mayor desafío, es lograr oxigenar su negocio con capital de trabajo,  para responderle a una nueva y creciente clientela. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con la cual comprará ropa interior basada en pedidos, para dar respuesta a sus clientes, que en el día del amor y de la amistad desean regalar estas mercancías, a sus enamorados, familiares y amigos. Su meta es incrementar sus ventas y ampliar la oferta de productos de nuevas marcas. Mientras trabaja y se esfuerza para alcanzarlas, obtiene un margen de rentabilidad no menor del 28%, una rotación de inventarios de 10 días, indicadores desde los que proyecta una inversión exitosa a través de Kiva y su gradual y tan anhelado crecimiento empresarial.
texts.en: Ana is 50 years old. She lives with her spouse and two children, aged 11 and 12, in downtown Puerto Colombia. The town has a beach, breezes and the ocean. Her business is located there, where she sells varied merchandise. She offers it to her customers through specialized catalogues. She acquired her business experience when she had a restaurant in the same town and became very well known with it. When she was no longer able to continue with that business, she decided to use her customer base and start offering merchandise such as ladies', men's and children's underwear. At present, her biggest challenge is growing her business with working capital to respond to a new and growing clientele. That is the reason she turned to a Kiva loan, the first loan she has taken out with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, she will buy underwear on order to respond to her customers, who like to give these items to their boy and girlfriends, their family members and friends. Her goal is to increase her sales and widen the variety of products with new brands. While she works and strives to attain this goal, she has a profit margin of no less than 28%, an inventory turnover of 10 days. These indicators project success with with Kiva and her gradual and much wished for business growth.

loans.use: to buy underwear to to fill orders.

loans.name: Andres Remberto

texts.es:
Andrés, es soltero, vive con sus padres, hermanos y dos sobrinos de 16 y 15 años de edad, él se dedica a la reparación y venta de repuestos de bicicletas, inicio como ayudante y una vez aprendió el oficio decidió instalar el taller, tiene ya 6 años de existir, con un horario de 8:00am a 6:00pm.
Actualmente él comprara repuestos para surtir el negocio como: pedales, frenos, cadenas, asientos, esta compra le ayudara para mantener en el negocio todo lo necesario para los clientes.
El propósito de Andrés es, mejorar el taller, atraer más clientela y que sus ganancias también sean mejores.
texts.en:
Andrés is single and lives his parents, his siblings, and two nephews (ages 16 and 15). He repairs bicycles and sells bicycle parts. Andrés started out as an assistant and once he learned the trade he decided to establish his own workshop. He has been in business for six years and works from 8am to 6pm.

At the moment, Andrés will buy parts to restock his business such as pedals, brakes, chains, and seats. This purchase will help to maintain his business and provide everything he needs to serve his customers. His goals are to improve his workshop, attract more customers, and increase his earnings.

loans.use: to purchase pedals, brakes, chains, and seats.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy charcoal and firewood for resale

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 11, 9 y 6 años de edad, él se dedica a la venta de agua, refrescos, jugos, galletas, él inicio trabajando en el lavado de carros, luego quiso instalar su propio negocio lleva 15 años ya realizando sus ventas, el horario es de 6:00am a 4:00pm.
Actualmente comprara más mercadería, aprovechando la compra por mayoreo de bebidas, galletas, agua, con esta inversión mejorara el servicio que brinda a las tiendas donde distribuye mercadería.
Su primer propósito es terminar de pagar el vehículo, en el que trabaja transportando la mercadería, y con su progreso en el negocio también mejorar la condición de su familia.
texts.en:
Víctor lives with his wife and children (ages 11, 9, and 6). He sells water, soft drinks, juices, and cookies. Víctor started out working at a car wash, but he later established his own business 15 years ago so that he could begin making sales. His work schedule is from 6am to 4pm.

He currently needs to buy more merchandise and take advantage of bulk purchases of beverages, cookies, and water. With this investment, he will improve the service he provides to the stores that receive his merchandise. His main goal is to finish the payments on the vehicle that he uses for transporting his merchandise. By making progress in his business, Víctor will also be able to improve his family’s conditions.

loans.use: to buy beverages, cookies, and water in bulk.

loans.name: Fanny Guadalupe

texts.es: Fanny es socia del Banco Comunal Wiracocha, tiene 34 años y 2 hijos, ella tiene una tienda de Bisutería, vende zapatos y ropa y hace Buffete, es socia hace mas de un año y medio, recuerda que el primer crédito que obtuvo lo utilizó para su tienda de Bisutería, ella agradece ya que económicamente pudo lograr muchas cosas, se pudo comprar las cosas materiales que le faltaban, este préstamo lo utilizará para su tienda de bisutería, ahora la meta que tiene es tener una restaurante en el extranjero, ella agradece mucho a Finca por las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
Fanny is a member of the Communal Bank “Wiracocha”. She is 34 years old and has two children. Fanny has a store where she sells trinkets, shoes, clothing, and variety of other items. She has been a member for more than a year and a half. Fanny recalls that her first loan was used for her trinket shop. She is grateful that she now has the financial ability to acquire many things and can buy items that she lacked before.

This loan will be used for her trinket shop. Her goal now is to open a restaurant abroad. Fanny is very appreciative for the training she received from FINCA.

loans.use: to buy various types of jewelry to sell in her store.

loans.name: Télésphore

texts.fr:
Télésphore fait le  commerce ambulant. Il est né au Rwanda et a 30 ans. Il est célibataire 

C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit pour acheter des tôles, des clous, et payement de main d’œuvre pour la construction de la toiture de sa maison. 

Dans les prochaines années, Télésphore voudrait avoir une grande boutique et être un importateur.  Il prévoit de construire d'autres appartements à louer et fonder un foyer.
texts.en:
Télésphore makes a living through door-to-door sales. He was born in Rwanda and is 30 years old and single. 

This is the first loan he has sought with ACB. He will use the loan in order to buy sheet metal, nails, and to pay the labour costs for the construction of a roof for his home. 

In the years to come, Télésphore would like to own a large shop for imports.  His aim is to build some apartments that he will rent out, and also to build a home.

loans.use: to purchase sheet metal and nails, and to pay labour costs for the construction of the roof of his home

loans.name: Erika

texts.es: Erika tiene 27 años, vive con sus padres en su casa que es propia. Desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y productos para el hogar. Es así como ofrece estos productos a personas que conoce y que viven cerca de su entorno. Su medio de venta es por catálogo, así como algunos productos que tiene en stock y del cual realiza sus clientes tienen la opción de comprar a crédito, sin embargo hay ocasiones en no terminan de pagar por el producto y eso es mucha desventaja en sus ganancias. Por el momento su negocio se mantiene estable, pero aún así desea abastecerse de mercadería para que futuras campañas por fiestas o algún evento que se presente y en donde la gente solicita más de éstos productos. Es su tercer crédito que tiene con MFP de las cuales se siente muy satisfecha de haber conseguido logros en su negocio, siendo su mejor aliado financiero cuando lo necesita  por lo que esta muy agradecida. En esta ocasión su crédito estará destinado a la compra de más mercadería, porque en esta época del año aumenta sus ventas.
texts.en:
Erika is 27 years old and lives with her parents in a house that they own. For several years, she has been selling cosmetics and household products. Erika offers her merchandise to people who she knows and live near her. Her method of selling is through catalogs, but she keeps some products in stock. Erika provides her customers the option to buy on credit, but sometimes they end up not paying for their products which is a great disadvantage to her earnings. At the moment, her business remains stable but she wants to stock up on merchandise for the upcoming season of parties and for unexpected events when people tend to request these products.

This is her third loan with MFP and she is very pleased to have achieved success in her business. She is very grateful to have a financial ally whenever she needs one. On this occasion, her loan will be used to buy more merchandise for this time of the year when her sales increase.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and household products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a loom and yarn to start his weaving business.

loans.name: Yeni Dany

texts.es: Yeni es socia del Banco Comunal Wiracocha, tiene 32 años y 1 hijo, elL. tiene una ferretería. Antes trabajaba en Digitación, ahora tiene 2 Ferreterías, una atienda elL. y L. otra atienD. su esposo, agradece mucho a Finca por todo lo que ha realizado y a podido obtener, ahora su meta es tener una Constructora, las capacitaciones y todo lo que enseñan le ayudan a elL. a poder ser mejor persona y sobresalir como empresaria.
texts.en:
Yeni is a member of the Communal Bank “Wiracocha”.  She is 32 years old and has one child.  Yeni has a hardware store.  Prior to that, she worked in data entry.  

Yeni now has two hardware stores, one that she manages and another that is looked after by her husband.  She is extremely grateful to FINCA for everything she has been able to achieve and obtain.  Her goal now is to start a construction business.  The training classes and everything she has learned has helped her to become a better person and an outstanding businesswoman.

loans.use: to acquire inventory for her business.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María, vive con su familia, es madre soltera de dos niños de 9 y 17 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y una tienda, este negocio inicio por su madre, lo atiende de lunes a domingo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de tomates, repollo, arroz, aceite, pan, gaseosa, frijoles y jabón, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar el negocio, manteniéndolo surtido de todo lo necesario para os clientes.
Las aspiraciones de María es continuar en su negocio, crecer como microempresaria y velar por las necesidades de sus hijos.
texts.en:
María lives with her family. She is a single mother of two children, ages 9 and 17. Maria sells fruit and manages a store, a business that was started by her mother. She works from Monday through Sunday.

María is currently requesting a loan to buy tomatoes, cabbage, rice, oil, bread, sodas, beans, and soap. This purchase will help to improve her business and maintain her inventory so that she can provide for all of her customers’ needs.

María’s aspirations are to continue her business, to grow as a small entrepreneur, and to secure the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, cabbage, rice, oil, bread, sodas, beans, and soap.

loans.name: Peter

texts.fr:
Peter est le salarie, il est né au Rwanda et a 37 ans. Il est marié.

Peter est le pasteur. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit pour acheter les matériels  d’un enfant qui va naitre bientôt (le matelas, un berceau et d’autre matériels pour le nouveau ne).

Dans les prochaines années, Peter voudrait poursuivre ses études de théologie. Il prévoit d’améliore le bien être de sa famille et avoir une bonne habitation.
texts.en:
Peter was born in Rwanda; he is 37 years old and married.

Peter is a minister. This is the first loan he has sought with ACB, and he aims to use his loan in order to buy goods for his soon to be born child (mattress, cradle and other items for the newborn). 

In the years to come, Peter would like to pursue his Theology studies. He would like to improve his family's living standards and build a good home.

loans.use: to purchase goods for his soon to be born baby (mattress, cradle and other items)

loans.name: Juan Marcelo

texts.es: El sr. Juan vive en casa familiar en la casa de sus padres, tiene un taller de tapicería, realiza tapizados de sillas asientos sofás y variedad de trabajos, siempre complaciendo al cliente como el dice, se dedica este trabajo desde hace 5 años, el sr. Es soltero, este crédito es para la compra de material de trabajo, compra de cuerina, esponja y otros, es un cliente antiguo de la institución, el es una persona responsable y trabajadora, le va muy bien en su trabajo tiene muchos clientes y es muy conocido por la buena calidad del acabado.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan lives with his family at the home of his parents. He has an upholstery workshop where he covers chairs, sofas, and a variety of other pieces. Juan says that his customers are always pleased with his work. He is single and has been in business for five years.

This loan will be used to buy materials for his work such as imitation leather, foam, and other supplies. He is a longtime client of Emprender. Juan is a responsible and hardworking person. He has done very well in his work since he has many customers and is well-known for the quality of his finished product.

loans.use: to buy imitation leather, foam, and other supplies.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, se dedica a la venta de prendas de oro y enchape, ella vive con una hija de 14 años de edad, quien está estudiando. El negocio de Elizabeth es herencia de familia, inicio vendiendo cosméticos y medicinas, actualmente son prendas de oro y enchape las que ofrece a la clientela, vende de ocho a cinco de la tarde.
Actualmente comprara mercadería a través de un préstamo, como collares, cadenas, pulseras, aretes, este préstamo le ayudara a tener diversificación de prendas para los clientes.
El propósito de ella es proveer lo necesario para su hogar, a través del fortalecimiento del negocio.
texts.en:
Elizabeth makes her living selling gold and gold-plated jewelry. She lives with a fourteen-year-old daughter who is in school. The business is a family legacy.  Elizabeth started out selling cosmetics and medicines, and now she sells gold and gold-plated jewelry to her customers from 8AM to 5PM. 

With her loan Elizabeth will buy merchandise like necklaces, chains, bracelets, and earrings. The loan will help her diversify her products for her customers. 

By strengthening her business, Elizabeth intends to provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy necklaces, chains, bracelets, gold earrings and gold-plated jewelry.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario  vive en la ciudad D. Cartagena y tiene 5 hijos en las edades D. 26 a35 años. DesD. allí tiene un negocio D. venta D. refrescos  desD. hace 19 años, cuando después D. trabajar como empleada en una empresa tomó su liquidación y la invirtió en su primer negocio D. restaurante, el cual terminó por atender la grave enfermedad D. su hijo que lo llevó a la muerte. Después D. esta experiencia, decidió retomar su negocio con su poco capital y lo convirtió en una venta D. refrescos y bebidas, lo ubicó en la terraza D. su casa y desD. ese momento, empezó a fluir su clientela hasta lograr lo que hoy tiene. Su meta más adelante, es gradualmente convertirlo en un gran restaurante, pero su gran desafío es el capital D. trabajo con el que cuenta, que resulta insuficiente para lograr este sueño. Mientras todo esto ocurre,  Rosario diariamente la impulsa el crecimiento D. su negocio y por eso acuD. a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará, en mayor volumen que el acostumbrado, cervezas, gaseosas y otros refrescos, preparándose para las fiestas que a partir del momento empiezan, como el día del amor y D. la amistad, Halloween,  grados, matrimonios, etc. que a final del año celebran las familias, aprovechando las primas naviD.ñas y bonificaciones, con los cuales las ventas D. todos los negocios se incrementan.
texts.en:
Rosario lives in the city of Cartagena and has five children between the ages of 26 and 35. She has a business selling soft drinks that she started 19 years ago after having worked as a company employee. Rosario took her severance pay and invested it in her first business, a restaurant, but she had to close it down in order to take care of her son who became gravely ill and eventually died. After this experience, she decided to restart her business with a little bit of capital and converted it into a soda and beverage shop. Her business is located on the terrace of her house. Since restarting her business, the number of customers has continued to flow to this day. Rosario’s goal for the future is to gradually convert her business into a large restaurant, but her greatest challenge is the lack of operating capital necessary to pursue her dream.

In the meantime, Rosario strives daily to grow her business. For this reason she is applying for a Kiva loan, her first form of financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the money to buy beer, sodas, and other soft drinks in larger amounts than usual in preparation for the upcoming festivities such as the Day of Love and Friendship (the Colombian version of Valentine’s Day), Halloween, graduations, and weddings. She will also take advantage of the year-end celebrations when families receive Christmas presents and holiday bonuses. During this time, all businesses experience an increase in sales.

loans.use: to buy a large volume of beer, sodas, and other soft drinks.

loans.name: Julia Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Julia Del Carmen tiene 45 años, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. La señora se dedica a la venta de productos varios, ya que en su casa de habitación posee una pulpería la cual es administrada por ella misma. Sus ventas son al contado y al crédito en parte. La señora está solicitando este crédito con el propósito de invertirlo a su negocio, en la compra de productos de sabanas, toallas, cremas, bolsas, calzado y cosméticos.
texts.en: Julia Del Carmen is 45 years old.  She is a single mother and has three dependent children in her care.  Julia sells a variety of products.  She has a grocery store in her home which she runs herself.  Her sales are for cash and some are on credit.  She is requesting this loan to invest in her business buying sheets, towels, creams, bags, footwear and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy sheets, towels, creams, bags, footwear and cosmetics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn for the tortillas she sells.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela es una madre de familia de 30 años de edad, vive con su hija en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio de luz y agua, ubicada en el distrito de Reque que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace algunos años Estela se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos, golosinas), verduras y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en casa de sus padres para su  seguridad y comodidad, ya que puede atender a la hora que desea, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades familiares.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería para abastecer su negocio, con el único objetivo de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones diarias.  Estela es una madre responsable y dedicada que se preocupa por tener un negocio más grande y más comodidades en bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Estela is a 30-year-old mother who lives with her daughter in her parents' home which has piped water and electricity.  The house is located in Reque district, in Chiclayo province.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

For some years, Estela has been selling groceries (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs and candy), vegetables and drinks.  She set up her store in her parents' home for her own safety and convenience as she is able to serve her customers at whatever hour she pleases.  She uses the profits that she makes from selling her products to try and cover all her family's needs and expenses.

In order to be able to stock her business, she has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy a larger quantity of merchandise.  Her sole aim is for her business to grow and to have more products available to offer her customers.  This will enable her to repay her loan and cover her daily needs.  Estela is a responsible and devoted mother who would like to have a bigger business and more conveniences for her family.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Eleuterio

texts.es: El señor Eleuterio oriundo de Aguaicastilla de la ciudad Chuquisaca, tiene tres hijas que se encuentran estudiando, su domicilio es propio  se encuentra ubicado, en la localidad de  Puerto Rico hace 5 años, el se dedica a la ganadería,  comercia el ganado en la feria asproa los fines de semana a parte tiene un ingreso  por la compra-venta de vehículo y motocicleta. El destino del crédito es para la compra de material de construcción para la construcción de  un cuarto en su casa para así brindar mas comodidad a su familia ya que poco a poco pudo construir su casita pero le falta algunos cuatros y el tiene el deseo de que en un futuro pueda tener su casita terminada Se siente muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en: Eleuterio, a native of Agua Castilla in Chuquisaca, has 3 daughters who are in school.  He has had his own home, located in the town of Puerto Rico, for 5 years.  He works with livestock.  He sells the livestock in the Asproa market on the weekends, and he also has another business buying and selling automobiles and motorcycles.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials to add a room to his house so that his family can live in greater comfort.  He has been gradually building his little house, but it still lacks some rooms, and in the future he wants to be able to completely finish the house.  He is very grateful to the institution for the support that is being provided to him.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Yader Alexander

texts.es: Yader Alexander tiene 23 años, su actividad es la venta de trofeos y elaboración, hace más de 2 años que se dedica a este negocio. El es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable pues sabe que tiene hacerse cargo de su familia. Este negocio lo aprendió por su propia cuenta ya que anteriormente era obrero y solo ganaba por hacerlos, pero fue con el paso del tiempo que él decide establecer su propio negocio. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de plata, cintas, medallas, entre otros productos.
texts.en: Yader Alexander is 23 years old.  His business is selling and making trophies.  He has been in this business for more than two years.  He is a very hard-working and responsible man as he knows that he must take care of his family.  Yader learned this business on his own initiative as he used to be employed as a manual worker and only earned enough get by.  Over time, he decided to set up his own business.  He is requesting this loan to buy silver, ribbons, medals and other products.

loans.use: to buy silver, ribbons, medals and other products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for weaving

loans.name: La Nueva Union 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Bianca is a member of her group, La Nueva Union 1 & 2 (the New Union). Her group is based in the area surrounding La Romana, where the economy is based on the sugar cane industry and where there is little access to running water (none of which is potable) or stable electricity. Bianca makes her home with her two children and long-term partner, she is a young woman just 19 years old.

Bianca is excited to receive her first loan in Esperanza international, She was invited to be part of this loan by her neighbors, because she has a business. Bianca resells shoes after she buys them from a catalog; this brand of shoes is very popular in the Dominican Republic. Her clients used to order from the catalog, but Bianca also buys every month different shoes and sizes, and sells them by walking or promoting them to her clients. 

She hopes with this loan to make her dreams come true, to have a successful business and a good house. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Meris

texts.es:
Meris D. 43 años y madre D. tres hijos en las edades D. 5 a 19 años, tiene un taller D. reparaciones D. equipos eléctricos,  en compañía D. su  esposo. Allí ofrecen servicio D. reparación D. televisores y equipos D. sonido, maquinas filmadoras, computadores y cámaras fotográficas digitales. Con su negocio esta pareja deriva el sustento para su hogar. Su principal ingreso lo obtienen por cuenta D. L. línea D. reparación D. artículos marca Toshiba y Panasonic que se encuentran en garantía, toda vez que L. señora Meris es L. única autorizada,  en L. ciudad D. BarranquilL., para ofrecer el servicio D. garantía D. estas marcas. En su negociación ha logrado  con cadenas D. almacenes importantes acceder a servicios D. mantenimiento y reparación, respondiendo a las garantías que estos ofrecen a sus clientes, cuando compran electrodomésticos.  
Su meta más adelante es abrir sucursales en varias ciudades D. L. Costa Caribe D. Colombia. Mientras Mery y su esposo trabajan para alcanzar sus sueños, obtienen en su negocio un margen utilidad no menor del 40%, una rotación D. inventarios D. repuestos D. 20 días, indicadores financieros desD. los cuales planean su crecimiento y exitosa inversión con su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a L. Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará repuestos electrónicos D. televisores y D. equipos D. sonido  para responder oportunamente a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Meris is 43 years old and the mother of three children between the ages of 5 and 19. She and her husband manage a small electronics repair shop. They offer repair services for televisions, sound equipment, camcorders, computers, and digital cameras. With this business, she and her husband are able to sustain their household. Most of her revenue comes from repairing electronics maD. by Toshiba and Panasonic that are still under warranty since Sra. Meris is the only vendor in the city of BarranquilL. who is authorized to offer service guarantees for these brands. She has been successful in her negotiations with major retail chains to proviD. maintenance and repair services to their customers who purchase electronics with a warranty. Her goal for the future is to open branches in different cities along the Caribbean coast of Colombia.

While Mery and husband work toward fulfilling their dreams, they have been able to achieve a profit margin in their business of no less than 40% and an inventory turnover period of 20 days for spare parts kept in-house. These financial indicators signal growth and a successful investment of her Kiva loan, her first form of financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. Meris will use the money to buy spare parts for televisions and sound equipment so that she can respond promptly to her customers.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for televisions and sound equipment.

loans.name: Sixto Tomas

texts.es: Muy contento se encuentra Sixto, porque está aplicando a su segundo credikiva, pues con el primero logró comprar naranjas en cantidades, dos vitrinas: calentador y una exhibidora, hasta le alcanzó para comprar productos nutritivos y surtir su punto de ventas. Ahora con su nuevo financiamiento espera adecuar el carro de jugos, cambiar la carpa pues tiene unas ranuras y se moja cuando llueve;  igualmente quiere surtir su pequeña miscelánea y comprar un exprimidor eléctrico. Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Sixto ingrese al siguiente enlace: http://kiva.org/lend/236035
texts.en:
Sixto is very happy because he is applying for his second credikiva. With his first, he managed to buy many oranges and two showcases: one for heating and another for displaying. He was even able to buy nutritious products and stock his stall.

With his new financing he hopes to adapt his juice cart and change the cover because it has holes and he gets wet when it rains; he also wants to stock his stall and buy an electric juicer. If you would like to read Sixto's story, click on the following link: http://kiva.org/lnd/236035.

loans.use: to adapt his juice cart, change the cover because it has holes and he gets wet when it rains, buy goods to stock his stall and purchase an electric juicer.

loans.name: Maitre Cecilia

texts.es: Maitré de 39 años de edad vive al suroccidente de Barranquilla con su esposo y su hijo en la edad de 10 años. Ella tiene un negocio de droguería y miscelánea, que surgió cuando Maitre, observando al sector donde habita,  encontró que  no existía  un negocio,  que respondiera a las familias con la  necesidad medicamentos. Gradualmente ha ido fortaleciendo su negocio y así mismo agregando otras mercancías,  como cosméticos, perfumes y accesorios femeninos. Su meta es ampliar su negocio y lograr capital de trabajo para invertir en productos que rotan rápidamente, para tenerla siempre bien surtida. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará medicinas alopáticas sin restricción médica, cosméticos y fantasías femeninas. Mientras trabaja para alcanzar sus metas obtiene una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menores del 22%, una rotación de inventarios de 7 días y una rotación de cuentas por cobrar de 6 días, indicadores financieros desde los cuales proyectamos su crecimiento y su potencial inversión exitosa con su credikiva.
texts.en:
Maitré, age 39, lives with her husband and ten year old son to the southwest of Barranquilla.  She has a drugstore and miscellany business.  The business emerged when Maitre observed that the area where she lives did not have another business that could meet the families’ pharmaceutical needs.

She has gradually been strengthening her business and adding other merchandise like cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories.  Her goal is to expand her business and to get working capital to invest in products that turnover quickly.  She will do this in order to always be well stocked.

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, which is her first with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the loan to buy allopathic medicine, over-the-counter medicine, cosmetics, and women’s novelties.

While she works to achieve her goals she gets a profit margin of no less than 22%, an inventory turnover of seven days, and an accounts receivable rotation of six days.  These are financial indicators from which we predict her growth and the potential for the successful investment of her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy allopathic medicine, over-the-counter medicine, cosmetics, and women’s novelties.

loans.name: Morena Guadalupe

texts.es: Morena Guadalupe de 47 años de edad, reside en casa propia junto con su familia la cual está conformada por sus 2 hijos de 10 y 5 años de edad los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Ella se dedica a la venta de deliciosas pupusas. Ha trabajado duramente para sacar adelante a su familia. Para Morena lo más importante es que sus queridos hijos puedan tener lo necesario en educación y alimentación. Su familia es la que la impulsa a seguir  trabajando duramente para poder darles el pan de cada día. Esto la ha motivado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su pupusería en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: maíz, arroz, frijoles, queso, chicharon, etc. para contar con suficiente materia prima a la hora de realizar las deliciosas pupusas y poder ofrecerlas a los clientes que frecuentan el negocio de Morena. Tiene plena confianza que su esfuerzo valdrá la pena y podrá lograr su objetivo. Cabe mencionar que Morena está muy agradecida con  INTEGRAL ya que en el pasado le brindo su ayuda para poder invertir en el negocio y gracias a Dios los resultados fueron muy buenos, espera en ésta ocasión superar esa experiencia
texts.en:
Morena Guadalupe is 47 years old.  She lives in her own house with her family, which is comprised of two children.  The children are 10 and 5 years old, and they go to school.

She sells delicious “pupusas” (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans).  She has worked hard in order to get her family ahead.  The most important thing to Morena is that her beloved children are able to have the necessary education and nourishment.  Her family is what drives her to keep working hard in order to be able to give them their daily bread.

This has motivated her to request this loan from INTEGRAL.  The loan is to invest in her pupusa business by purchasing the needed ingredients like corn, rice, beans, cheese, and fried pork rinds, etc.  Morena is then able to sell the pupusas to the customers that frequent her business.  She has every confidence that it will be worthwhile, and she will be able to reach her objective.

It needs to be mentioned that Morena is very grateful to INTEGRAL because in the past they gave her help in order to be able to invest in the business.  Thanks to God, the results were very good.  On this occasion she hopes to surpass this experience.

loans.use: to buy  the needed ingredients like corn, rice, beans, cheese, and fried pork rinds, etc.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina Isabel de 37 años de edad, reside en casa propia junto a su hijo de 13 años y su hija de 3 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva, de manera ambulante, en las principales zonas donde ella reside. Es muy conocida en la zona y muchas personas la prefieren ya que ella es una mujer dedicada a su trabajo pero sobre todo muy amable. Ella siempre trata de mantener lo más nuevo y al alcance del bolsillo en el mundo  de la moda, de tal manera que los clientes siempre la prefieran y sigan solicitando sus productos. Su deseo es poder ofrecer una mayor cantidad de prendas de vestir con el fin de que su negocio crezca cada día más. Esto la ha hecho tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir como: faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisas, vestidos, shorts, y de mas productos que permitan atraer a más clientes. De tal manera que sus ventas e ingresos se vean aumentadas y consecuentemente pueda mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Reina Isabel is 37 years old and lives in her own home together with her 13-year-old son and her 3-year-old daughter.  Her business is selling new clothes as an itinerant vendor in the areas around her home.  She is very well known in her area and many people prefer to buy from her as she is very committed to her work but, above all, she is very kind.  Reina always tries to keep the very latest products in stock and make them affordable to everybody.  For this reason, her customers prefer to buy from her and continue requesting her products.  Reina's wish is to be able to sell a larger quantity of clothes so that her business grows every day.

Reina Isabel has taken the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business.  She will buy a range of clothes such as skirts, pants, blouses, shirts, dresses, shorts and other products which will enable her to gain more customers.  Her sales and income will increase and, consequently, she will be able to improve her own quality of life as well as that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a range of clothes such as skirts, pants, blouses, shirts, dresses, shorts, etc.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es:
Moises  tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de San José que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la pesca, agricultura y ganadería.

Moises desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno (vaca), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que tenga una buena producción de leche, la que ofrece a los mismos pobladores de la zona o lo lleva a vender al mercado de Chiclayo y Lambayeque, cuenta con clientela fija por la buena calidad de leche que tiene, con sus ingresos solventa sus obligaciones familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimentos balanceados y realizar algunos arreglos en su fundo, al estar bien alimentadas se incrementará la producción de la leche de vaca y así podrá ofrecerlo aun mejor precio para poder cubrir su crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Moises es una persona trabajadora y responsable que lo único que quiere es que con el negocio que tiene poderle brindar a sus hijos otras oportunidades académicas.
texts.en:
Moisés, 37, lives with his wife and children in his own house, which has only electricity and is located in the rural area of the district of San José, in the province of Chiclayo.  The activities in this area are fishing, agriculture, and livestock.

Moisés has raised cattle for several years.  The pen is outside his house.  He feeds the animals balanced feed and natural grasses so he will get good milk production.  He offers the milk to the residents of the area or takes it to the market in Chiclayo and Lambayeque to sell.  He has a steady clientele because of the good quality of his milk.  With his income he pays for all his family obligations.

Moisés has requested a loan of 3000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy additional balanced feed and to make some repairs on his farm.  When the cows are well fed, the milk production will increase.  In this way he will be able to get a better price to be able to cover his loan and improve his family's quality of life.  Moisés is a hardworking and responsible person who, with his business, only wants to be able to offer his children other academic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his animals and make some repairs on his farm.

loans.name: William

texts.es:
Willian de 26 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual cuenta con servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque . Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola,  ganadera y turística de los pobladores.

Willian se dedica desde hace 2 años a la crianza y comercialización de ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puede ofrecer a sus clientes o a los distintos mercados de Chiclayo y Lambayeque y con los ingresos que obtenga pueda solventar los gastos personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento, al estar bien alimentados los puede ofrecer a sus clientes a un mejor precio,  con la finalidad de que obtenga  más ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Willian es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es salir adelante y seguir ayudando a sus padres en lo que sea necesario.
texts.en:
26 year old William is single and lives with his parents in a house that is connected to the electricity grid. They live in a rural zone of the district of Mórrope, which is part of the department of Lambayeque. This area is characterized by its agricultural activity, livestock, and tourism.
William has been working for two years raising and selling pigs. He has a sty behind his house and he feeds them a special balanced diet. Once they reach their optimum size, he offers them to his clients or takes them to the various markets in Chiclayo and Lambayeque and he uses the profits that he makes to cover his personal expenses. 
He has requested a loan of $750 from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and their respective food. When they are well fed he will offer them to his clients at a better price with the goal of obtaining greater profits so he can have a better quality of life. William is a hardworking and responsible person and the only thing he wants is to be successful so he can keep helping his parents with what they need.

loans.use: to buy animals and their respective food.

loans.name: Laura Concepción

texts.es:
La señora Laura tiene 59 años D. edad esta casada con 3 hijos.

La señora Laura tiene una tienda desD. hace 15 años. Ella aprendió el oficio D. su madre. En un principio ella abrió la tienda con su hijo para que el tuviese su propio negocio y no verse en la necesidad D. emigrar a otro país en busca D. un trabajo.

Sus proveedores le llevan los productos a su casa donD. tiene la tienda. La señora Laura utilizara el préstamo para comprar mayor cantidad D. productos D. alta demanda en su comunidad, como zapatos y productos D. la canasta básica. Esto le ayudara a tener su tienda mas surtida y a mantener sus ingresos ya que la salud D. ella y su esposo ha decaído por lo que no pueD. ir en busca D. los  productos lejos D. su pueblo.
texts.en:
Laura is 59 years old, married and has three children.  She’s had a store for the last 15 years.  She learned this occupation from her mother.  At the beginning, she opened the store with her son so that he’d have his own business and wouldn’t need to emigrate to another country seeking work.

Her suppliers deliver the goods to her house which is where her store is located.  Laura will use the loan to buy larger amounts of products that are in high demand in her community, like shoes and basic staple items.  This will help her have her store better stocked and maintain her income because hers and her husband’s health have deteriorated so she’s unable to go far from her town looking for products.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina de 47 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Morropón que pertenece al deparatamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace 4 años Marcelina se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos, golosinas) y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en casa de sus padres para su seguridad, ya que puede atender a la hora que desea, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades de su hogar.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería para abastecer su negocio y de adquirir arroz en cáscara para comercializarlo, con el único objetivo de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones diarias. Marcelina es una persona responsable y dedicada que se preocupa por tener un negocio más grande e incursionar en otro negocio para brindarle más comodidades a su familia.
texts.en:
47 year old Marcelina lives with her husband and so in their own house, which has water and electrical service. The house is in the district of Morropón, which is in the department of Piura. This area is characterized by its agricultural and livestock activity.
For 4 years, Marcelina has been selling groceries (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, sodas) and drinks. She runs her business from her parents house because it is secure and she can work at the times she wants to. She trys to use the profits from her sales to cover all her expenses and essentials for the home.
She is requesting a $750 loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a greater quantity of merchandise to supply her store and to add a particular type of rice to her stocks with the only goal of growing her business and having more products to offer her customers. Marcelina is a responsible and dedicated person who cares about having a bigger business and moving into another business to offer more comforts to her family.

loans.use: to buy more supplies to sell in her store.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y al cultivo de maíz, vive con sus cuatro hijos y tres nietos, su negocio es la crianza de cerdos y con la ayuda de sus hijos y nietos desarrolla la siembra de maíz,  también vende totillas, estas son sus fuentes de ingreso con las que cuenta para salir de sus gastos y comprar la alimentación para toda la familia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, ya que desea invertir comprando algunos cerditos para engordar, también mejoras de vivienda,  con este préstamo podrá obtener dos beneficios con su negocio y la mejora de su vivienda.
Su mayor deseo es ayudar a sus nietos para que estudien y puedan prepararse desarrollando su vida mejor.
texts.en:
María works raising pigs and growing corn. She lives with her 4 sons and three grandsons. Her business is raising pigs and, with the help of her sons and grandsons, she is developing a corn crop. She also sells tortillas. These are the sources of income she depends on to cover expenses and buy food for all the family. 
She is requesting a loan to buy pigs and she wants to buy some piglets to fatten. She also wants to make some home improvements. Her greatest wish is to help her grandsons so that they can study and prepare to create a better life for themselves.

loans.use: to buy pigs for the farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk in order to make cheese, cream, and curd.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es: Blanca Estela D. 39 años D. edad, habita en casa propia junto con su compañero D. vida en zona cercana a la ciudad. Ella se dedica al comercio. Gracias a sus habilidades ha logrado establecer una tienda en su hogar D. residencia la cual ha mantenido durante  mucho tiempo y es la que le ha permitido tener acceso a mejores ingresos los cuales le han ayudado a mejorar su calidad D. vida. Se destaca entre la competencia por poseer artículos que en ninguna otra tienda se hayan, ya que ellos, los va a comprar ella personalmente al proveedor. Blanca es una mujer ejemplar, trabajadora y emprendedora la cual no se cansa D. trabajar. Ella sueña con ver su negocio florecer y poder satisfacer a una mayor demanda que le permita mejorar sus niveles D. venta. Para esto ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin D. comprar variedad D. productos: aceite, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, detergente, golosinas, etc. que le permitan atraer a mas clientes y por consecuencia lograr su sueño.
texts.en: 39 year old Blanca Estela lives in her own home along with her partner. Their home is close to the city. Thanks to her abilities, she has been able to establish a store in her home and has been running this for a long time and this is what has enabled her to make a good income which in turn has enabled her to improve her quality of life. She stands out among the competition for having items for sale that the other stores don't have and she buys these personally from the supplier. Blanca is an exemplorary woman, hardworking, and enterprising who never tires of her work. She dreams of seeing her business flourish and having the satisfaction of greater demand that will enable her to increase her sales. For this reason, she has taken the decision to request a loan from INTEGRAL with the goal of buying a variety of products: oil, rice, sugar, beans, detergent, sodas, etc, that will let her attract more clients and so achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products: oil, rice, sugar, beans, detergent, sodas, etc.

loans.name: Héctor Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Héctor es un hombre muy trabajador de 36 años de edad, está casado y tiene 2 pequeños hijos.

El señor Héctor se dedica a la agricultura desde muy niño, el aprendió con su padre este trabajo. El siembra maíz, fríjol y maicillo. Todos los días el se levanta a las 4:00 de la mañana a darle de comer a sus animales para luego irse a trabajar durante 8 horas diarias desplazándose aproximadamente  2 kilómetros.

Para que sus cultivos tengan buenos frutos el señor Héctor necesita fertilizantes, por lo cual pidió un préstamo por medio de la Fundación Campo. Los fertilizantes los adquiere en la ciudad, ya que el señor Héctor vive en una zona rural. El resultado de su cosecha lo utiliza para dar alimento a sus cerdos para engordarlos y venderlos o a veces el mismo los destaza. Con la ayuda del préstamo don Héctor puede darles mejor alimento a sus cerdos y venderlos a mejor precio.

El señor Héctor espera poder seguir trabajando para así proveer una buena vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Héctor is a very hardworking, 36-year-old man.  He’s married and has two small children.

Héctor has been a farmer since he was a young boy.  He learned this work alongside his father.  He farms corn, beans and ‘maicillo’ [tree used for wood production].  He rises daily at 4am to feed his animals and then travels about 2 kilometers to work 8 hours daily.
