So that his crops will produce good harvests, Héctor needs fertilizer so he’s asked Fundación Campo for a loan.  He buys the fertilizer in the city because Héctor lives in a rural area.  He uses his harvest to feed his pigs to fatten them up and sell them or sometimes he butchers them himself.  With help from the loan Héctor will be able to provide better care for the pigs and sell them for a better price.

Héctor hopes to be able to continue working to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and feed for the pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tables for fixing up her place of business.

loans.name: Pascuala

texts.es:
Pascuala D. 54 años, es soltera, vive en casa D. unos familiares, cuenta con servicio sólo D. luz, ubicada en la zona rural que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona tiene actividad agricola y ganadera.

DesD. hace varios años Pascuala se dedica a la venta diaria D. menestra cocidas y especias en el mercado D. la ciudad donD. vive, tiene su propia clientela a quien ofrece sus productos.  Ha creído conveniente en solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más insumos y seguir cocinando los productos que ofrece y con los ingresos que obtenga con sus ventas podrá cubrir su crédito y tendrá más comodidades para ella y la personas que viven junto con ella.

Pascuala es una mujer responsable, trabajadora y honesta que lo único que quiere es poder salir adelante juntocon su negociospor el bienestar D. los suyos.
texts.en:
Pascuala is 54 years old and single.  She lives in her relatives’ house, and the only service it has is electricity.  It is located in the rural zone in the Piura department.  The business activities in this zone are farming and livestock.

For several years Pascuala has devoted herself to the daily sales of cooked stews and spices at the market in the city where she lives.  She has her own customers to whom she sells her products.

She has believed it advisable to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to buy more ingredients and to keep cooking the products that she sells.  With the income that she will get from her sales she will be able to cover her loan.  She will also have more amenities for herself and the people who live with her.

Pascuala is a responsible, hard-working, and honest woman.  The only thing she wants is to be able to get ahead together with her business for the well-being of her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients to continue offering her products for sale.

loans.name: Cecilia Margarita

texts.es:
Cecilia de 38 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa  propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona de actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde hace 2 años Cecilia se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza venta de prendas de vestir, su negocio lo tiene en el interior de su casa, cuenta con su propia clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga en ambas actividades podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más productos de belleza  como prendas de vestir de moda para exhibir y vender a su clientela y así podrá obtener mayores ganancias para solventar todas sus obligaciones.  Cecilia es una mujer trabajadora y una madre que siempre trata que su familia salga adelante a pesar de las dificultades que a veces se presentan en la vida.
texts.en:
Cecilia is 38 years old.  She lives with her husband and children in their own home, where they have only electricity (no running water).  Their home is located in the rural area of Tambogrande district, which is part of the Piura department.  This is an area of agriculture, livestock, and handicrafts.

For the last two years, Cecilia has worked selling beauty products and clothes.  She manages her business from her home, and has her own customer base.  With the income she earns from both activities, she is able to provide a better quality of life for her family.

She has requested a loan of 1,000 New Soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more beauty products and fashionable clothes to show and sell to her customers, and so be able to generate more earnings to cover all her financial obligations.

Cecilia is a hard-working woman and mother, who always tries to move her family ahead in spite of the difficulties that sometimes occur in life.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products and clothes for her business.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 7 y 3 años de edad, Él posee un taller de estructuras metálicas y lo atiende desde las 5:00am hasta las 6:00 de la tarde desde hace 6 años, también presta servicio con un molino de nixtamal.
Él está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, hoy para la compra de repuestos para el molino y una pequeña parte la invertirá en abono, porque está sembrando maíz y quiere fortalecer la plantación. Este préstamo le será útil para realizar los cambios al molino y prestar un mejor servicio a los clientes.
Las aspiraciones de Manuel son continuar con el taller y en el molino, que sus ingresos aumenten para el sostenimiento de su familia y la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Manuel lives with his wife and two children aged 7 and 3.  He has a metalworking workshop, where he works from 5 a.m. till 6 p.m.  He has been doing this for the last 6 years, and he also provides a corn milling service.

He is requesting a new loan for the purchase of spare parts for his grinder, and he will invest a small part of the loan in manure as he is growing corn and wants to improve his plantation.  This loan will be useful to him in making repairs to the grinder, and providing a better service for his customers.

Manuel's aspirations are to continue with his workshop and grinder, so that his income grows for the upkeep of his family and his children's education.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his corn grinder.

loans.name: Las Fundadoras De Miguel Grau Group

texts.es: L. señora Ruth tiene 51 años, pertenece a L. alcancía “Fundadoras D. Miguel Grau”, el nombre le pusieron por que ellas eran las primeras personas en poblar L. zona en L. que actualmente están viviendo, L. clienta tiene 3 hijos los cuales se encuentran en edad escolar, para poder seguir apoyando a sus hijas confecciona pulseras artesanales que son tejidos a mano, empezó ayudando a otras personas, pero ahora L. señora contacta a los compradores y elL. realiza L. negociación pudiendo así tener mas ingresos y dando trabajo a personas que como elL. en algún momento solo otorgaban servicios D. tejido. L. clienta desea el crédito para capital D. trabajo ya que tiene un pedido granD.. Las socias agradecen a Edaprospo.
texts.en:
Señora Ruth is 51 years old.  She belongs to the communal bank “Fundadoras D. Miguel Grau” ("The Founders of Miguel Grau"); they gave it this name because these were the first people to populate the area where the members currently live.

The client has three school-age children.  In order to continue supporting her children, she makes hand-woven crafted bracelets.  She began by helping other people, but now the señora contacts the buyers and does the negotiation herself, so she can earn more income and proviD. work to people who, like herself at this moment, are only providing weaving services.

The client is requesting the loan for working capital, as she has a large order to fill.

The members are grateful to Edaprospo.

loans.use: to grow her business making hand-crafted bracelets and buy materials.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: Graciela de 46 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su compañero de vida en zona semi urbana,  Graciela se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catálogo. Cuenta con muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y gracias a Dios y su trabajo ha logrado mantenerlo activo y sacarle el fruto de su esfuerzo. La mayoria de sus clientes son empleados de oficinas de la ciudad en la que vive, es decir cuenta con cartera fija, también ocasionalmente va al mercado regional de donde vive y promueve sus productos. Ella es una mujer con muchas metas y entregada en  su trabajo. Muchas personas le tienen confianza y la prefieren ya que siempre cuenta con las mejores promociones en los artículos que ofrece. Ella además se dedica a la compra y venta de pollos de engorde en su casa, a fin de generar mas ingresos a su hogar. En esta ocasión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar mayor variedad de productos de belleza y del cuidado personal de sus clientes.- Todo esto lo hace  con el fin de aumentar su nivel de ventas y de ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Graciela, 46, lives in her own house with her life partner in a semi-urban area.  Graciela has sold cosmetics by catalog for many years.  Thanks to God and her job, she has been able to keep her business active and profit from her effort.  The majority of her customers are office workers in the city where she lives, so she has a steady clientele.  She also occasionally goes to the regional market where she lives and promotes her products.

Graciela is a woman with many goals who is committed to her work.  Many people trust her and prefer her, since she always has the best deals on the articles she sells.  She also buys and sells broiler chickens in her home to generate more income.

Graciela has made the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL to buy a greater variety of beauty and personal care products for her customers.  She is doing this with the goal of increasing her sales and income, which will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy perfume, lotion, and face and body creams.

loans.name: Denis Alexander

texts.es:
Denis, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 6 años de edad, se  dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, desde hace 15 años, aprendió de su padre, trabaja todos los días, de 6:00am a 3:00pm.
Él solicita nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de abonos y herbicidas, pues se dispone a sembrar maíz y frijol, este préstamo le ayudara a obtener todo lo necesario para realizar la siembra y prevenirla de algunos de los riesgos de plagas.
Su propósito es que a través de su trabajo puedan mejorar los ingresos del hogar y la alimentación.
texts.en:
Denis lives with his wife and 6 year old child, and has been growing corn and beans for 15 years, learning from his father, working every day from 6:00AM until 3:00PM.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy fertilizer and herbicides, and as he is preparing to plant corn and beans, this loan will help him get everything he needs for planting, and for preventing some of the risks of pests.

His goal is to improve the household income and nutrition through his hard work.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides

loans.name: Belizario

texts.es:
Belizario de 21 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual cuenta con servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Reque que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola,  ganadera y turística de los pobladores.

Belizario se dedica desde hace 2 años a la crianza y comercialización de ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puede ofrecer a sus clientes o a los distintos mercados de Chiclayo y Lambayeque y con los ingresos que obtenga pueda solventar los gastos personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y mejorar su corral con el que cuenta ya que es improvisado, con la finalidad de que obtenga  más ganancias para tener una mejor su calidad de vida.  Belizario es un joven trabajador y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es salir adelante y seguir ayudando a sus padres con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
Belizario is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents in a home that has electricity, located in the rural district of Reque in the province of Chiclayo. This area is known for agriculture, farming and tourism. 

Belizario has been working for 2 years breeding and selling swine (pigs) with a pen for them in the back of his house. He feeds them well and once they reach their optimum size he can offer them to his customers or take them to various markets in Chiclayo and Lambayeque and with the income he earns he can meet his personal expenses. 

He has asked for a loan of 3000 soles through Alternative Edpyme to buy more animals and improve their pen which is makeshift, with the goal of earning more money to have a better quality of life. Belizario is a young and responsible worker who only wants to move forward and continue helping his parents with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy more animals and to make improvements to their pen

loans.name: Juan Doroteo

texts.es: Juan Doroteo es un hombre luchador que tiene 67 años, su actividad económica es ofrecer el servicio acarreo. Hace más de 15 años que se hace cargo de este negocio, pues siempre se ha preocupado por proporcionarle a su esposa e hijo lo más necesario. El dio inicio a este negocio vendiendo leña, luego surgió la idea de ofrecer el servicio de acarreo que consiste en transportar cosas como camas, leña, refrigeradora, roperos, madera, tubos entre otros. Es así que solicita este financiamiento para la compra de llantas, comprar cuerdas y brindarle ciertos arreglos a su carretón.  El quiere seguir apoyando a sus hijos por medio de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Juan is a fighting man who is 67 years old, and in the business of providing a hauling service. He has been doing this for more than 15 years. He has always been concerned about providing his wife and child with their needs. 

He started his business selling firewood, and then had the idea of offering a hauling service to transport things like beds, firewood, refrigerators, closets, wood, and pipes among other things. 

He is asking for a loan in order to buy tires, and to buy rope, and to make improvements to his cart. He wants to continue supporting his children through the work that he does.

loans.use: to buy tires, and to buy rope, and to make improvements to his cart

loans.name: Blanca Margarita

texts.es: Blanca Margarita de 36 años de edad, reside en casa propia en zona de muchas carencias, junto a ella sus 4 hijas y su madre de 60 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad. Gracias a su arduo trabajo ha logrado establecer como madre soltera, una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia. Blanca es una mujer emprendedora llena de metas y sueños. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y no pierde las esperanzas de que algún día verá a sus queridas hijas convertidas en grandes profesionales. Su familia es la que la impulsa a seguir adelante y trabajar duramente para darles lo necesario. Últimamente ha estado pensando mucho en la manera de hacer crecer su negocio ya que este es su principal fuente de ingresos y piensa seguir manteniéndolo activo y recibiendo los frutos que hasta el momento ha recibido. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de productos de tienda como: frijoles, arroz, azúcar, aceite, pan dulce, huevos, golosinas, etc. Para surtir su negocio con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le permitan aumentar su nivel de ventas e ingresos de tal manera que su calidad de vida y la de su familia se vea mejorada.
texts.en:
Blanca is 36 years old, lives in her own house in an area of many shortages, with her four daughters and her mother who is 60 years old. She sells staples. Thanks to her hard work as a single mother, she has established a small convenience store in her home. 

Blanca is an enterprising woman, full of goals and dreams. For her, what is most important is her family and she has not lost her dream that one day she will see her beloved daughters become important professionals. She keeps going and works hard for her family to give them what is necessary.

Lately she has been thinking a lot about how to expand her business as it is her main source of income and she is thinking of keeping it open and receiving the income that it has provided up until now.

This is the reason for which she is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL. She wants to buy beans, rice, sugar, oil, pastries, eggs, candy, etc. She wants to supply her store in order to attract more customers in order to increase sales and earnings so that the quality of life for her and her family will look better.

loans.use: to buy products for her store such as: beans, rice, sugar, oil, pastries, eggs, candy, etc

loans.name: Ivan Cruz

texts.es:
Ivan tiene 25 años de edad, es soltero, vive en su casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio sólo de agua, ubicada en la zona rural del departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona tiene como actividad agricultura, ganadería y turismo. 

Ivan desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno (vaca), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que sus animales llegan a su crecimiento óptimo podrá ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así pueda obtener muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales de otras especies, alimento y adaptación de un nuevo corral, con la finalidad de obtener más clientes e ingresos y así mejoraría  su calidad de vida.  Ivan es una persona trabajadora y responsable que lo único que desea es que su negocio crezca para seguir ayudando a sus padres y mejorando él mismo.
texts.en:
Ivan is 25 years old, single, and lives in his parent’s home, which has running water, located in the rural area of the department of Lambayeque. This zone is known for agriculture, livestock and tourism.

For some years Ivan has been raising and selling cattle (cows). He has a corral outside his house. He gives them animal feed and natural pasture. When the animals reach their optimum size he offers them for sale in various markets in the area, and thus can attain a good income to meet his family expenses.

He is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 2000 soles in order to buy other breeds of animals, and feed, and to redo his corral with the goal of obtaining more clients and income, thereby improving the quality of his life. Ivan is a responsible and hard working person who only wants his business to grow in order to continue helping his parents and to improve himself.

loans.use: to buy other breeds of animals and to redo the corral

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy marañon seeds.

loans.name: Daysi

texts.es: Daysi tiene 21 años, vive con sus padres y su hijo. El negocio al que se dedica es la venta de abarrotes, actividad que ha ejecutado desde hace 1 año, que por recomendación de sus padres decidió incursionar en esta actividad. Pues vio gran ventaja la zona donde vive, que en estos ultimos años se ha convertido en uan zona comercial. Es así como se genera los ingresos para mantener a su hijo, de esa manera logra mejorar su nivel de vida. En ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su madre, quien se encarga de atender los viernes, día que hay mayor afluencia de gente. Sus planes es la de hacer crecer su negocio, y por ello necesita comprar de más mercadería para abastecer su negocio. Es su segunda vez que esta solicitando un crédito con MFP, se siente muy contenta de formar parte de este grupo solidario por segunda vez porque conoce a sus integrantes y tiene confianza en la responsabilidad de ellos, ya que lo ha demostrado en meses anteriores. El dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de mas mercadería en abarrotes.
texts.en: Daysi is 21 years old. She lives with her parents and her son. Her business is selling groceries. She has done this for 1 year. She decided to do this when her parents recommended it to her. She saw that it was a great advantage in the area where she lives, since in the last few years it has become very commercial. This is how she makes income to support her son, and how she improves her quality of life. At times, her mother helps her. She works on Fridays, when there is the most people. Her plan is to grow her business, but she needs to buy more merchandise to supply her business. This is the second time that she has asked MFP for a loan. She is very happy to be a part of this supportive group for the second time, because she knows the members and she trusts that they are responsible, as they have shown themselves to be in previous months. The money she has asked for will be invested in grocery merchandise.

loans.use: to buy more products to supply her store

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio de 65 años de edad, es soltero, vive en su casa propia con unos familiares, la cual cuenta sólo con servicio de luz, ubicada en el distrito de la Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

La actividad que desarrolla Julio es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra plantas de plátano, con una experiencia de 4 años, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de la zona donde vive y a otros sitios también, así puede obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos y necesidades personales. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto, con la finalidad de ofertarlo a un mejor precio a los comerciantes y así tener mejoras económicamente.  Julio es una persona que se preocupa porque sus tierras cada vez sean más productivas para poder brindarle más comodidades a las personas con las que vive.
texts.en:
Julio, 65, is single and lives with some family members in his own home, which only has electricity, in the district of La Matanza in the department of Piura.  The area is known for agriculture and cattle.

Julio works in agriculture.  He has his own land where he has grown banana plants for four years.  Once he harvests his crop, he offers it at various markets in the area where he lives as well as in other places so he can get earnings to cover his expenses and personal needs.

He has requested a loan of 2500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy fertilizer to improve his land and his crop, with the goal of offering it at a better price to the merchants and so have higher bids.  Julio is a person who is concerned about always increasing the productivity of his land so he can provide more comforts to the people with whom he lives.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to improve his land and his crop.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: La Señora Nilda es madre soltera con 02 hijos que viven al cuidado de ella, la señora se dedica a la venta de ropa cómo por ejemplo buzos, polos, pantalones, ropa interior,  entre otros productos exclusivamente para mujeres, este negocio lo viene realizando hace 02 años, el crédito solicitado es para invertirlo en la compra de más mercadería que será utilizado para la temporada que se viene primavera, verano. Su gran sueño de la Señora Nilda es el de tener la casa propia ya que vive en un lote alquilado, además está muy agradecida por la oportunidad brindada, ya que le permitirá incrementar su negocio y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Señora Nilda is a single mother of two children whom she looks after.  The Señora works selling clothes, such as sportswear, polo-shirts, trousers, underwear, and other products exclusively for women.  She has been working in this business for two years.

She will invest the requested loan in the purchase of more merchandise, which will be used for the coming spring and summer seasons.

Señora Nilda's big dream is to have her own home, as she lives in a rental.  She is also very grateful for the opportunity being provided, as it will allow her to grow her business and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to grow her business by buying more merchandise for the coming spring and summer seasons.

loans.name: Jose Anibal

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, vive en compañía de su esposa y dos hijos de 9 y 4 años de edad, él a través de los cultivos logra cubrir las necesidades de su familia, el se dedica al cultivo desde joven y hoy en día lo realiza con toda una gran experiencia.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono y pago de mano de obra, además pago de transporte para la producción, este préstamo será una gran ayuda para que sus cultivos se desarrollen adecuadamente.
Su aspiración con el préstamo es crecer junto a su familia, mejorar el futuro de sus pequeños hijos y que sus cultivos sean muy productivos.
texts.en:
Jose is a farmer who cultivates corn and beans.  He lives with his wife and his two children aged 9 and 4.  Through his farming activities, he is able to cover the basic household expenses for his family.  He has been farming since he was young, and so he has a lot of experience to draw on.

Now he requests a loan to buy manure and to pay for labor and transportation costs for his products.  This loan will help him so that his crops will achieve proper growth. 

His aspirations for this loan are to grow along with his family, improve the future for his small children, and have very productive crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for agricultural labor

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
Aurelia de 43 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia,  cuenta con servicios sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de la Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

Aurelia se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chicha de jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base de maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú),esta actividad lo realiza desde hace 6 años, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado de generación en generación. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas de la chicha de jora en la zona donde vive, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  

Teniendo la oportunidad de crecer Aurelia a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de harina de maíz para la elaboración de chicha de jora, con la finalidad de obtener mayores ganancias, sus clientes aumenten para solventar el crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Aurelia, 43, lives with her husband and child in her own home.  The only utility she has in her home is electricity, and she lives in a rural area of the Matanza district, which is in the department of Piura.  In this area, the population works mainly in agriculture and livestock. 

Aurelia has a business making and selling chicha de jora (a traditional Peruvian drink made from a base of corn.)   She has been doing this work for 6 years, because it is a tradition that has been passed down from generation to generation.  Lately the sale of chicha de jora has increased in the area where she lives, which has enabled her to increase her income and improve her family's quality of life.  

Having the opportunity to grow her business, Aurelia has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 Peruvian soles to buy a large quantity of corn flour to make chicha de jora.   Her goal is to have more customers and higher earnings so that she can pay off this loan and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn flour to continue making her chicha de jora and beer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motorcycle shop

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es:
Aracely de 31 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en el distrito de Morropón que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Aracely se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace menos de un años para toda las edades, negocio que a colocado ambulatoriamente en una calle muy transitada de la zona donde vive, su mercadería lo ofrece a sus clientes, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Al observar que su negocio cada día prospero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y abastecer su negocio con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Aracely es una madre de familia muy preocupada y junto con su esposo trata que todos los días no le falte nada a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aracely is 31 years old and lives with her husband and children in their own house, where the only service they have is light. Their home is located in the district of Morropón, which belongs to the department of Piura. It is a zone characterized by its agricultural and livestock activities.

Aracely has been selling all-ages clothing for less than a year. Her business is ambulatory, along a well-traveled street in the area where she lives. She offers her merchandise to her customers, trying increase their demand so that she can earn more income to meet her family's needs.

Upon observing the daily prosperity and growth of her business, she thought it necessary to request a loan of 500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy a larger quantity of merchandise and to stock her business with innovative products. Her goal is for her clientele to continue growing so that she can repay her loan and improve her family's quality of life. Aracely is a very concerned mother and, together with her husband, she tries every day to ensure that her children lack nothing.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Josué Nehemías

texts.es: Josué Nehemías de 25 años de edad, reside en casa propia junto con su querida familia la cual está conformada por su madre de 40 años y su hijo de 7 años.  Josué es un hombre trabajador, emprendedor y sobre todo amable. Gracias a estas grandes características y su gran espíritu de superación ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas los cuales lo admiran por ser un hombre integro. Él se dedica a la venta de sorbetes artesanales de manera ambulante en las principales zonas donde él reside. Muchas personas lo prefieren porque cuando de sorbetes se trata él es el indicado ya que ofrece deliciosos sorbetes artesanales para todos los gustos y preferencias, en sabores de melon, arrayan, coco y tamarindo,todos recubiertos con una jalea de piña y lo mejor de todo es que ofrece los mejores precios. Su sueño es dar a su hijo el estudio para que un día pueda tener el gusto de verlo convertido en un gran profesional. Esta es la razón por la cual día con día realiza su trabajo con mucho orgullo y dedicación. Esto lo ha motivado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios para la  fabricación de los sorbetes artesanales y además para invertir en la reparación y equipamiento de su bicicleta de reparto, de tal manera que esto le ayude a lograr su sueño y dar a su familia estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Josué Nehemías is 25 years old and lives in his own house, together with his beloved family, comprised of his 40 year-old mother and 7 year-old son. Josué is a hard-working man, entrepreneurial, and above all, friendly. Thanks to these great characteristics and his strong desire to overcome, he has succeeded in gaining the confidence of many people who admire him as a man of integrity.

He sells artisanal sorbets in an ambulatory manner, in all of the main zones of the area where he lives. Many people prefer his business because when it comes to sorbets, he is the one known to offer delicious artisanal sorbets for every taste and preference. He has flavors like melon, myrtle, coconut and tamarind, all covered with a pineapple jelly. Best of all, he offers the best prices.

Josúe's dream is to give his son an education so that, one day, he can have the pleasure of seeing him grow into a great professional. This is the reason why Josúe performs his work each day with pride and dedication. It also motivated him to request this loan from INTEGRAL, in order to invest in his business by purchasing the necessary ingredients for making artisanal sorbets. He will also invest in the repair and equipment of the bicycle he uses to distribute his sorbets. In this way, the loan will help him to achieve his dream and to give his family economic stability.

loans.use: to buy the necessary ingredients for making artisanal sorbets and to repair the bicycle he uses for distribution

loans.name: Juliana Maricruz

texts.es:
Juliana  de 31 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con todos los servicio básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del departamento de Cajamarca.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad comercial, agrícola, ganadera, turismo y minería.

Desde hace algunos años Juliana se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar su nivel de vida.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio crezca y tenga productos más surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Juliana es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles más comodidades a los suyos y en un futuro tener una tienda comercial.
texts.en:
31-year old Juliana is single and lives with her parents. Their home has all the basic services and is located in the urban area of Cajamarca Department. The area is known for its commercial activity, agriculture, animal raising, tourism, and mining.

For several years Juliana has earned her living by selling basics such as milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna etc. and drinks. She runs the business from her home as it is easier and safer that way. With the money she earns she tries to pay for all her expenses and improve her quality of life.

In order to expand her business, Juliana has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 soles so she can buy more merchandise. Her sole aims are to see her business grow and have more stock to offer her customers. She is a responsible, dedicated, and hardworking person who wishes to provide an easier life for her family. In the future she would like to have a store.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her grocery store

loans.name: Elida Del Carmen

texts.es:
Elida, vive con su hija y un nieto, ella se dedica a una granja y venta de pollos, los cuales los vende cada 6 semanas pero ya lavados, este negocio comenzó por iniciativa propia.
Por segunda ocasión está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pollos, concentrado, además este préstamo le permitirá crecer y contar con lo necesario para alimentar a las gallinas. Ella quiere crecer, que su granja sea más amplia, aumentar su clientela, desarrollarse en el comercio y atender la demanda de su clientela, también contribuir a mejorar la condición económica de su familia.
texts.en:
Elida lives with her daughter and a grandson. She earns her living by raising and selling poultry. The chickens are dressed and sold every six weeks. She began the business through her own efforts.

Elida is now seeking her second loan to buy chicks and feed so that she can expand her business and have food on hand to feed the chicks. She wishes to see her business grow, have a bigger business, increase the number of customers, develop her business knowledge, fulfill her customers' orders, and also contribute to the improvement of her family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy chicks and feed for her poultry business

loans.name: Sokhna

texts.fr: habite a cité senghor elle vend des tissus de détails et elle s'approvisionne en Mauritanie et en gambie, avec ce pret elle veut retrouver le confort familial et réaliser un bénéfice important
texts.en: Sokhna lives in Cité Senghor and retails fabrics. She gets her supplies in Mauritania and Gambia, and would like to use this loan to turn a large profit and improve her family's comfort.

loans.use: to buy and resell fabrics

loans.name: Reyna Carolina

texts.es: Reyna Carolina de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, en una populosa zona del país. Ella posee un taller de confección, diseña toda clase de ropa para niños, damas y caballeros,  como camisas, pantalones, faldas, vestidos o cualquiera otra prenda que soliciten que confecccione. Tiene muchos clientes por la calidad de su trabajo y porque siempre satisface los gustos de las personas, los precios son accesibles y el servicio excelente; Reyna es muy trabajadora siempre se encuentra adelante de su competencia, para ella todos tenemos la capacidad de alcanzar nuestros sueños y la felicidad, quiere un futuro de muchos éxitos y está trabajando duro para lograrlo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar telas por mayor, para seguir produciendo y satisfaciendo la necesidad de su clientela. Reyna Carolina tiene la esperanza de que con su esfuerzo logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
41-year old Reyna Carolina lives with her partner and their children in their own home in a highly populated part of the country. She owns a sewing business and designs all types of clothing for men, women and children such as shirts, pants, skirts, and dresses--whatever her customers order. She has many customers because of the quality of her work and because she always satisfies the tastes of her customers. As well, her prices are good and her service is excellent.

Reyna is a hardworking person and always ahead of the competition. In her view we all have the ability to fulfill our dreams and become happy. She wishes for a future filled with success and works hard to achieve this. For this reason she is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy more material at wholesale prices so she can continue making clothing and satisfying the needs of her customers. Reyna Carolina hopes that her efforts will succeed in providing her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy material at wholesale prices

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel tiene 29 años, vive con su pequeño hijo en casa de sus padres. Se dedica a la venta de sus cosechas y demás productos alimenticios que adquiere al por mayor. Ella aprendió de sus padres todo lo relacionado a la agrícultora, desde entonces no deja de cultivar papa, maíz, habas, arveja entre otros productos alimenticios, que tienen mucha demanda en el mercado. mayormente sus productos son vendidos los días viernes en una feria comercial que se encuentra en una localidad un poco lejana a la suya; pues ahí mayor afluencia de gente. Ella esta contenta por que sabe que su negocio esta mejorando poco a poco, por ello requiere de un aumento de capital de trabajo para su siguiente inversión. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, se entero de la financiera por medio de sus amistades que la invitaron a formar parte de este grupo solidario, agradece la oportunidad de crecimiento y confianza hacia su persona y se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. El dinero estará destinado en la compra de más mercadería y también sacos de abono para sembrar en sus terrenos.
texts.en:
Maribel is 29 years old and lives with her young son in her parents' house. She works selling her own produce as well as other foodstuff she buys in bulk. She learned everything she knows about farming from her parents and since then has always grown potatoes, corn, beans, peas and other foodstuff which is in high demand at the market. She usually sells her products on Fridays at a trade fair which is located a little far from where she lives, as there is a greater influx of  people there. She is happy because she knows that her business is improving little by little; it requires an increase in working capital for her next investment. This is her first loan with MFP. She learned of the microfinance institution from friends who invited her to join this solidarity group. She is grateful for the opportunity to grow and the trust shown her and she agrees to be punctual with her repayments. The money will be used to buy more merchandise and sacks of manure for her farmland.

.

loans.use: to buy food products in bulk as well as sacks of manure.

loans.name: Ruth Victoria

texts.es: Ruth Victoria de  veinticinco años de edad vive junto a su familia en uno de los municipios de la capital del país. Ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad, productos instantáneos, jugos, pan, golosinas entre otros, su tienda es muy conocida en la localidad porque siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan  a precios muy accesibles y bajo marcas de excelente calidad, Ruth es una mujer trabajadora muy activa en su trabajo, para ella la mujer que llega más lejos en su vida, es la que está dispuesta a aceptar los desafíos que se le presentan en el camino, quiere alcanzar el éxito por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita surtir el negocio con golosinas, bebidas, granos básicos, productos instantáneos, condimentos, jabón etc. Ruth Victoria tiene la confianza que así logrará llevar la seguridad económica que necesita su familia.
texts.en: Ruth Victoria is 25 years old and lives with her family in one of the municipalities of the capital. She has a shop selling staples, instant products, juices, bread, candy and the like. Her shop is very well known in the area because she always has what people need at very affordable prices and brands of excellent quality. Ruth is a very hardworking woman who is very involved with her work. She believes that the woman who goes further in life is the one willing to accept the challenges that come her way. She wants to succeed and so is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to stock up her business with sweets, beverages, dry grains, instant products, condiments and soap etc. Ruth Victoria is confident that in this way she will achieve the financial security her family needs.

loans.use: to buy candy, drinks, dry grains, instant products, condiments and soap.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile phones and accessories

loans.name: Blanca Irma

texts.es: Blanca Irma de cincuenta años de edad vive con su compañero de vida en municipio de mucho comercio. Ella posee una venta a orilla de calle principal de artículos varios, golosinas, adornos, sandalias para dama y caballero, entre otros, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas siempre encuentran con ella lo que necesitan a buenos precios y con artículos de muy buena calidad, Blanca siempre los recibe muy amable y los atiende de la mejor forma posible, su lema es al cliente lo que necesite, además de ser una mujer muy entregada al trabajo es una mujer llena de metas para su vida y alcanzarlas es su más grande reto, una de ellas es ver crecer el negocio, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita invertir comprando, sandalias, adornos, gelatinas, dulces, etc. Blanca Irma tiene la confianza que con su arduo trabajo logrará darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: 50-year-old Blanca Irma lives with her life partner in a town with a lot of commerce.  She owns a stall at the side of the main road where she sells a variety of goods: candies, decorations, men's and women's sandals, etc.  Lately she has has had a lot of customers because people always find what they need at good prices and her goods are very good quality.  Blanca always greets her customers very pleasantly and serves them in the best way possible.  Her motto is 'give the customer what they need'.  She is a woman who is very committed to her work and full of goals in life.  Reaching these goals is her big challenge.  One of her goals is to see her business grow.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to invest in buying sandals, decorations, sweet treats, etc.  Blanca Irma believes that, through her hard work, she will manage to provide her family with a full life.

loans.use: to buy sandals, decorations, gelatin treats and candies
